Gamurs is a media network allowing gamers to share achievements, keep up to date with esports news, and improve skills. Dot Esports is an online publication and community page covering esports and competitive gaming. The platform offers members breaking news, in-depth coverage of esports personalities and events, and includes an esports database – covering the rankings and stats for all major esports games.
Recruiter.com is an online recruiting service that offers a job market technology platform.
Egg Communication, dba EatTreat, serves as a platform for home chefs and professionals in the food industry to promote themselves and aims to bridge the gap between consumers and providers.

Allizhealth is building an efficient platform and a centralized repository of health information to collect health data (School Health Program & Corporate Health Programs), analyze such information, identify and track health risks (HRA & PHR), and provide personalized and timely recommendations. The health platform looks to encourage user involvement and come up with health interventions which are preventive, prescriptive and persuasive in nature.

mrUsta provides useres with an easy way to find quality service providers on the basis of customer feedback. Anyone can leave feedback on its site about people they've hired, so users can learn from their experiences and make smart decisions about who to call.

Receptiviti allows users to reveal the personalities and thinking styles of your customers, audience, prospects and contacts. Analyze email, text messages, chat, transcripts, tweets, voice and other unstructured data in twelve languages; study and compare individuals; segment and cluster large groups by personality attributes and thinking style; predict their behavior and ideal communication style - individually or millions at-a-time.

Carsome is a Malaysia-based car buying site that provides an easier car buying experience for new car buyers. The platform allows users to perform research, compare cars, and obtain upfront price quotes from Carsome Certified Dealers hassle-free without the need for haggling.
Shippit is a shipping platform for retailers. Focused on delivering packages to people, not warehouses, Shippit aims to kill the missed delivery once and for all.
Zakoopi Infotech enables shoppers to discover local offline apparel stores.
Indie Muviz, dba Muvizz, is an India-based movie on demand platform offering a curated list of titles, ranging from short films to documentaries to feature films.

RewardStock provides a rewards planning tool that allows users to track points and frequent-flyer miles, manage them in the right way, and win additional points.On November 12th 2020, RewardStock was acquired by Experian. The terms of the transaction were not disclosed.

Love the Sales is a website that supports retailers to drive new customer acquisition through their seasonal sales and discounted items, as well as long term customer retention. The company's technology gives retailers the ability to drive new customers through that behavior, taking real advantage of being on sale.
ZapChain is a collection of communities where users can earn bitcoin for posting great content and joining discussions.
Founded in 2013, Lumio is a modern lamp that unfolds from a book and can be transformed into many shapes to meet different needs.

nChannel provides an easy-to-use, cloud-based management platform for multi-channel retailers that enables the management and exchange of sales, customer, and product data from transactions that occur at a register, in the warehouse, or via a web-store. The system is sold direct to subscribers via the nChannel website, but is also available through nChannel's network of value-added resellers. Software developers can also partner with nChannel to provide connectivity from their software applications to the nChannel platform, further providing value to retailers.

Avail's online tools, education, and support help landlords find and screen tenants, create leases, collect rent online and more.On December 16th, 2020, Avail was acquired by Realtor.com, terms of the transaction were not disclosed.

Construct is a communication platform for teams on construction projects. Construct is a web and mobile application that helps Brazilian construction companies be more efficient by centralizing job site information and communication. Construct enables builders, engineers, architects and sub contractors to collaborate in realtime, create reports instantly, mark up digital floor plans and quickly document every field decision so that teams can focus on the things that really matter.

Goodvidio provides a conversion rate optimization service for e-commerce stores and brands to utilize product videos from social media to engage shoppers and increase online sales. The platform automates product video discovery, curation, publishing, video management, and optimization.
dLaboratory offers a connected analysis concept for smart grids that provides an efficient and flexible system including relay protection, disturbance recording and automatic fault analysis.

Olympus Sky develops cloud based security automation solutions. Zeus, the company's IOT security suite, can protect, organize, configure, and manage the secure communication of network assets in security clusters according to physical and virtual attributes.

Bitspark provides cross border cryptocurrency remittance. The company has built products and services that make it easier to buy and sell cryptocurrency with cash. The Bitspark web and mobile app platform enables individuals and businesses to join the Bitspark network as 'Cash Point' agents facilitating the exchange of cryptocurrencies and cash on behalf of their customers.

Remitsy is a payment service provider for global commerce. Remitsy enables businesses to send and receive payments in local currency by using distributed database technology. This method provides an almost-instant currency swap, matching funds sent with local providers of liquidity.
Text Factory provides Ai-enabled legal services. The company's products also include Moonbot, an AI-based chatbot service.

Sportway is a digital media rights, data and production company specialized in lower tier leagues and youth sports. The company works with sports federations, leagues, clubs and promoters to maximize the potential of their media product.
Eve Mattress is a London-based e-commerce mattress supplier. Every eve mattress is Made in Britain, and comes with a 100 night sleep trial and a ten year guarantee.
The PayPro is an online platform that makes it possible for professionals, micro and small businesses to make payments in 35 currencies, avoiding the banks' hidden charges.

MailClark provides a bot that enables companies to send and receive emails, Facebook messages, and Twitter messages in Slack or MS Teams. Users can collectively manage emails and messages without having to switch between communication tools.On September 14th, 2020, Mailclark was acquired by SendinBlue. The terms of the transaction were not disclosed.
Insane Unity is an independent video game studio. The Company's first game, WinThatWar!, is a real time strategy game in a retrofuture universe.

iQSpot is a software-as-a-service offer, including access to a web based dashboard for monitoring consumption and a mobile application that keeps every occupant of the building constantly informed about their energy consumption and comfort.

Jiraffe is the operator of price comparison site Hikakaku!, a platform for second-hand goods that lists numerous resellers and the prices for which they are likely going to buy the user's unwanted products. The company also offers Peing, an anonymous Q&A box service, and magi, a flea market app specialized in trading cards.

VISITS Technologies is an HR tech company that develops ideagram, a consensus-building algorithm that supports the creation and development of in-house talent, and CAREER UNIVERSITY, a service connecting students with employment.

SENRI is a sales optimization tool for manufacturing and distribution businesses in Africa. The platform supports order management, customer management, and sales activities in the manufacturing and wholesale industries.

Provider of a social art sharing platform. The company provides a social platform that connects users with artists of music, photography, video, cinema, fashion, and sports fields. Users can follow artists and influencers, save favorite artworks to a personal library, and share inspirations across their network.
Komodo provides a home maths tutor system on tablets and computers for children aged 5 to 11.
Back Market is a web platform for the sale of reconditioned electronic products, offering products such as refurbished smartphones, tablets, printers, computers, and household appliances.

Local Works (ローカルワークス) is a developer of solutions for the construction and remodeling industry. The company offers Reform Market (リフォマ), a B2C comparison site for remodeling services; Local Works Search, a B2B matching service for construction companies to find partners & craftsmen; and Local Works Payment, a third-party organization that performs settlement agency & warranty services.
Privateaser is a web platform for booking venues for corporate and private events.
GoAvio is a platform that lets users search for low-cost flights with trains and buses to achieve more optimal flight connections.

Operator of a mobile marketplace for storage needs. The company operates a web and mobile marketplace that connects users with people who have storage or parking space available for rent. Users with space can create postings on the site to advertise their availability.

MyDreamStore provides customized tee-shirts taking care of the manufacturing and logistics solutions also. The company enables artists, designers, social organizations to raise money by selling merchandise like tee-shirts, photographs.

Jacky's Shrimp is a China-based food delivery startup. Delivery is available 24 hours a day, seven days per week. Each pre-cooked dish contains a secret recipe of organic, safe, and traceable crustaceans.

Rabt is a content personalization start-up that tailors the content experiences of digital consumers based on their preferences and viewing behavior. The company's rabtPRO platform and algorithmic technology enables media companies, publishing companies and brand marketers get higher user engagement, retention and activation metrics by personalizing their content for each individual user across all channels. The company has offices in New York, US, and Athens, Greece.
LoanBaba is an online platform for individuals and businesses to secure loans. The company offers car, unsecured personal, business, home, and lease rental loans.

Live Better With offers support that goes beyond medical treatment: together with the cancer community, Live Better With handpicks products that help ease symptoms and side effects, and improve the quality of day-to-day life.
Qianlaoshi (钱老师说钱) is a video talk show that teaches users how to invest their money.
Lanxiong Sports (懒熊体育) is an online sports-focused media platform that produces its own content, distributed via its website and social media platforms.
WanPlus (玩加赛事) is an esports media platform and community, offering data, news, and insights on esports players, tournaments, and more.

IREFLY.com (上海飞岩信息科技有限公司) is the developer of Zhuzhibao (猪之宝), a SaaS platform for the livestock breeding industry, helping large, medium, and small-scale farming companies to improve their animal management capabilities.

Provider of a photo sharing networking app. The company operates a mobile app that allows users to take selfies and photos, and share them real-time with friends in their network. The app also allows users to reply with photos, and network with people alike.

Companies:
H
Hangzhou Liangge Technology Co. Ltd
Description: Provider of an online polling app. The company operates a mobile app that provides online polling and surveys, and allow users to vote and express their opinions on the topics they are interested in. The app also allows users to start their own new polling or discussions.

Provider of medical care online to offline (O2O) platform. The company connects hospitals, nursing specialist, and patients together and provides professional nursing consulting, appointment nursing, and rehabilitation instructions services. It aims at building a brand new mobile online medical care service mode, and create public healthcare professional nursing platform.

Provider of an online discussion forum for civilian drone fans. The company operates an online platform, including a website and a mobile application, that provides a platform for civilian drone fans to share and connect. It also provides instruction guide for deploying unmanned aerial vehicle (UVA), and allow users to show their work.

Provider of a mobile app for sharing games and entertainment for children. The company's platform provides suggestions on toys, books, games, and family trips for children ages birth to six years. It also holds a discussion forum for parents to exchange child-raising experience and ideas.

Companies:
W
Wuhan Aikendi Information Technology Co. Ltd.
Description: Provider of a voiced-based social platform. The company provides an online platform and a mobile application that allows users to communicate via voice. Users can dial the number directly through the app, but without viewing the phone number of the other person. The app helps users to make new friends, look for tutors, and search for legal consulting, etc.

Companies:
X
Xiamen Xingju Interactive Information Technology Co. Ltd.
Description: Provider of social mobile application. The company provides customers with a mobile application, on which customers can socialize and share information with people nearby anonymously.

Operator of a communication platform for treasures playthings from the scholar's studio. The company provides an online platform for users to share their experiences and collections about treasures playthings from the scholar's studio. The platform has mobile applications (apps) for Android and iOS.
Violet Street is a fashion aggregator that provides a social shopping portal where each user can shop along with her friends, take their feedback and make purchasing decisions, all in real-time.
foodjunky offers a way for users to order food for meetings and group lunches.

Fit Gurus is a platform for trainers to create an online business or to increase their fan base. Subscribers pay monthly to access their workouts or buy workout bundles, allowing anyone to take on the exact workouts that top trainers and athletes do each week.

Myonsto is an Ahmedabad-based eGrocery platform. The company has over 5,000 products such as fruits, vegetables and household supplies, special international foods, bakery goods and desserts in its portfolio.
XtalPi is a cloud-based technology company that solves drug polymorphism by providing accurate computational crystal structure prediction for small-molecule drugs.
Hogaru is an online platform that connects homes and offices with cleaning services providers.

Linhuiba is an Hangzhou-based event space trading platform, providing space resources including housing real estate, shopping malls, office buildings, subway stations and other crowded venues to merchants for product sales and brand promotion.
Yuer Wenyiwen (育儿问一问) is a Suzhou-based online medical counseling platform for child care and health.

Provider of a workout and fitness application. The company operates a mobile platform which provides customized workout training courses. It also provides a social networking platform that allow users to connect and share.

Provider of an online platform for real estate trading. The company provides a platform that allows customers to locate and purchase properties including both residential and commercial through online auction. It also offers legal consulting to customers who have concerns when making purchase.

Provider of social mobile application. The company provides customers with a mobile application mimicking WeChat's moments function, on which customers can disguise themselves by using celebrities' identities and communicate with each other for fun.
Youshikoudai is a Shanghai-based online teaching resource sharing platform for kindergarten teachers.
Chuangkit is a cloud-based design tool that allows users to create professional quality designs, posters and presentation slides.

OmniNet delivers the next generation of Fortune 500-grade cybersecurity and is the only provider in the market to move the edge of small businesses to a virtual, omnipresent perimeter. OmniShield and its many points of presence protects all types of devices from malicious activity whether in the office or on the road. OmniNet' patented technology delivers robust yet simplified cloud security and eliminates bandwidth pollution, which is inherent to traditional premise-based security solutions. GrayVector inspection uses reputational algorithms so the right level of security is always applied at the right time.On September 16th, 2021, OmniNet was acquired by Cytracom. The terms of the transaction were not disclosed.

Nvoi is an online marketplace offering an end-to-end solution for temporary workforce management. The company has streamlined the world of onsite contract work, making life simpler and more profitable for both workers and companies.
CityFALCON provides retail traders and investors with free crowd-curated, real-time news and tweets from financial publications and Twitter.

Repositive enables genomic data discovery, simplifies metadata organisation and provides secure data sharing and collaborations through a privacy-preserving platform. The company's mission is to maximize the benefit derived from genomic data within the limit of the donor's consent for data access and use.
Blisby is a Thailand-based handmade marketplace focused on serving the Southeast Asian region.

AboutOne is a secure online family management system that simplifies daily life by providing one location to store and manage household information, including health, education, home, and vehicle records.
SwitchedOn is a secure team messaging app that can be linked to email providers like Gmail or Microsoft Exchange.

IndiaLends is a credit underwriting and analytics platform for lending. Available on both the web and mobile, the company uses proprietary algorithms to connect borrowers with financial institutions that match their credit profiles. IndiaLends also provides data analytics and risk scoring services to financial institutions.

PHLO, dba ZipBooks, provides an accounting software program that lets business owners send and finance an invoice, offering bookkeeping and credit card processing features without a paid monthly subscription.

Pnyks, dba DataWallet, is a C2B data marketplace which directly links businesses wanting to buy data with internet users that can provide precisely this data and in turn get paid for it. DataWallet will provide not only the most ethical way to buy data, but it will bring transparency of unprecedented scale to the Data Brokerage sector. It will allow firms to work with data that is more accurate than ever before and help users get paid for what is rightfully theirs.

BoxMySpace is an on-demand storage solutions for people to declutter their home and office space. The company eases the storage experience of customers by dropping off high quality storage boxes at the customer's doorstep. All they need to do is pack all their items in the boxes. The company then collects the boxes and stores it for them.

IgniteFeedback is a real-time customer experience measurement startup based in Bozeman, MT. Founded in 2015, IgniteFeedback has delivered over 400,000 surveys to visitors through a refreshing user experience and the latest scalable internet technologies.

Shadowfax is an on-demand delivery service that takes care of delivery requirements of local businesses. Due to its hyper-local delivery network and logistics technology, merchants can deliver to their customers in cost effective and hassle free way.
Jolly Food Fellow, founded in 2015, enables food vendors to gather analytical insight about their consumers. It helps the vendor know who is coming, what they eat, how many times they visit.
DropKaffe, through Goodness! Beverages, operates in the dairy segment, offering oats smoothies, yogurt smoothies and cold coffee through an eCommerce platform.

Neocell Technologies, dba Room on Call, is a branded budget accommodation marketplace which allows business and leisure travelers to book a budget room online or through direct booking in the absence of internet connection while traveling.

Spacefy is an online marketplace that connects creative people with creative spaces. The company helps creators find locations suited to their craft and enable space owners to generate new revenue from their space.

Quifers is a tech-driven logistics company focusing on the light commercial vehicle segment. From point-to-point deliveries and distributions to hourly rental services, Quifers provides wide range of logistics services to help businesses grow.On May 10th, 2021, Sitics Logistic acquired a majority stake in Quifers. The terms of the transaction were not disclosed.

DSM Fresh Foods, dba Zappfresh, is an online platform selling raw meat and associated ready-to-eat food products. The firm offers nearly 40 different items, including whole chicken, mutton, and pork. It also sells pre-cooked items like cold cuts like ham, sausages and salami etc.
Social Status is Google Analytics for social media. The company enables users to reach and engage more people on social media.

Sunday Mattresses & Beds, dba Sundayrest, is an eCommerce store that sells mattresses and pillows. The company deals in a highly niche space, selling bedding equipment which it sources from international brands. For Bengaluru, Sundayrest offers same day delivery service whereas for other cities, the mattresses get delivered within a week. The company offers hundred nights risk free trial with which customers can get a full cash refund if they are not happy with the mattress.

sensemetrics is a San Diego, CA-based technology company offering B2B solutions and technology for effective management of distributed sensor networks. The company provides smart solutions and descriptive analytics to sensing applications in the challenging industries of Infrastructure, Mining, Oil & Gas, Construction, & Utilities.On April 29th, 2021, sensemetrics was acquired by Bentley Systems. The terms of the transaction were not disclosed.
Salesbox, founded in 2013, has built a customer relationship management system which helps the sales people to keep track of who they have contacted.
LovePop creates intricate paper art greeting cards that pop. The company offers cards for special occasions, holidays, and many other card gifting occasions.

BreezoMeter is a provider of air quality data. BreezoMeter uses AI and machine learning to gather and understand data from multiple sources — including more than 47,000 sensors worldwide. The result is street-level air quality resolution (within 5 meters), and pollen, pollutants and fire data, in more than 100 countries.

InsightRX is a cloud-based platform for precision dosing and clinical analytics. The InsightRX platform leverages peer-reviewed mathematical models, patient physiology, pharmacogenomics, drug concentrations, and biomarkers to optimize dose and treatment. Advanced mathematical models with Bayesian dose forecasting are applied to optimize a dose to reach and maintain a desired therapeutic range, ultimately to improved patient outcomes, reduction in adverse drug events, and increased cost savings.

LifeDojo is a human-centered platform that makes life changes possible for employees. Supported by public health research, the LifeDojo approach to employee-driven behavior change delivers lasting health improvement outcomes, high enrollment, and better engagement than traditional top-down wellness programs.On October 29th, 2020, LifeDojo was acquired by Ontrak. Terms of the transaction were not disclosed.

MyDealerOnline provides a digital product that allows car dealers to broker wholesale auto auction inventory straight from their websites. A B2B service developed as a tool for re-marketing vehicles, the company provides dealers with an inventory selection without increasing their working capital requirements or overhead availability and working directly with them.
Data Machine offers an online platform that runs an ad exchange program.

RO!RS is a sales and marketing company that offers the automation of business intelligence. The company collects information from various data sources including Google Analytics to give companies a better understanding of their customer.

Shipbooster, an international e-logistics provider, specializes in serving e-stores and multi-channel retailers. The Company provides shipping, order fulfillment and web-based management software for companies of all sizes.
BitKan (币看) offers bitcoin data and pricing services, and has an over-the-counter (OTC) bitcoin trading service.

Elementaree is a food delivery and recipes service combined with ideas of healthy food and time-saving. The user chooses a meal plan (special evening, healthy eating or supermarket substitution) and the service delivers the pack of sliced ingredients and instructions for the meal.

Paack is an e-commerce package delivery solution in Europe offering scheduled deliveries - same day and next day. All of the company's deliveries are scheduled in customer-chosen time slots, increasing the conversion, repetition and satisfaction of a company's customers.
Swappaholics operates a platform to swap a skill, product, or service.

Bibblio Learning is a plug-n-play, ad-free content recommendation engine to help quality publishers and content businesses keep users on their pages. Bibblio can help subscription platforms to gain and retain subscribers; B2B media to increase pages per session and dwell time; and learning and development platforms to boost motivation and reduce churn.
Tradeworks, fka Magick.nu, is a cloud-based automated software platform that enables traders to eliminate all the factors that hold them back in their day-to-day trading.

Cienaga's innovative threat-hunting-as-a-service, named DejaVu, is the easiest way for organizations to deploy world-class threat hunting and enhance existing cyber threat management capabilities. DejaVu is powered by Cienaga Systems' proprietary Genetically Engineered Cyber Security, an innovative technology which continuously learns to hunt for unknown cyber threats while deploying adaptive countermeasures that increase attacker costs and reduce success rate – all without the need for expensive configuration.

Badi is an online search that allows users to search for suitable roommates based on geography as well as compatibility. Badi applies machine learning technology to help with the flatmate matching process - learning from users of its platform, as they match and agree to become roommates and then feeding 'compatibility insights' back in to keep improving its recommendations.

FunNow is an instant booking app that helps locals to find new things to do in their cities. The company tailors its technology platform to local users and relies on a patented algorithm that makes real-time availability calculations to prevent overbookings by syncing with merchant databases. Users can see all available slots based on their location and search perimeters and view updates in real-time.

Zhoupu Data is a SaaS and BPaaS platform based on cloud computing and big data that is designed for supply chain and logistics services and solutions. The products include Zhoupu Cloud Assistant, Zhoupu Cloud Storage, Zhoupu Cloud Commerce, and others.

Provider of a mobile discovery application for venues. The company's app offers a curated selection of five bars, restaurants, and clubs near the current location of its user. One can filter by price, type of venue, and cuisine, and each profile comes with photos and videos.

Nous has developed a trading simulator, SparkProfit, that allows thousands of users to predict the price direction of a wide variety of instruments, such as bitcoin, international currencies, stock market indices, and commodities. Top performing predictors on the platform can then compete for weekly cash prizes.

Near.in is building an ecommerce marketplace for local services in India. The company helps users receive standardized services across home needs, skills (music and dance classes), events (birthday activities) and wellness (dietician, yoga).

Provider of an online platform for wedding services. The company provides a vendor aggregator platform for wedding services. It covers wedding decoration, catering, photograph and videograph, wedding makeup, and music entertainment.

MauKerja is an intelligent job matching recruitment engine that can be used by any company across all industries, leverage on the power of social network. MauKerja was built with the aim to improve the job hunting process and, with this self-learn intelligence, be able to help both the employers and jobseekers.

Sync Media is an Academic Social Network that involves intellectual community to obtain and exchange information pertaining to the school's activities in real time mode. Sync comprise of Digital Notice Board integrated with super targeted SMS Gateway. Its key activity is to assist schools or universities to disseminate related information effectively to targeted audience that focuses on education market.

ThreadLab is creating a convenient and customer-friendly clothing service available to man. The company focuses on business casual and casual wear in a wide range of affordable to mid-range price points. With an automated, scientific approach, ThreadLab can make the service more consistent, affordable and precise.
PetMe, founded in 2014, is a community platform offering pet sitting services.

Bauzaar is an eCommerce store for pet food and accessories. The service allows clients to directly plan the frequency to receive products, without repeating the order and payment every time. Experts also provide clients with advice on nutrition and general health.

WaynaBox offers consumers the possibility of making weekend trips all around Europe for just €150 (accommodation and flights included), to a destination that can't be chosen and won't be known until two days before departure.

SamBoat is a platform linking boat owners and tenants. The platform, which offers boats put online by private owners and recently by professionals, references more than 25,000 boats (sail and engine) of all sizes to rent. SamBoat also offers a tailor-made insurance service suitable for private hire of boats, as well as a concierge service to facilitate these rentals.connecting them with passionate sailors.
Inkbox provides temporary tattoos that last two weeks from an organic fruit-based formula.

Provider of websites that offer sports information to the users. The company operates Balls.ie that provides sports related information for sports fans, and theSlicedPan.com, which offers information and content for men and women in the areas of general entertainment, current affairs, humor, news, and nonsense. The company’s platform is also responsible across various desktop and mobile devices.
MealHi5 is an online restaurants listing portal where you find the best Indian, Mexican, Italian, Asian, Multi-Cuisine restaurants and order food, take-out or delivery online.
Chuangshu Education is an Internet education company that offers big data-powered self-study class solutions for mathematics.

Simplir is an anytime, anywhere engagement platform that handles all aspects of investor relations and communications, from fundraising to IPO. Its real-time messaging, reporting, compliance, shareholder document management and more.
WinUru is a stealth technology company.
Vino75 is a wine ecommerce company that combines technology and tradition. It today counts a catalog containing over 900 labels coming from 200 producers and a total of 37,000 subscribers.

thethings.iO allows businesses to connect their devices (wearables, homes and several industries) to the Internet so they can interact with other "connected things". The company's platform gives access to visualization and data analysis such as remote management of devices and interoperability between them.
De Advocatenwijzer is a Netherlands-based platform for finding lawyers. The company is independent, free and fast, offering reliable and updated legal information.
University Compare helps prospective university students find the right university via a collection of reviews, student advice and student articles.

Nuren Group is a content, community and commerce platform which includes Wedding.com.my, Motherhood.com.my and Nuren.sg. These websites follow the important journey of most women­ from getting married to entering motherhood. Nuren Group focuses on gathering related vendors and services under one roof to allow users discover inspirations, find suitable products and shop online.
360imprimir provides an online B2B printing service that bundles business' printing needs in order to fulfill printing orders in a cost effective manner.

Gamfi is focused in the field of gamification-based solutions. They boast the highest number of implementations in Poland, mainly in the field of marketing. The Company bases its products on the Gamfi platform and on the market demands of business customers, which allows for a shorter implementation time and lower risk of creating a non-validated product.

FunFotos not only manages, but also independently manufactures photo booths. It is the leader on the Polish market – it currently owns 100 photo booths. FunFotos's photo booths are modern devices that allow their users not only to take funny photos, but also share them with their friends on Facebook and Instagram. All photo booths are connected to the Internet, which allows to systematically monitor their status, ensuring that each device is fail-safe.

MyLED, a provider of the DOOH (Digital Out Of Home) LED screens market has created and developed a platform for consolidating the electronic advertising media market – in both the Indoor and Outdoor segments. The LED screens are integrated with an online platform for the implementation and management of marketing campaigns in real time. The platform is adjusted to the needs of media houses and advertising agencies. Until now, no LED screen owner has been able to meet such standards on its own, which has kept them out of nationwide campaigns. MYLED consolidates screen owners, allowing them to participate in a bigger purchasing group.
Greta develops a tool to analyze and improve site performance. Evaluate content delivery in real time and turn on P2P distribution when and where it matters.

Zank offers a financial solution to business schools, universities, clinics, motorcycle dealers, and other businesses to offer financing to their customers quickly, easily and paper-free, from any device and at any time.
Le Guide Noir is a SaaS company that provides a one-stop shop for social performance. Customers can manage all their social media activities on different platforms in one place with Le Guide Noir.
Progate is a web service that allows users to learn programming and improve their coding skills online.

Operators of an online marketplace to buy luxury and designer clothes, handbags, shoes, and accessories. The company's platform enables users to buy collections of pre-owned designer fashion from boutiques and professional luxury resellers in the United States.
Jobspire is a recruitment platform which helps in matching the right candidate with the right company with its differentiating feature 'manual and algorithmic curation'.

AIO&CO KOREA is a provider of competitive item sourcing & logistics solution services for crossborder eCommerce clients dealing with beauty products through its AFS (AIONCO Fulfillment Service), as well as YESBEE, a digital trading platform. Other services include drop-shipments, global wholesale, global logistics, image production, and OhhLive eMarketing.

Provider of a social network service (SNS) mobile application. The company provides a mobile application as an online platform for users to social and connect based on location based services (LBS). Its product allows users to search for tasks and requests submitted by other users, they are rewarded with cash upon completion of the task.

Cursos Totales is a lead generation platform for higher education. Essentially, Cursos Totales has built out the "most complete directory of university, graduate and postgraduate study opportunities as well as seminars, conferences and other shorter educational formats," for South and Central American educational institutions.
Disenia is a highly-curated design focused e-commerce website. The site features curated design and clothing products specifically for the customer looking to purchase.

Exploiter is a web-based programming education platform that places a particular focus on "ethical hacking." Exploiter, from what we can tell, is aimed more at the professional field, that is to say its users are more likely IT professionals, rather than first time hackers.
Hitsbook is a video engagement platform for brands and companies. The platform is similar to YouTube, in its simplicity, but offers several built in distribution and engagement tools for brands.
Incluyeme is a Latin America job search platform, aimed specifically at people living with disabilities.
La Musiquita is an online platform for music education. The platform focuses specifically on the guitar, and has on-demand lessons ranging from beginners level to expert level.
Mission Admission is an education platform. Mission Admission is a test-prep platform that prepares students for the Mexican CENEVAL test – essentially the Mexican equivalent of the SAT.

Nuvelar is a company that specializes in Digital Signage solutions. Nuvelar CMS is a cloud based Digital Signage Content Management System. This easy-to-use platform enables customers to deliver digital content to every screen they managed.
Ropanroll is an e-commerce marketplace to buy and sell gently used childrens' clothing.
SkydropX is a platform that connects local, independent delivery agents with small businesses that need last-mile pickup or delivery services in Latin America.
ThinkParametric is an education platform. ThinkParametric is focused on the architecture industry, and offers courses that focus on that cutting edge technology.
Uniko is an online wedding registry that allows couples to exchange received gifts for cash directly into their bank account.

Breezy streamlines the recruiting process, so modern teams can focus on hiring candidates faster, together. Breezy gives teams more time to connect with candidates by cutting out manual tasks like job posts, advertising, interview scheduling, and follow-ups. It includes all the tools they need to hire more efficiently, from employee referrals to real-time collaboration with structured feedback, to painless integrations with HRIS partners, Slack, and all the tools they're already using.

RightClinic, formerly known as TreatmentSaver, is a trusted marketplace allowing visitors to find and book the best laser eye surgery and cosmetic clinics throughout the UK. Run by doctors and with independent reviews and clear pricing, RightClinic helps consumers make the right choice.
ViiMed allows HCP's to build workflows that automate and coordinate interactions between patients and their care teams.

DOS Interactive, dba RedPolka, is a fashion and lifestyle e-commerce platform. RedPolka is a platform for product discovery for online shoppers, the portal showcases products curated from niche brands which have an online presence.

Skillenza helps companies hire engineers by offering an online platform for hackathons, coding challenge, assessment, networking, peer learning, community building, social connections and challenge-based rewards.
Meridian is the operator Ziddu.com, a Blockchain-empowered solutions provider that offers microfinance lending against collateralized warehouse receipts in the form of Ziddu Coins.
CBT Sports, dba 247Sports, offers an online trusted source for college football and basketball recruiting news.

Truelytics Ecomm operates icustommadeit.com, a platform that facilitates creation and retail of customized merchandise. It connects individuals seeking one-of-a-kind custom products to expert professional Creators from all over who can create exactly what they're looking for.

WeWearables plans to market and distribute the next generation of wearable health and wellness devices. The "wearables" mainly consists of tracking devices that are worn on the wrist, waist, ankle or shoe that tie to a smart phone to track and report on fitness and activity levels. WeWearables is targeting the next generation of devices that focus on smart, wearable products to help with specific diseases or solve direct healthcare issues. The human body is an untapped information source and consumers are looking for better ways to track and manage their health or improve their fitness or wellness. WeWearables is focused on the distribution of wearable products that target this industry.

Faircent is an online lending platform serving as a marketplace where potential lenders and borrowers can register and interact to strike deals on lending and borrowing. The top-line comes from charging an upfront fee once a deal is finalized for its services and facilitating the process. Faircent's features include a matchmaking technology to connect prospective borrowers and lenders as per their respective requirements, and an index of borrowers based on the purpose of the loan, amount, and tenure.
Healthians is an online platform that helps users discover affordable healthcare by providing accessible health test home services.

GetMyPeon is a local errand running service offering same day pick up and delivery. With a team of dedicated professionals, the company offers a reliable and affordable service that lets people outsource their daily chores and errands.

CodePicnic is a quasi-educational coding platform/environment that lets users play with code, right in the browser. Essentially, CodePicnic has built a new tool that eliminates the need for text and image based code/API/software walkthroughs.

Inkmonk is a full-stack merchandising platform which helps companies and brands create, manage and distribute merchandise to their audience. Inkmonk offers a platform for discovering new merchandise customizations and print vendors who will get the job done. Inkmonk also provides a distribution interface backed by an API.
CodeCloud is developing a website that helps adults learn how to code through social networking and gaming.
Execuvite is an online marketplace for enterprises with cross-functional projects that facilitates the engagment of multidiciplinary freelance teams.

Schelectric, dba CurrentDraw, is a web application that helps engineering companies to efficiently manage the procurement of numerous electrical components by integrating the electrical design environment with an online marketplace.
RoomFilla operates a platform that manages short term rentals for busy property portfolio owners.

Eventory, formerly Octesys, is a web application to help marketing managers of medium to large corporations improve the efficiency and performance of their external partnerships with our quantitative approach to assess and manage partnerships.

Truelytics Ecomm operates icustommadeit.com, a platform that facilitates creation and retail of customized merchandise. It connects individuals seeking one-of-a-kind custom products to expert professional Creators from all over who can create exactly what they're looking for.
BetterButter is an online social food discovery platform. The platform currently focuses on recipes, allowing users to create, share, discover, and appreciate recipes.

Door of Clubs is an online platform that connects student clubs and companies. The company provides an online platform for companies to search for student clubs at colleges across the country, send messages to club leaders, and schedule in-person and online-video meetings with clubs.

Edurio designs a toolkit for schools to carry out all of the ongoing improvement activities in one place. Edurio allows schools to collect feedback, carry out self-assessment, manage classroom observations and share best practices among teachers.
Oktoplus is a Brazil-based company offering a solution for management and monitoring of loyalty programs.

Congo, dba Lawbooth, is creating an online free market solution for the legal industry. Clients can schedule an appointment with an attorney in less than 60 seconds. By fusing accessibility with a user friendly interface and Colorado's top Defense and Business Attorneys, Lawbooth is taking the scary out of the legal process.

QiK Stay, formerly ZoZo Stay, is a growing network of affordable premium hotels. The company has its operations in Delhi, Gurgaon, Ghaziabad, Ludhiana, Chandigarh, Kanpur and Lucknow where it has partnered with over 30 hotels.

Shirsa Labs, founded in 2013, uses an online engagement platform called, "Planet of GUI", to entertain and educate children mainly in the age group of 6-13. The company offers a customized program in which every child undergoes a free assessment and is provided with a detailed report on his / her cognitive profile. This program is scheduled for kids to play 30 minutes a day and 3/4 times a week. A detailed quarterly report is sent to the parents to help them monitor child's progress on the platform.

Hitwicket is an online game that allows a user to play the role of a manager of a T20 cricket team and make all strategic decisions like setting line-ups, buying players from the auction, upgrading infrastructure, etc.

Gridspace is a conversational intelligence company that develops software to make complex interactions easy to understand by making them searchable, accessible, and organized. The company's mission is to clarify and elevate business communication. Gridspace was founded as a collaboration between SRI Speech Labs, the lab behind Siri, and a multidisciplinary team of engineers.
Mynewcar is a one stop shop for buying new cars and related services, easily and securely. Customers can compare, select and configure their car anytime and anywhere.

Foot Cardigan delivers socks to mailboxes all over the world every month. The company designs socks for men and women, and its Whippersnappers line is just for kids. Every month is a surprise - so customers never know what kind of socks they will get.

Stylofie, founded in 2015, is a beauty and wellness startup that offers a technology platform for discovery, comparison, reviews, payment and booking website, and mobile app for consumers. The company helps customers pick the beauty treatment of their choice, select their location and the salon they want to visit, choose a date and time according to their convenience, and book the services according to their needs.

AlayaCare is a provider of a cloud-based, home health care software that aims to clinical documentation, back-office functionality, client and family portals, remote patient monitoring, and mobile care worker functionality. Alayacare works with agencies to help them enable home care.
Furlocity is a pet accommodations website and online technology platform that enables pet parents to search, identify and book trusted pet boarding stays, veterinary services and pet-friendly hotels.

Greensbury Market is a farm-to-table e-commerce platform that procures and curates farm to table, organic meats and seafood for consumers. The company specializes in providing organic grass-fed beef, organic chicken, organic pork and sustainable seafood from their network of farmers and fisherman.

Infogym reinvents the gym experience with software. It features online training guides, complete with 3D animations showing the correct way to exercise and the effects thereof. It also allows users to create, follow, and tweak their own training program.

ConexED is a cloud-based platform for virtual student services and learning. It is based in Salt Lake City, Utah. ConexED’s cloud-based student engagement system allows students access to support services, instructional resources, and co-curricular opportunities. ConexED’s Campus Calibrate, an appointment management and reporting system, allows students to self-schedule for all on-campus and Cranium Cafe video meetings as well as register for online and offline orientation and workshops using the Classroom meeting space. Students can now access their school's student service personnel such as academic advisors, financial aid counselors, tutors, and instructors for all on-campus or online appointments using the ConexED video meeting platforms: Cranium Cafe or Classrooms.
OFIXU allows anyone who needs workspace, offices or meeting rooms - large or small, from days to weeks - to book it online instantly.

TheFork, formerly BestTables, gathers the opinions, notes and feedback from thousands of customers, so users know everything about each restaurant, and allows them to book online in seconds anytime, with instant confirmation and without wasting time or money on phone calls.

Getaway designs and operates "tiny house" rentals in rural areas just outside major cities. The company places their custom built homes, each between 160 and 200 square feet, on secluded land in wooded, natural landscapes and rents them out by the night to those looking to experience nature. Consumers reserve their "getaways" online and the company takes care of the details from start to finish.

Isivi is a job portal for young people. It matches the job offers to the candidates using matching algorithms. Because of matching the suggested offers to the candidates, the recruiters only receive those applications that match their requirements, which raises the quality of received applications and reduces the time needed for finding candidates, thus raising the efficiency of the recruitment process. For the candidates, the algorithm's biggest value is in shortening the time needed for finding an appropriate offer. Additionally, the portal provides its users with other services like a CV generator.

Bitsbox offers a way to teach kids how to program computers. The Bitsbox system has two halves. First, a website where kids as young as seven can program apps that run on real phones and tablets. Second, a monthly subscription box that arrives in the mail. Each month's box contains dozens of programming projects to keep kids engaged.
Instaread is a mobile app offering key takeaways and summaries of New York Times nonfiction bestsellers.

Slidebean is a presentation tool for startups and marketing teams to avoid wasting time and money on slide deck design. The company separates the content creation from the slide design and allows users to focus on what matters most while taking care of everything else automatically.
toBe Marketing is a provider of support services for digital marketing, marketing automation, and CRM.
NicheStreem is a music streaming platform.
Reachify transforms businesses by providing information they need before they even know they need it, so they never miss out on a prospect opportunity, customer retention or competitive shift, again.
Nourissh is a meal delivery service which specialises in providing customers with carefully balanced nutritious meals. Menus are approved by an in-house nutritionist before being prepared.
Enriched Schools focuses on providing high quality substitute staffing services to charter schools around the country.

myInterview offers a video interview platform that gives candidates the opportunity to pitch themselves for a job. myInterview uses video to encourage candidates to express their true personality, experience and qualifications and lets hiring managers identify the best hire while enjoying every minute.
BYLINED is an on-demand photo and customer engagement platform built to connect brands and businesses with their fans and customers for owned user-generated content.
SATORI is the developer of a marketing automation tool that provides solutions for lead generation, negotiation, and more.

Operator of an online matching platform for custom-tailored clothes. The company offers a portal which is designed to connect users with professional tailors to order tailor-made clothes as well as reform old clothes. It allows tailors to register directly to be included in the list on the platform.

Turnkey Lender offers AI-powered end-to-end lending automation for digital and embedded lenders. From origination and underwriting, to load servicing, debt collection, and reporting the company’s software can intelligently automate the entire lending process. The company supports numerous credit products out of the box – both commercial and consumer – on the same flexible no-code SaaS platform.
Roppen Transportation Services, dba theKarrier, operates a platform linking users to local mini-truck service providers.

Eyenalyze offers a platform that provides realtime profit analysis for busy restaurant owners. Eyenalyze's proprietary, patent-pending API retrieves daily updates from POS, Vendor/Supplier, Ingredient/Menu, Payroll, Credit Card, and Banking systems. Eyenalyze tools, accessible via web or mobile device, enable restaurants to optimize nearly all back-office operations, increasing gross and profit margins and creating a platform for success that is not often available to the small independent operator.

Printasquare, created by Purplefox, is an eCommerce platform for printing and image processing, enabling users to make and purchase posters, framed photos, photo albums, and collages of their social media images.

LawyerFair provides a curated marketplace for commercial legal services, matching legal needs of businesses with pre-approved lawyers. The platform is moving towards cognitive analysis of lawyers' value (not just price) and predictive analytics about potential outcomes and costs.
FacePeer is the developer of FaceHub, a real-time face-to-face communication platform for corporate video calls, and ViewHub, a web interview service.
Wit Program is a children's programming education brand that provides online and offline courses for both software and hardware.
Huonu Data provides data analysis mining services as well as systematic precision marketing solutions.

Provider of a shopping sharing website. The company provides a product recommendation platform for goods such as mobile communication equipment, digital entertainment, computer and hardware, household articles, personal care products, and accessories. The site combines customer reviews and professional evaluations to make shopping suggestions within customer's budget. It also provides links for people to directly purchase the item online.
OFIXU allows anyone who needs workspace, offices or meeting rooms - large or small, from days to weeks - to book it online instantly.

Provider of meeting venue booking service. The company provides an online platform for people to book both indoor and outdoor venues for meetings, parties, training, wedding, exhibition, or performance. The platform currently hosts more than 30,000 places across China.
Nitrio is bringing state of the art AI directly to sales teams with its first product: a way to help all reps sell more.
Part-up is the teamwork platform that enables anyone to organize without an organization.

PayMango brings power of internet and mobile to local businesses, allowing users to build a brand with effective marketing, reach and convenience with PayMango. PayMango Marketplace provides a platform to manage and market the customer base. With a seamless interface users can create campaigns and target them to customers.
Startupxplore is a startup funding community connecting all actors of the European startup ecosystem. The company's vision is a world with an open, fast and transparent startup financing system.
Gurugram Online Ventures, dba Marryinaweek, brings the age old Indian concept of 'Swayamvar' to life again - in the form of a web platform. Get the best response to a matrimonial profile in a week.

Arts & Analytics is a company dedicated to serving art & culture organizations. Using predictive analytics, the company shows clients how to grow attendance, attract top performers and exhibits, increase brand awareness and strengthen patron loyalty.
Embe is an ecommerce platform offering baby products, accessories and toys.

Entrenarme is a platform where people can find, compare and choose personal trainers and nutritionists. On October 30, 2019 Entrenarme was acquired by Mr Jeff, the terms of the agreement were not disclosed.

Kleeto, operated by Next Gen Paper Solutions, is a document management service that digitally secures documents. Kleeto collects physical documents, scans and digitizes it to make it available to personal accounts in a categorized manner- Insurance, Bank, Property, etc. It also stores the same documents physically in a high security warehouse, which can be delivered to the customer's doorstep on demand.

One Utility Bill offers a software that makes it easier to pay shared bills. The firm's software is designed to help tenants, landlords and letting agents by sourcing utility providers and allowing bills to be paid as part of an all-inclusive cost with rent.

Ignidata provides brands with in-depth market research from a mobile survey integration based on a 'pay with time' model, while also providing a monetization option for digital media content providers.
FindTheRipple is a real-time platform for brands, agencies and publishers to react at a timely moment and maximize engagement, leveraging predictions of trending content.

Burst Insights is a short-form social video research and intelligence company, that creates actionable insight on what branded video content consumers engage with on Instagram, Twitter Video and Vine. Burst Insights develops in-demand insight tools that leads to improved consumer engagement/spend in the era of short-form social video under 30 seconds.

Pixoneye provides predictive personalization of mobile users through image understanding technologies for the marketing, advertising and market insight worlds. Pixoneye harnesses the full potential of image understanding on mobile devices to provide the ultimate key to capture the consumer's ever-changing needs.

Powr of You is a personal data marketplace that helps people get paid for their data while staying anonymous. All the data already shared online is valuable to companies to understand consumer behavior and preferences so they can tailor both marketing and innovation efforts well. With Powr of You, users earn rewards with the revenue share model and get a service to actively manage their online presence.

Storesense develops analytics services based on passive Wi-Fi scanning that provides business value to retailers, shopping malls, event organizers, event venues, sponsors, and exhibitors. Storesense aims to provide actual business advice that helps clients address their business challenges.

Pageload is a transparent proxy that filters and optimizes JPEG, GIF, PNG, SVG, JS, CSS, SVG and lots of other static assets. Pageload provides users with a unique proxy host which sits between server and users and optimizes assets to speed up delivery and save bandwidth. Pageload also offers a product that transparently optimizes the user's ecommerce store, increasing the user's revenue by improving conversion, lowering running costs, and allowing the user's technical team to spend time on other tasks than website optimization.

Vuevent provides an app to discover the best music, theater, food or city experience events in a given town. The company currently serves 42 locations nationwide and internationally with almost 1 million events for users to discover. The service is available via the website and on the App Store and Google Play Store.
Osimis uses open source software to build collaboration tools for medical imaging. Its solution Lify simplifies the exchange and consultation of medical imaging studies.
Developer of an ecommerce platform for niche communities. (Keyword: Brand*)

Operator of an online platform for baby products. The company is an online retailer for baby products such as diapers, milk bottles, and laundry products. It is also a marketplace for moms to buy second-hand items.

Oilproject.org is a platform for e-learning free and accessible to anyone. Its objective is to disseminate digital culture and encourage the use of the Internet. A real virtual school non-profit organization, which operate more or less well-known personality in the industry in proactive manner.
Tallerator is a comparison service provider for mechanical workshops and budgets. The company helps users find reliable garages and the best prices in their respective area.

InteraCta provides an additional domain for broadcasters and advertisers to interact with the audience/market. InteraCta allows real-time Television Ad identification, which can then be followed by providing the End-User (Television Viewer ) with an incentivized offer to buy the product.
Washa is an online laundry and dry-cleaning service that picks up clothes and drops them off within 24 hours.

Neotrade Analytics distributes real-time data to traders and trading bodies. The company enables traders and individuals to receive and access real-time market data on their preferred programming language platform.

Samlino.dk is an all-sector price comparison platform that facilitates Danish customers to find the most cost-efficient alternatives for the services or products they are interested in. The portal provides users with the most updated and accurate information on the best offers regarding credit cards, loans, broadband, insurance funds, insurance, high interest loans, car loans and other similar.

Shark Wheel is a wheel company dedicated to making the most unique, innovative and technologically advanced wheels in the marketplace. Shark Wheel makes skateboard and longboard wheels, as well as complete boards. The Shark Wheel can be used for almost any application that uses a wheel.
Newstory is an online platform that works based on an algorithm which enables identifying woman's body shape and helps the customers to choose form-fitting clothes and matching accessories.

AD-Pure analyzes how environmental factors can affect an advertising campaign and provides the tools to adapt marketing campaigns to these factors. This allows customers to create new, more empathetic and effective communication strategies, taking advantage of local events such as rain or a football game.

Delivery Cube is a B2B technology driven logistics solution. The company combines its own in-house tech with a fleet of drivers to enable restaurants and take-outs to offers delivery without employing their own drivers and regardless of which channels food orders come from.
Geoblink provides a geospatial business intelligence solution for companies to make informed business decisions about their network of stores.
Opitrip is a comparison website for car and holiday rentals.

The Agent is a platform of intermediation between European brands and global e-tailers: bringing e-tailers turnkey sourcing and helping fashion brands to reach millions of new consumers. The company distributes collections on top fashion marketplaces (such as Zalando, Xiu, Lazada, Galeries Lafayette, Brandalley, Cdiscount, Rakuten, and eBay); and resells previous collections through a network of 50 flash sales partners around the world (such as including Brands4Friends, BigBrands, BuyVIP, Limango, OZSale, Stilago, Vente Exclusive, and Zulily).

My Finance Care Advisors, dba My Loan Care, is an online loans marketplace founded in 2013. It has tied up with banks and financial services companies to offer borrowers a digital platform to compare, select and apply for online loans for purposes such as housing, gold, personal etc.

Ningmengdou is committed to helping companies solve the two major supply chain problems of "high procurement costs" and "slow technological innovation" behind the lack of market competitiveness through supply chain empowerment, providing a full-service solution including information and technical services.

Global Edu4share (Edu4share) connects mentors, individual sellers and business sellers with students. It provides preparatory materials and mentorship for all Tier 1 competitive exams such as CAT, GRE, GMAT, JEE, AIPMT, GATE, UPSC and many more. It offers books (new and second hand), coaching materials, e-learning courses, personal notes (collective tips from students who have cracked particular exams) and consultation with students and alumni.
BeeCanvas is a whiteboard-based visual workspace and collaboration tool designed for businesses and artists.

FalconViz is a data collection, processing, and visualization company with a focus on drone-based services. Through commercializing research developed at King Abdullah University of Science & Technology (KAUST) and combining newly developed techniques (such as Photogrammetry) with long-standing methods (LIDAR), FalconViz addresses surveying and mapping needs and integrates autonomous UAS with 3D software to deliver fully integrated end-to-end solutions. Leveraging its international and local patent portfolio in UAV hardware, software, and design, FalconViz currently offers services in Aerial and Topographical Surveying, Construction Monitoring, Architecture Visualization, Volumetric Assessment, Culture Heritage Documentation, and more.

GripeO is a website and mobile application available to both consumers and businesses which improves the way people complain. Consumers can conveniently submit product or service complaints from their mobile or PC. Business use GripeO to mediate complaints, identify systemic problems, and improve customer service. Ignored gripes are moved to the GripeO "Complaint Marketplace" where competitive businesses can purchase the complaint in an ad-market style and use GripeO to convert new business. To this end, GripeO will be a model capable of collecting complaints and leveraging third party API's to successfully monetize complaint data on the internet.

HW Wellness Solutions, dba True Elements and dba HealthyWorld, is a wellness solutions company with a mission to make the world a healthier place. True Elements offers a range of snacks and natural supplements through its website and other online marketplaces. The company's wellness solutions portal, HealthyWorld, offers health advisory content besides marketing and selling health and wellness products and services on the platform.
CBS is an IoT product platform based company that helps in fetching data from different devices and sensors and provide smart solutions in accordance with business needs.
Corporate360 offers cloud-based marketing data software for B2B marketers. Corporate360 products are used by over 300 global customers including Dell, HP and VMware.

RanBill Music, dba TweelX, is a music publishing platform as well as a tool for artists and writers to achieve career breakthroughs while monetizing their music in a revolutionary way. The company provides a mechanism to effortlessly participate in music publishing. To writers and artists, TweelX provides a way to pierce traditional barriers of entry and to breakthrough in an increasingly competitive market. To both groups, TweelX provides exciting new ways to experience success and make money.
Grouvly is a Hong Kong-based social club that matches up groups for drinks.

Loop88, dba Pinbooster, is an influencer advertising platform for Pinterest, offering agencies and advertisers an organic approach to generating traffic. Pinbooster identifies top influencers on Pinterest and buckets them by various categories and interests. These influencers are made available to brands for "sponsored" content pins, much in the same way brands have utilized celebrity spokespersons in other channels for decades.
Kepler Analytics provides analytical insight to physical retail managers to improve customer experience.

OurHood is dedicated to building stronger and better-connected neighborhoods throughout South Africa and beyond. OurHood is an online platform designed to facilitate conversations between neighbors. It provides a simple and user-friendly way for you to get the most out of the community in which you live.

Inventive Business Promotions owns and operates online platform for art and craft goods, World Art Community. The startup enables artists, craftspersons and designers to create their own online stores and sell their creations. It charges 10 per cent commission on every successful transaction through its platform.
Geoblink provides a geospatial business intelligence solution for companies to make informed business decisions about their network of stores.

CRM Software, dba Junxure, makes office management software for the financial services industry. The company's flagship product, Junxure, and its suite of related products, are designed to help financial managers to grow, manage, and enhance their advisory businesses.

Zenatix Solutions provides an energy management analytics platform that helps building managers save on their energy cost using intelligence from real-time data. The company's product is a combination of hardware and software, where the hardware includes energy meters, temperature/humidity sensors and a controller. These are used to capture data, which are then transferred to a cloud server. The data is then processed and through a dashboard, building managers are provided an analysis of energy consumption levels in real time. The Zenatix dashboard also offers alerts via SMS and email whenever there are deviations in consumption levels.
Cognotion teaches students another language and career skills through story-telling, using online video narratives, gamification features, live simulation, and social media tools.

AcademicMerit is a developer of a suite of online professional-development, assessment, instruction, and learning solutions - solely focused on reading and writing in grades 6-12 - that provides schools with a much-needed bridge from simply being informed about the Common Core State Standards to actually implementing them.

Pipefy is a cloud computing company that provides a BPM (Business Process Management System) for small and midsize businesses on a subscription basis. It helps companies to be organized and more productive by running their processes and day-by-day routines on an easy and intuitive tool, making them leave inefficient manual forms, spreadsheets and emails.

Prozo, owned and operated by Global Edu4Share, is a search engine where students can buy resources such as books, e-learning content, coaching material and personal notes. It also offers a feature where aspirants can seek guidance through peer-to-peer mentorship programmes from students who have cleared these exams. Inbuilt ratings, reviews mechanism and blogs are also available on the platform.

Besepa has developed a technology platform that helps companies simplify direct debt management. Connected to Spanish banks, the company's services include mandate management (e-sign, custody, etc), direct presentation to banks, recurrence, support for SEPA schemes (CORE, COR1 and B2B), error notifications, cloud integration, etc.
LovePop creates intricate paper art greeting cards that pop. The company offers cards for special occasions, holidays, and many other card gifting occasions.

EZ Waves is a software as a service company that provides a comprehensive, online booking and reservation system for boat charters and excursions. Consumers can book boating trips in real-time, similar to booking an airline ticket online, using the company's proprietary, interactive scheduling software. The software provides captains the ability to manage their businesses with customized web sites, real-time schedulers, financial reporting tools, credit card processing abilities and full mobile capabilities.

Homigo focuses on bridging the gap between the demand of liveable houses and the supply houses available on rent in an organized manner. The Company takes up houses on rent from owners and turn them into 'Homigo Houses' by furnishing them with all relevant items and appliances. Besides furniture and electronics, the startup also takes care of minor household objects like cutlery, utensils etc., and management of electricity, Internet and other services, to make it convenient for people to move into new homes.

BreezoMeter is a provider of air quality data. BreezoMeter uses AI and machine learning to gather and understand data from multiple sources — including more than 47,000 sensors worldwide. The result is street-level air quality resolution (within 5 meters), and pollen, pollutants and fire data, in more than 100 countries.

HomeCanvasr is a real estate internet company founded in 2013. HomeCanvasr provides a marketplace for agents, homeowners, and buyers to interact in a private setting by leveraging real-time buyer data to gain access to properties 'off the beaten path'.

MyIndianStay, founded in 2012, provides a unique experience to those travelling in India by offering accommodation in villas, homestays, guest houses and apartments. The company's platform has features like Smart Lock Integration which allows the traveler to unlock the property using her/his smartphone, Host-Guest Interaction Platform that provides a transparent communication channel to both the host and the guest, and Local Accommodation Discovery Tool, a mobile app which will allow a traveler to discover and book unique accommodation options in the nearby vicinity after reaching the destination.

doDOC automates regulatory documentation for the enterprise. The platform helps users by deconstructing documents into their basic elements, which allows the creation, gathering, and management of granular information regarding the progress of a document.On March 19th, 2021, doDOC was acquired by Envision Pharma Group. The terms of the transaction were not disclosed.

EvREwares are designed to stick onto any article of clothing; stick a funny tie on your favorite t-shirt, or wear a humorous bowtie to that office christmas party. The company offers fabric stickers that are re-usable clothing accessories.

Good Done Great (GDG) creates philanthropy platforms for donors, ranging from individuals to Fortune 500 companies, to give back to the communities and causes they care about. Good Done Great customizes employee engagement and corporate philanthropy platforms for global brands, delivering targeted and measurable impact. More than 800,000 employees rely on GDG's innovative tools and more than 60,000 non-profits benefit from Good Done Great's broad philanthropic reach.

Noene are high-tech insoles, made using a revolutionary material capable of absorbing and dispersing the shockwaves generated when people run, walk and jump.On September 16th, 2020, Noene was acquired by Foot Solutions, terms of the transaction were not disclosed.

Rent Like a Champion is focused on allowing attendees at collegiate sporting events to rent homes from local homeowners. The company appeared on Shark Tank in November 2015 and agreed on the show to a deal from Chris Sacca and Mark Cuban for $200k investment for 10% of the company (Shark Tank deal consummation uncertain so not reflected on their profile)

Windcatcher Technology designs and manufactures inflatable outdoor and travel gear products, which use patented rapid inflation technology to allow them to inflate in seconds, without any power or pumping. Combined with its ability to also allow inflatables to deflate and pack-up in seconds, the company believes that the Windcatcher valve will become the standard for all inflatable products. Windcatcher inflates over 10x faster than a standard air pad without using power or pumps. Take it camping, to the beach, or to the office for power nap.

CBREX is a global recruiter exchange. It uses AI to connect employers (posting jobs) to specialist recruiting firms (agencies). It enables the hiring of anyone, anywhere on terms which are employer-driven.
7tons studio is a game creator that has developed and launched Exowar, a multiplayer online game for mobile and social platforms.

Antlos is an online platform that connects tourists and travelers with skippers who own and operate private marine vessels. Using Antlos, tourists can find boat captains who will provide access to their vessel while also sailing the ship to an agreed upon destination or destinations, typically in and around the Mediterranean Sea and Caribbean Sea. Some skippers offer all-inclusive trips with amenities like lodging and food.

Skillaz is a platform for online recruitment that enables employers to evaluate candidates using video interviews, questionnaires, and other assessment tools. Users can record video resumes and video interviews to make themselves more attractive to employers.

KisanHub is a cloud based enterprise software platform that connects agronomic and operational data to enable corporate agribusinesses to make more data based decisions. The suite of applications can fit around the enterprise's needs with the key operational and agronomic data being shared throughout the platform.

Carmen Automotive is an automotive data analytics company that produces predictive, real-time data measuring automotive metrics like battery life, fault codes, fuel efficiency and mileage. The data is fed to drivers and repair centers to alert them about potential problems before they happen.

Eigen Innovations provides software solutions for the Industrial Internet. The company's software algorithm leverages ‛big data' information from industrial equipment and, based on the algorithm's optimization capability, provides control input into the key devices that operate the manufacturing process.

GroupGifting.com provides eGifter, which enables consumers to purchase eGift cards from over 100 major brands, give them to their Facebook friends, inviting others to contribute, making it a group gift. The service is available on Apple iOS, Android and the web. The company also offers MyGiftWand, a mobile app for Android on the Google Play app store. Direct Match's mission is to create a fair and transparent marketplace for US Treasuries. Buy-side and sell-side institutions will be able to trade side-by-side, enabling greater price discovery and qualitative improvements in execution. Banks make $100 billion every year for bond trading, but the transaction is made through an intermediary that takes a cut. Unlike the stock market, the bond market doesn't have a centralized system where traders can plainly see the fees involved in the trade. Direct Match eliminates the middle man.

ReadMe makes it easy to keep documents up-to-date and has community-oriented features that help drive adoption.

Qventus uses a hospital's data along with proprietary external data signals to help managers proactively manage day-to-day operations.
