Qventus' algorithms analyze hospital data along with important operational and clinical metrics, allowing hospital staff to both monitor operational performance and automatically diagnose operational issues in real-time. In addition, Qventus' machine-learning based forecasting techniques enable hospitals to predict patient volumes and optimally allocate resources – such as staff, beds, and rooms – to meet this demand. These insights are delivered to staff in the workflows with which they are already accustomed.

Smarking – Enterprise SaaS For Parking. Companies in the parking market price their services and staff purely based on intuition, leaving money on the market. Smarking's system lets them accurately track supply and demand so parking lots can optimize their businesses and boost revenue. While it might seem boring, parking is a massive market with no modern analytics infrastructure.
WorkLife offers a web and mobile application for meetings.
Cribspot is an online platform for college students and property managers that streamlines finding and leasing off-campus housing.
Kickpay is a marketplace for buying and selling invoices.
Pushmote offers a content management platform that makes it simple to implement and manage all iBeacon interactions.
TaskPipes assists SaaS applications talk to one another by ensuring that data passed between various platforms is understandable by both.
Giveffect builds software for nonprofits, wanting to become the "donate" button for the world.

The Human Utility is a platform aiming to increase water affordability for all families in the United States through crowdfunding, community-building, and policy action. The organization currently helps in Michigan and Maryland.
Pachyderm offers data analytics for Docker, helping companies fully utilize what containerization has brought to the technology space.

Akido Labs is a third-party service that helps health IT app developers simplify the process within each hospital records system. Akido Labs essentially provides the "technical plumbing" for health IT apps by working with each individual hospital to build a standardized API layer around each system so the developers don't have to.
Bonfire is a full-service request for proposal management. Bonfire manages all the RFPs for a business, determining which offer is best.
Pakible helps companies design and order their physical packaging online.
Trackin offers food delivery software. It provides an online ordering system, analytics dashboard for managers, and a mobile app for employees.

LogDNA is a cloud-based log management system that allows engineering and DevOp teams to aggregate all the system and application logs into one platform. LogDNA allows its users to save, store, tail, and search application logs in real time from a simple command-line or web interface.

Avail's online tools, education, and support help landlords find and screen tenants, create leases, collect rent online and more.On December 16th, 2020, Avail was acquired by Realtor.com, terms of the transaction were not disclosed.

DataCamp is an online data science school that teaches core R programming and data science skills through video lessons and interactive coding challenges. With hands-on data analysis courses and R tutorials on Data Handling, Data Visualization, Reporting, Machine Learning, and Statistical Modeling, members get the hands-on experience they need to begin a real-life project.
Goods of Record is an online marketplace for artisan men's goods, made only in America.

Iris is an immersive design and presentation tool that sends 3D models into virtual reality; the company is creating software that will revolutionize how people build and share digital spaces. The company believes that stereoscopic visualizations should be accessible and mainstream.
Keymetrics provides multiple softwares like Performance Application Manager and Pro Active Monitoring System to help developers and businesses become successful with Node.js technology.

Localize helps translate websites with one line of code. With Localize, customers get enterprise-grade reliability but also the simplicity and ease of a consumer app. After pasting the company's code into a website (more platforms on the way!), the library detects content and routes it to a translator automatically - then, with a single click, the deployment is live.
LSQ is a rapid software development platform for Node.js.

Spoon University is a content-sharing network of student publications on campuses nationwide focused on eating in college. Each chapter contributes original content to the network-recipes, restaurant reviews, food news, events and resources-created by students, for students, with an emphasis on simplicity and quality.On November 21, 2019, Spoon University was acquired by Her Campus Media. The terms of the agreement were not disclosed.
Unique Sound, founded in 2014, is a marketplace that helps brands, ad agencies, and video producers to get original and affordable music directly from composers.
New Story aims to create life-changing stories that transform communities. The company connects donors with homeless families around the world to create life-changing stories.

Eden provides a full-stack solution for office management. Eden's web platform provides a marketplace for third-party vendors to connect with businesses for various services like cleaning, handy work, and more.

Telespine is an online system of care accessible via phone, tablet or computer – The Telespine program is simple, easy to do, highly effective and costs 96% less than traditional care. Telespine provides personalized treatment through web-based content, streaming video exercises and online consults with our LBP specialists. The Telespine program guides patients through a proven step-by-step process to improve their back health.
AdmitHub optimizes the admissions process for students, counselors and colleges.

doDOC automates regulatory documentation for the enterprise. The platform helps users by deconstructing documents into their basic elements, which allows the creation, gathering, and management of granular information regarding the progress of a document.On March 19th, 2021, doDOC was acquired by Envision Pharma Group. The terms of the transaction were not disclosed.
LovePop creates intricate paper art greeting cards that pop. The company offers cards for special occasions, holidays, and many other card gifting occasions.
Mentor Collective partners with universities to design, manage, and assess programs that give all students access to a relevant near-peer mentor.

ThriveHive makes marketing simple and effective for small businesses. The company offers a platform to drive and measure all online and offline marketing efforts. ThriveHive helps assess, build, measure and run marketing to help users drive more leads.
Kwambio is a platform for creating unique, personalized products on 3D printers.

Classics&Exotics brings the "sharing economy" into the car enthusiast's garage, allowing classic and exotic car enthusiasts to now offset their car ownership costs by renting their cars to pre-screened, highly qualified renters.
GearBrake is a universal, easy to install brake light module that can detect when a vehicle is slowing and automatically light the brake lights, reducing the risk of rear-end collisions by up to 90%.
Motoroso combines content, community, and commerce for automotive enthusiasts to help them discover, connect, and buy everything that powers their lifestyle.
My Dealer Service empowers automotive service departments with digital connectivity and workflow management, elevating efficiency and creating an unprecedented customer experience.

treev is the fastest way to access and share all work in the cloud (e.g. Dropbox, Box, Google Docs, Trello). treev helps people cut through the noise at work. In modern companies employees spend most of their day in web apps like Google Drive, Trello, Salesforce and many more, which individually are great tools. treev becomes "Spotlight" for the cloud.

Eversports is a booking engine for sport venues. The company provides sport venue operators with a free booking tool, where they charge a small surcharge for each booking that is processed online. Online booking with offline payment are provided free of charge. The booking engine is aggregated on the central Eversports platform, that acts as a marketplace where visitors can find the best places to book sport venues in the cities covered.
Preply is a marketplace for in-home and online tutoring. The company helps students find fit with tutors to achieve goals.

Contactable is a online database and CRM designed for PR. Contactable have analysed over 3,000 publications and 2 million articles to understand what 50,000 journalists like to write about. This database helps companies identify journalists they should reach out to. Companies can then manage their relationships with a CRM designed for PR.

Sidestage is a marketplace for discovering and booking local musicians for business and private events.Sidestage helps people find amazing musicians for their own events, such as weddings, corporate events or private parties. Customers connect with musicians, confirm booking details and pay – all through Sidestage's trusted platform.

Platfarm is a software as a service company servicing agricultural cooperatives. By leveraging cutting edge software technology, Platfarm enables agriculturual cooperatives to collect, communicate, analyze and report information. This includes actionable data insights, which results in increased productivity and efficiency of agricultural production.

Stagelink enables musicians, presenters and fans to create and experience valuable and inspiring live performances. As an online booking tool Stagelink revolutionizes the way concerts are created and makes the live music market more efficient, more profitable and more fun. Stagelink aggregates and generates information about artists and presenters individual stylistic profiles as well as fan interest and demand to match the right fans with the right bands and the right venues at the right time for sold-out concerts with no risk - serving everyone's main purpose: great music.On November 13th, 2020, Stagelink was acquired by Influry. The terms of the transaction were not disclosed.

Akdemia is a software as a service company that is servicing private schools in developing countries. Akdemia is an online service that lets schools manage all school processes and communicate them to pupils and parents.
BlazingSQL offers a GPU-accelerated SQL engine built entirely on top of RAPIDS.ai.

Borrowing Magnolia is refashioning the way the modern woman does the wedding dress. By offering a managed rental service between dress owner and renter, Borrowing Magnolia offers an affordable, simple solution for brides seeking the perfect dress at a discount and for women interested in monetizing their wedding gown.
flytedesk is a platform for buying and selling uncollected media, starting with college newspapers.
hobbyDB allows users to take an interactive trip into who made what, when, where and much more, allowing them to research, reminisce, manage their collections and buy/sell.
MadKudu offers data science that helps sales and support teams fight customer churn. The company analyzes the behavior of a company's customers to find out the most important drivers of engagement.
TRELORA is a commission-free real estate company, replacing percentage-based commissions with one flat fee.
Garage Labs Technologies, dba Cupick, is a social network that helps artists monetize their artwork.
Authbox, dba Smyte, is an online security company that offers a trust and safety platform used by many P2P marketplaces and social apps to combat spam, scam, online harassment and credit card fraud.

Cymmetria is a cybersecurity company focused on deception technology. Cymmetria's deception products, MazeRunner and ActiveSOC, give organizations the ability to hunt attackers, detect lateral movement inside the perimeter, automate incident response, and mitigate attacks. The company also offers deception as a service, enabling organizations to customize deception technologies for their business environment.
Roomblocker is a new way to book and manage group reservations at hotels. The company brings people together during special times in their lives - for personal events, for work, or just for fun.
BlueCrew is a temporary staffing agency for service jobs from warehouse workers to produce pickers and packers to data entry personnel, employing workers as W2 employees.

FEM is a media technology company that delivers engaging, relevant video experiences for any website or applications. The company delivers high performance content recommendations to a diverse audience.

Little Star Media, dba Littlstar, is a global network dedicated exclusively to virtual reality, 360 video, and immersive experiences. The company delivers a multi-platform solution for content owners and brands to distribute 360 and VR content, and provides consumers a place to discover, watch, and share the best content on VR devices like Samsung Gear VR, its native mobile apps, and the web.
StatMuse is developing an artificial intelligence platform to help sports fans explore data using simple, natural language.

AkoubaCredit provides lenders an algorithmic underwriting platform that reduces the cost and time required for banks to issue a small business loan. The platform, customized to each lender's underwriting principles, allows small businesses to apply and track their application electronically, with results delivered within 48 hours.

Glidera is a wallet funding service that enables users to purchase bitcoin via their bank accounts and send the funds to the wallet of their choice. Wallet developers can use the company's API to integrate Glidera's digital currency conversion capability into their digital currency wallets and applications in just days, while Glidera handles all of the compliance, banking, liquidity, and fraud challenges. Glidera never holds customer funds and is specifically built to work with any secure bitcoin wallet.
Growth Geeks is a marketplace for growth hackers and marketers. The company makes it easy to discover and hire freelance marketing professionals to grow a business, on a hourly or project basis.

Lightstream is a live streaming studio in the browser. Lightstream aims to build software that empowers more storytellers and grows the communities in which they tell them.On April 12th, 2021, Lightstream was acquired by Vitec Group. The terms of the transaction were not disclosed.

Specless unlocks the potential of advertising creative with richer, more effective advertising experiences that run anywhere imaginable. For publishers, Specless provides the freedom to easily test and deploy higher value custom ad formats. For advertisers and agencies, Specless means managing fewer creative assets, yet more flexibility to run campaigns in any type of media.

Tribe PM makes it easy to get anything done with anyone, from anywhere, at any time. Tribe PM works naturally in emails, text, and chat so that coworkers, clients, and contractors can stay coordinated working in their tool of choice.

Willing (legal name Bequest, Inc) offers an online tool that helps users create a will or living will in minutes. The company also offers a platform that lets users find and compare costs for funeral homes and cemeteries.On November 20, 2019 Willing was acquired by MetLife, the terms of the agreement were not disclosed.

GiveCampus is a social fundraising and engagement platform. GiveCampus blends crowdfunding, peer-to-peer fundraising, and social networking to make philanthropy more social, more interactive, and more fun.
Interviewed aims to help employees make better hiring decisions. The company's job simulations test aims to show how hiring managers evaluate skills and resumes so that users can improve.

ThinAir is an intelligent security platform built to allow everyone in the enterprise -- administrators and employees alike -- to take control over their most sensitive data in a way that enhances, not hinders, productivity. Taking a new approach to security based on machine-driven patterns, the ThinAir platform offers a revolutionary set of automated protection capabilities and alerts to keep data safe and under control.

Jopwell is a career platform that helps Black, Latino/Hispanic, and Native American students and professionals unlock opportunities for career advancement, not only when looking for a job but at all career stages.
Zeplin offers a collaboration app for UI designers and front-end developers.
Triplebyte helps engineers find work at fast-growing companies, basing employment off of coding tests and not off of resumes.

CareLedger aims to provide workers with free medical care. CareLedger works by choosing a physician from the startup's list, based on location or convenience and then scheduling a visit for that procedure. CareLedger doesn't send a bill after and all medical help is free to the patient.
Fort Awesome is a subscription service for website creators that lets users access tons of great icon sets, upload custom icons, and serve up just the icons sites need from its global CDN.
GO1 is a software platform that allows users to train staff or customers. Users can quickly create their own courses or use one of the existing courses in its growing marketplace.

Tenant Turner streamlines the rental process from leads to lease by listing rentals on all the major rental sites; pre-qualifying prospects via web, phone, and email; and scheduling showings when you're available. All from one centralized dashboard.

The Mimir platform is a cloud-based tool that may reduce the overhead it takes to teach a computer science course. The platform is capable of grading projects, checking for plagiarism and providing detailed analytics in an automated fashion.On December 17, 2019, Mimir was acquired by HackerRank. The terms of the transaction were not disclosed.
ROSS Intelligence is bringing artificial intelligence technology solutions to the legal world. ROSS is a platform that helps legal teams sort through case law to find details relevant to new cases.

Human Interest offers an easy and affordable 401(k) retirement plan for the modern workforce. The company empowers all businesses, no matter their size, to safeguard the financial futures of their employees.

Ironclad is an automated assistant that manages legal paperwork for companies. It is one organized Dropbox folder for all legal documents, along with automated templates for NDAs, sales contracts, and contractors.
ShotPut helps small- to medium-sized businesses with their logistics challenges, based on what works for the companies.
AtCipher offers cloud security and zero-knowledge key management solutions.
Brand.ai provides an automatic maintainable UI components style guide.
Candy Jar operates an online candy store.
DataBlade offers web-based development environment for data analysis.

Giftbit, formerly Kiind, specializes in digital gift card campaigns for enterprise clients. Giftbit allows clients to hang onto money from unredeemed cards so that they don't lose that cash when they offer gift credits as part of promotional campaigns.

Gamesight empowers publishers to build strong communities, engage the right influencers, and effectively measure marketing performance. Users can get full-funnel insights into all the ways players discover and engage with games.
Lightboard offers graphic design on demand.
Matcherino is an eSports engagement platform based in Seattle. Matcherino is building a platform that promotes streamers while giving fans the ability to discover and fund matches they want to see.

Ziibra provides a subscription service for creative artists. The company's subscription-style model lets users choose from four levels of support - follower, fan, backer, and patron. Each level has different exclusive rewards that lets users receive directly from the artist in return for contributing to their career.
Cashforce provide a cash forecasting and working capital analytics platform focused on automation and data integration.
Chainalysis is a blockchain analysis company. Chainalysis provides compliance and investigation software to banks, businesses, and governments around the world.
Wave creates a safer, faster and more advanced electronic Bill of Lading for the shipping and transportation industry.
Remesh is an audience intelligence platform for engaging and understanding large groups of people, whether it be employees, consumers, or constituents.
Seeds builds micro-lending into games, converting free users into paying customers through an ad surfacing during the game.
firstAI, formerly Syndicated Loan Direct, provides transactional research for the syndicated loan industry, serving banks, law firms, asset managers and PE firms.
Rangeforce is a cloud-based platform for developing, selling, and executing live, hands-on cyber trainings on real systems, ultimately creating a marketplace for security trainings.
Wayerz offers a fully integrated digital platform that allows banks and their corporate clients to optimize their international wiring processes.
SimpleMoney, formerly Prayas Analytics, operates a portfolio tracker that tracks all investments automatically, using the statements in emails.

Scentbird is an e-commerce company that has created a discovery and sampling engine for scented beauty products (e.g., perfumes, home fragrance, bodycare). Scentbird eliminates the uncertainty of purchasing fragrances online by combining a visual fragrance recommender with a risk-free, at-home sampling program.
JCKM, dba Bizzy, seeks to democratize marketing – so that even a one-person shop has the ability to be heard by their target audience.
Fountain enables companies to quickly screen and hire independent workforces - all the background checks, document signing, scheduling, city management - in one simple dashboard.

Foxpass increases an organization's server and network security by ensuring employee accounts have access only to what they need. The company's cloud-hosted LDAP and RADIUS systems help bring best-practices to infrastructure.

Cboe Vest is an independent registered investment advisory firm that specializes in protecting investors from market losses. Through its intuitive online platform, everyday investors can affordably custom-tailor their investments with downside protection, upside caps, as well as inverse, leverage, and income strategies.
Instawork makes it easy for small businesses to hire quality workers quickly. The company sources, qualifies, and matches candidates so users can spend their time managing their business.

Paribus is an online price tracker that allows users to make online purchases without worrying about comparison shopping or price drops. Paribus automates the process of following up on past purchases to see if shoppers can request a refund from the online retailer, helping online shoppers get automatic refunds when prices drop on items they purchased. Paribus integrates with the user's email provider and scans their inbox for receipts of online purchases, and then watches the item for a price drop within the store's price match claim window. The service works with a number of online retailers.
Chaldal develops an on-demand grocery delivery platform and is based in Bangladesh.
TetraScience develops a system that uses both hardware and software that allows researchers to remotely monitor and control their instruments, and automatically logs their data in the cloud.

Tesorio is a cash flow performance platform that helps finance teams better manage, predict and collect cash. Tesorio's cash flow performance platform applies machine learning to key financial data to help customers with accounts receivable automation including smart workflow tools, predicted pay dates, and automated collections forecasting.

PlateJoy creates a uniquely personal experience for each user by curating delicious meal options for their weekly menus based on health goals, lifestyle and dietary preferences. Users select breakfast, lunch, dinner, snack and dessert choices for the week. Online grocer partners (currently Whole Foods and Peapod) deliver the necessary ingredients to prepare these meals to the customer's doorstep. PlateJoy sends along beautiful, step-by-step recipe infographics with visual instructions for preparing each meal. Breakfast and lunch are ready in under 10 minutes and dinners in under 30.
The Ticket Fairy runs a complete event marketing platform that helps event organizers quickly and efficiently reach more attendees to fill up empty seats.
Xendit operates as a payment gateway for Indonesia, the Philippines and Southeast Asia. The company provides digital solutions that aim to help companies accept and send payments via APIs.

Drip Capital is building an online solution to offer timely and founder-friendly small business loans nationwide. Drip Capital evaluates its loans by looking at the orders that small businesses have yet to fulfill, and providing the money needed to fulfill them.

Canary Computer Corporation, dba Appcanary, has built a service to allow operations teams of all sizes to make intelligent decisions about how to secure their infrastructure and the threats that affect them, without having to constantly monitor the ever-expanding infosec landscape themselves.
Branch8 offers e-commerce sellers access to a single platform that lets them list their products across a wide swath of e-commerce sites.

Sywork lets artists and illustrators host a livestream video of themselves at work, in the same way that Twitch lets people watch broadcasts of gamers in action. Sywork is attracting an audience of thousands of viewers from more than 115 countries around the world.

bitcodin encodes videos 100x faster and provides higher quality output than any other encoding service. This is great for developers and video content companies in terms of time to market as well as user experience. The output format plays everywhere on every device with low startup delay, with no buffering. Therefore, cutting edge streaming standards such as MPEG-DASH are used, which is the major format of providers such as Netflix or YouTube.

Convox aims to make AWS itself as easy to use as Heroku -- and five times cheaper. In 10 minutes, Convox allows users to configure and scale storage, servers, containers, load balancing, network security, and database on top of AWS without an ops team.

Second Measure promises to bring some clarity to the process of analyzing companies and their success. Through partnerships with proprietary data providers, Second Measure has built a software platform that analyzes billions of consumer purchases to provide valuable insight into the sales and growth rates of public and private companies.On December 24th, 2020, Second Measure was acquired by Bloomberg. Terms of the transaction were not disclosed.

Plate IQ develops restaurant management software. The Plate IQ platform transforms back-office operations with accounts payable automation, food costs analytics, bill pay, inventory and recipe costing tools solutions for the restaurant industry mostly focus on the front of the house.
VOIQ develops AI-powered software to run the entire sales call channel.

Call9 provides Emergency Medicine without brick and mortar limitations. Call9 humanizes telemedicine by connecting on-site multi-disciplinary clinical care specialists to remote physicians, delivering care to patients at their bedside in nursing homes and rehabs. The company's embedded care model approach is a replacement of 911 and subsequent hospitalizations and readmissions, lowering healthcare costs, while improving care outcomes.
DigitalTangible, dba Serica, is a healthcare payments platform.
Leada is an online training course that teaches professionals data science.

Vernox Labs analyzes unstructured data from construction projects to figure out how to sidestep building errors. Construction projects generate a ton of data across many dimensions, which is kept for audit reasons. Patterns of repeated mistakes are buried in this data, and Vernox Labs uses that data to give recommendations that are tailored to new projects.

Traversal Networks develops a new form of Network Intrusion Detection System designed to catch unknown threats. The company's Lateral Threat Detector appliances are easily installed on corporate networks. These analyst-assisted sensors learn traffic patterns on different network segments and detect lateral exploitation, backdoors, bots, malware, and network reconnaissance.

Gigster is a smart software development service that combines developers and designers with automation tools to make the process of software development more efficient and scalable. Gigster's network of freelance software developers, engineers, designers and product managers provides Fortune 500 companies and enterprise clients with access to technical talent.
LiveCoding develops a peer-to-peer live streaming platform that allows the user to learn how to create production-level code writes.

GovPredict unifies sources of government data in an effort to help people make sense of it. The company tracks lobbyist registrations/terminations, bill activity, and provide staffer contact for DC/District offices.On November 2, 2020 GovPredict was acquired by Phone2Action. The terms of the transaction were not disclosed.

Afrostream aims to be the biggest streaming service for African-American content in South America, Europe and Africa, where there are 1 billion underserved people who collectively represent a $15 billion market opportunity, it says. It has already struck deals with Sony, Netflix and others to deliver the programming that Americans take for granted, and it plans to launch in six countries that represent 40 million viewers next month. "While Netflix and Amazon fight for people in the West, we'll be connecting people with content in the developing world," it says.
80,000 hours aims to help people figure out how to focus their time and career effort to do the most good. The company creates career guides and quizzes that help people figure it out.
Breakout Room offers one-click live broadcasting solutions.

Bitmovin offers global online video providers with video developer tools. With Bitmovin's Encoding, Player, and Analytics products, users can redefine the viewer experience while lowering streaming costs.

Shred Video is a way to stitch together videos from drones and videos, and lets users add video and create a video with minimal effort. It does all that stitching together using machine learning to find the best elements of the video and synchronizing audio as well, the company says. There's also a network where those videos will be sharable.

Adjunct Professor Link (APL) addresses the need for quality instructors in higher education institutions via a suite of resources for the department chairs and program directors who hire adjuncts, allowing them more time for teaching, mentoring, and advising students, managing departments/programs and researching and publishing.
Caretaker is a marketplace where tenants and prospective tenants can buy and sell leases.
Gorgias is a customer support helpdesk designed for Shopify stores.
GreatHorn provides a cloud-based email security threat detection and response platform that safeguards organizations before, during, and after an email attack.
Haubby is a SaaS platform for beauty freelancers, offering client engagement, business management and product sales tools.
Impact Health, dba Joany, uses data and predictive modeling to help consumers to select and buy optimal health insurance.

MAX provides ordering apps, payment processing, and last-mile delivery support to retail businesses and mobile consumers. MAX provides ultra-fast deliveries by combining on-demand dispatch technology with a high-performance network of local dispatch riders, providing end-to-end pick-up and delivery to customers, operating a low-latency point-to-point architecture, and using mapping technology to resolve addresses.
Morsel is a monthly lunch subscription service delivering healthy meals to your desk.
Sailo is an online boat rental marketplace.

SPIDR Tech is a communication and intelligence platform for law enforcement. SPIDR Engage allows law enforcement agencies to use their own data to automatically engage their citizens using victim follow-ups, citizen request follow-ups, targeted surveys and more.On July 27th, 2021, SPIDR Tech was acquired by Versaterm. Terms of the transaction were not disclosed.
Clyp offers an online platform that makes it easy for users to share their audio files. Through a simple upload Clyp gives the user a short link that can be shared with friends.

HelpSocial is an engagement app built for providing customer service through social media. Existing social engagement tools are built for marketing purposes, this is built specifically for customer service work.
HuBoard offers instant project management for GitHub issues. The platform features a fully customizable task board, multi faceted filtering, and drag to assign issues.
Jumble is designed to make businesses more secure. Users are able to protect their email data not only while it's in transit but also while it's filed away or sitting in an inbox.

Yonder is an authentic internet company that helps users understand the cultural context behind information online. The company adds cultural context to every piece of information as it moves across the internet. Without that context, information is dehumanized. This leads to fake accounts, fake news, and disinformation.
Slashsensei is a cloud training-as-a-service platform that provides efficient 100% hands-on based training specfically aimed at IT skills.

Haste is a software solution that improves network performance for live interactive experiences. Haste can reduce the lag in Internet connections that cause stuttering on a video-call, or buffering while watching streams. For the competitive online video games (eSports) market, Haste makes the player quicker to react in-game and prevents "freezing up" in battle.On June 25, 2021, Haste was acquired by ExitLag. The terms of the transaction were not disclosed.

Simply Fit Board is a balance board with a twist, provides a fun, fast, and effective workout to slim your waist, target the muffin top, improve balance and strengthen your core. The Simply Fit Board is for all ages.
Babydash is a provider of an online platform that offers baby products.

VidGrid, fka ilos Videos, is the developer of ilos, the fastest way to teach anything to anyone in an organization. Create and share videos in seconds with a recorder that launches instantly from your web browser and makes them instantly available on the cloud. Find team member videos, organize them into playlists, or send them in an email from a single platform for painless knowledge sharing.On April 6, 2020, VidGrid was acquired by Paylocity. Terms of the transaction were not disclosed.

GrubMarket is an online farmer's market offering fresh, high-quality food from local vendors. The company's mission is to change the world by making it easy for certified local food producers, of any scale, to conveniently connect with their customers.

PushMarket helps drive sales by automating email marketing to send "personalized" email at the "right time." There seems to be a war between startups that want to either kill email or better leverage it.

Avemus makes enterprise management software for agricultural cooperatives in emerging markets. The company enables users to optimize their operations by means of tools for information sharing, notifications, reporting and more.

Atlas connects communities around the world through mobile banking. Leveraging the blockchain, its platform provides financial services by hooking into existing social systems, allowing for greater access to security, loans, and other financial products.

Everledger provides an immutable ledger for diamond identification and transaction verification for various stakeholders, from insurance companies to claimants and law enforcement agencies. The company provides new methods of financing and insuring diamonds, as well as combatting fraud, by providing an application for various stakeholders in the diamond pipeline.
Origin is a marketplace that connects investors fixed income borrowers in the corporate bond market, which facilitates direct bond issuance.

Liveoak Technologies provides digital customer onboarding tools for the financial services industry. The company provides a customer engagement platform for enterprise customers to onboard remote customers, improve closing ratios, reduce transaction time and provide digital access for customers.On July 7, 2020, Liveoak Technologies was acquired by DocuSign for $38 million.

AnyRoad is an Experience Relationship Management (ERM) platform enabling global brands to measure, scale, and implement experiential marketing campaigns. AnyRoad helps companies create brand loyalty, change consumer behavior, and understand brand associations by providing data intelligence sourced from experience-based marketing.

Cricket Health is a comprehensive kidney care provider with a personalized, evidence-based approach to managing CKD and ESRD. Through a combination of software and services, the company makes home dialysis accessible to a larger pool of patients, and improves medical outcomes for these patients.
5Treats enables pet professionals and pet owners to maintain and build relationships, schedule appointments and easily pay each other as they care for pets.

Genome Compiler builds software for designing synthetic life forms. Genome Compiler provides an all-in-one software platform for genetic engineers, molecular and synthetic biologists. The company supplies a set of tools for DNA design & visualization, data management and collaboration. Genome Compiler is delivering a Software-as-a-Service (SaaS) computer-aided design (CAD) and collaboration platform for Synthetic Biology.
HoneyBook develops a client management software that is geared towards small businesses in creative industries such as photography, web design, and wedding planning.

Honor Technology brings workforce management and technology expertise together with high-touch, personalized care to improve the in-home care experience. Since launching the Honor Care Network in 2017, Honor has partnered with a growing roster of independently owned home care agencies to deliver reliable, transparent, and high-quality care. The Honor Care Network currently provides non-medical home care services to families in more than 800 cities and towns across the United States.

LiquidSpace provides corporations with a tool to enable employees to find and book both private workplaces within their company's portfolio, as well as external 3rd places including office business centers, hotels and coworking spaces.

Rooster is a movement bringing people together to help, borrow and share with one another for free in their local communities. Ask for whatever is needed, help whenever you can. One rule: everything's free.
The Hotels Network is a network of peer hotels that increase direct bookings, spend less on commissions, and regain direct communication with their clients.
Yodas is the product-creators database where software developers, product managers, designers etc share their product and feature achievements and connect to past and current coworkers.
TwoGrand, dba YouFood, is a network to discover, share, and buy meals you love.
Zengaming is a place for eSport enthusiasts to create a profile, discover, be discovered, join or create a team, and then compete for fame, prizes, and sponsorships.

Zeus offers a way to rent furnished housing. Zeus hosts startups, students, and companies in the Bay Area. The Zeus platform allows partners to focus on growing their portfolios while earning more money from their existing properties, without any hassle.
Weld is a new visual tool that lets entrepreneurs, designers, and other "non-techies" create websites and mobile apps without coding.

LiquidLandscape Notebook is a collaborative data-driven document, designed to quickly and interactively explore, publish, present, and track big data analysis of complex relationships in messy, real-world data. LL Notebook was designed with an intense focus on collaboration and communication in order to quickly move from reproducible research, to timely action, to tracking and analyzing the results of those actions within a single document.
Labdoor independently tests supplements and ranks them, so consumers can research, find, and buy the best supplements.

Confident Cannabis offers technology solutions to bring transparency and consistency to legal cannabis through data and insights. The company empowers producers to communicate their quality to sell more at higher prices. Confident Cannabis enables retailers to rate their supply to make better purchasing decisions. The company helps consumers understand product ingredients so they can buy with confidence.

OpenInvest is a Registered Investment Adviser and Public Benefit Corporation leveraging technology to provide a next-generation impact investing solution. The separately managed account platform creates low-cost investment portfolios tailored to the causes clients cherish most while tracking market indices. OpenInvest then delivers in-depth impact reporting, dynamic divest-invest activity, easy shareholder engagement, and more.On June 29th, 2021, Open Invest was acquired by JPMorgan. The terms of the transaction were not disclosed.

Alloy is a service for reducing false positives during the KYC process. Alloy's API and dashboard helps financial institutions integrate multiple sources of data and custom CIP rules to both increase the number of customers that can be successfully onboarded without manual review and improve transparency and efficiency into the process.

Micaton Ergonomics is a company specialized in the manufacture and commercialization of manual tool solutions with high-tech components for do-it-yourself and home tasks. Its flagship product is the Magnet Driver makes it easy to fasten things securely and quickly.

Toky Woky is platform that allows customers to chat on ecommerce sites. They can ask and answer questions and vote for helpful answers. This helps brands see what their customers wants, who are their ambassadors, and get content analytics with a tool that applies semantic, geographic, and statistic filters to sort through interactions. It then associates recurrent issues and questions with each page of the user's website. Here, the user learns what information visitors need more of and where they need it.

Cours Center offers video courses for professional training and distance schooling. Teachers come from all over the world and programs are adapted to the student's level. Users can follow courses at their own pace and watch classes over and over.
Floyd is a direct-to-consumer furniture brand.
Tara AI is a platform designed to help modern software teams manage and deliver across their product development lifecycle.

Tempo delivers the personalized guidance of a 1-on-1 trainer as well as provides a fitness class. Tempo's Microsoft Kinect-esque motion sensors scan 30 times per second and notify the user if their form is incorrect.

Provider of a cooking recipe app. The company offers a recipe app for iPhone and iPad with detailed instructions with photos illustrating each step. It also allows on-the-fly quantity changes that adjust the entire recipe accordingly.

Lyric is a tech and data-powered real estate and lifestyle hospitality company that secures its own inventory in multi-family residential buildings through partnerships with landlords, refurbishes them, and transforms them into hotel-like properties for business travelers.

PartnerStack provides a full-stack solution for partnerships. The company offers partner marketing, channel marketing, partner marketing software, channel marketing software, marketing automation software, co-marketing software, and marketing software. It is based in Toronto, Ontario.

Unfraud leverages artificial intelligence to allow online businesses to constantly monitor a user's activity, detect transaction frauds and prevent fraudulent activities. The software defines behavior dynamic models and alerts the system to prevent fraud.

Pacejet helps companies experience multi-carrier shipping, get real-time freight quotes, rate-shop instantly, and benefit from integrated automation without software or multiple carrier websites.On February 25th, 2020, Pacejet was acquired by 3Gtms. Terms of the transaction were not disclosed.
Zestrip offers travel experiences for every taste and budget "to those who like to wander off the beaten path" by connecting travelers and local guides across several cities in Italy.
Beloola, developed by V-Cult, is a web-based Virtual Reality platform that allows people with shared interests to congregate in the same user-generated virtual place in real-time.
Coinut is an exchange platform for Bitcoin based options.

Ease VR is an experience-driven analytics solution for digital reality (VR, AR, MR) developers and behavioral researchers. The company surveys everything from core systems data like average session length and crashes to rich engagement dimensions that represent what users see, do and feel. Ease VR computes Human Factors in realtime for predictive analysis. In return companies are able to understand and react to measured user comfort, happiness and well-being and eliminate simulator sickness.
Epiphyte is a payments service provider that aims to provide cross-border payments using blockchain technology.
JoyStream improves BitTorrent by introducing Bitcoin micropayments for faster speed, more content, and instant HD streaming.
Lingoland is a 3D virtual foreign language immersion program users can experience from home.

Deepgram is an accurate speech recognition platform. With its patented deep neural network, ease to use API, and patented model training capabilities, Deepgram enables organizations to easily embed AI into their business. By unlocking accurate speech data insights, organizations can create delightful customer experiences, improve productivity, and generate new business channels faster, more reliably, and cost-effectively than ever before.
Unocoin Technologies offers a simple, secure and seamless way to store, buy and sell bitcoins in India.

Take&Make powers creativity and is an eco-system for Do-It-Yourself projects, starting with crafts and growing into other realms like hardware makers, woodwork, and more. Creators from all over the world create and sell their own branded Do-It-Yourself kits to their audiences through the Take&Make platform. Creators include: YouTubers, Bloggers, Etsy Sellers and more.
Janus VR is a free internet browser that allows the user to engage in social and collaborative creation and consumption of 2D/3D content in an interactive, virtual reality setting.

BitQuick is a service that connects buyers and sellers of Bitcoin in a quick, convenient and safe manner. The company narrows both buying and selling Bitcoin to 3 simple steps. BitQuick has a flexible platform that has already expanded operations to Europe, Taiwan and India and launched AltQuick, an alternate cryptocurrency exchange.

Loanbase, also known as BitLendingClub, is a peer-to-peer Bitcoin lending platform. The company helps borrowers get Bitcoin loans online for the most competitive rates and the lowest transaction fees. BitLendingClub uses the force of the free market and group wisdom to provide the lowest interest rates. The lenders compete in a dutch auction style in order to assess the risk of each loan and offer the lowest possible rate for a given borrower.

BTCPoint bridges the gap between digital and physical currency. The company's network of Bank ATMs enables individuals around the world to buy Bitcoin using cash or sell Bitcoin for cash with instant withdraw at any participating ATM without the need of a credit card or bank account. BTCPoint went out of business in March, 2016.
Bitproof operates an online platform that certifies documents, business contracts, and digital information in the bitcoin blockchain.
Bitrefill allows users to purchase gift cards using bitcoin.
BlinkTrade is a technology company that offers a bitcoin exchange platform.
Gastrozentrale provides a state-of-the-art B2B online marketplace for restaurant and hotel supply products.

RiskApp is the technology provider owning the all-in-one risk management platform for the insurance industry. Conceived to support and improve underwriting, claims, sales and technical decisions, RiskApp offers risk data and analytics, consultation and develops software to assess business risks. The company's proprietary algorithm estimates the value of risk based on collected data, expresses the economic losses that can arise from such risks and compares the results to industry best practices.
CleverCoin is a Dutch bitcoin exchange which makes it possible to trade bitcoins in an easy, fast and secure way.
BTX Trader, dba Celery, is a simple and fast way for people to use digital currency. Celery enables users to buy, sell, store and send bitcoin, litecoin and dogecoin.

BitMesh is a platform that allows users to share their bandwidth or Internet connections with others in exchange for bitcoin. Without the involvement of third-party escrow or contracts, users can achieve a mutual negotiation for the pricing and share Internet freely and cheaply.

Hijro, formerly Fluent, develops a blockchain based financial operating network for global commerce featuring real-time B2B payments, supply chain financing, and a peer-to-peer working capital marketplace that provide banking partners and non-bank lenders alike-such as alternative finance providers, asset-based lenders, and hedge funds-an alternative platform for lending into global supply chains.
Virtual Gym offers a completely new digital concepts for group training, which means that you can put together their own passports and to participate from home.

Stratifyd develops a Software-as-a-Service data analysis and visualization platform that enables executives, marketers, and data scientists to extract insights from any unstructured data source. Its platform identifies hidden trends, patterns, locations, correlations, communities, and outlying themes in large pools of data. The company's platform is used in various applications, such as marketing, customer support, product development, and other business disciplines.
Smartflats provides fully equipped and stylishly decorated flats for short and medium term rentals in Brussels, Liege, and Antwerp.
Oluck is a website which creates interaction between users and advertising.

Provider of a world wide altruism network. The company offers free gamified social network where all users can make their wishes. The community can share, discuss, and help granting them. Those who register have 3 shooting stars available, each of which serves to publicly post a wish. All other users can help make it known or even apply to take complete responsibility of fulfilling it, agreeing in private in a dedicated section. To always create new stars one has to be active on the site, since every action gives stardust.

Handkrafted is an online platform connecting artisans and craftspeople with users looking for custom-made items. The company creates a way to help discerning buyers seek and find unique, high-quality and sustainably produced goods and connect with the right craftspeople and artisans.

Zipments provides consumers, retailers and other businesses with a collaborative commerce platform to same-day local delivery service through a network of couriers. Local requests, which can be made through the Zipments mobile app, API, or on Zipments.com, are automatically dispatched to a network of couriers based on the type of transportation required (bike, car, truck) and time in which the delivery needs to be performed. Once a courier has accepted the request, the delivery status can be monitored with real time updates including pickup time, recipient signature and final delivery time.

Trustatom provides CredyCo, which allows investors and companies to establish continuous credibility during the due diligence and post investment. It uses a smart contracts & identity technology built on top of the blockchain to ensure the credibility of all statements and allows businesses to identify and verify their customers, as well as improve the security of their customers by using cryptographic signatures for authorizations.
Faaya is an online platform where users can design their own outfits which are then custom tailored.
WeMontage lets users upload favorite family photos, create a custom photo collage, and print on large, removable wallpaper.

Protenus provides healthcare compliance analytics to help health systems reduce risk and save money. The platform uses artificial intelligence to analyze every single action inside a medical record system.

Netsil, formerly Gencore Systems, provides out-of-the-box visibility into modern distributed applications. The company is committed to making the lives of DevOps and SRE teams drastically easier by speeding up their workflows for incidence response, deploy management, capacity planning, service-level objective management and distributed application performance management.

Comparadentistas.com is a cost comparison service for dental treatments in Spain. The company brings together patients looking for cheaper prices for a desired treatment with dentists that are looking for more costumers.
Travel Appeal provides an AI platform to monitor and analyze online travel data in real time and turn it into insights for industry operators.

inRentive is a cloud-based platform for managing your portfolio's marketing content, including photos, pricing, and availability. It's designed to help create the most detailed, accurate, and reliable listing information available on the web.
Seamless Planet is a global distribution and channel management system for independent travel companies, providing inventory and booking information in real-time.

Next One's On Me, dba Loop & Tie, makes it easy to give gifts that are personalized to each recipient's tastes. Givers send an online card that leads to a unique collection of gift choices, and recipients choose what most delights them.
Metrica Sports helps football coaches to analyze their team's performance and communicate with their players.

Domino is a workbench that accelerates the entire analytical lifecycle, from early exploratory work all the way to deploying your models, allowing users to track and share work along the way. It works alongside the tools and languages already used, including R, Python, Julia and more.

AthleteTrax has developed a web-based platform to help college athletic departments improve academic and athletic performance. AthleteTrax helps athletic departments with integrated scheduling, tracking strength and conditioning routines and streamlining department administrative processes.

Social Media Information (SMI) offers powerful tools for investigation and analysis of personal data from search engines, social media, public records, and the deep web. The company's customers are law firms, licensed investigators, insurance companies, financial services firms, government agencies, and employers. SMI helps them win cases, uncover fraud, make better investment decisions, and hire better people.

Linguatrip, formerly MP Reserver, is an online platform for booking quality language courses and student accommodations worldwide. It allows potential students to compare language schools and find the one that suits all of their needs. Linguatrip also allows users to book accommodations and flights, get information about the visa application process, and share their experiences. On the other side, schools can easily add information about themselves and update their potential customers on current promotions and availability.

Satoshi Citadel Industries is a fintech startup company building the ecosystem for Bitcoin in the Philippines. The company seeks to streamline financial services by creating Bitcoin solutions that reduce the costs of using and transferring money. Satoshi Citadel Industries's aim is to realize the full potential of Bitcoin technology by changing the way people think about money and value, ultimately empowering the individual Filipino and engineering the future of finance in the country.
Arcturus offers a digital platform for biomarkers by connecting robots to the cloud.
BitMedia is an advertising platform, which is created within Bitcoin-network (community). This is a niche area, which allows resource owners of Bitcoin-subjects to buy and sell thematic traffic.
Calolo, formerly CollegeAppz, is an online program that takes students step-by-step through the entire college admissions and financial aid process.

Nukern is a cloud billing software that allows web hosts to manage their servers and clients more efficiently while helping them to reduce their churn rate. By offering an intuitive cloud solution, Nukern allows web hosts to work and interact with employees and customers in a faster, easier and more centralized way. It's also accessible from any mobile device with a clear and intuitive interface.

Community Elf is an outsourced content marketing solution for Agencies and Brand Marketers in mid-market and enterprise B2B and B2C companies across 35 industries including the healthcare, professional services, technology, manufacturing, retail, and non-profit sectors. UpContent is the company's SaaS platform that scales third-party digital content curation on native websites and social media platforms. UpContent discovers news and blog articles within Hootsuite, Buffer, and Klipfolio, and provides more than 40,000 article suggestions per day across 1,000 cities around the globe.

Omnikart is an e-commerce platform providing an end to end solution for all sort of industrial supplies needs. The company manages the entire process of procurement and delivery on behalf of customers reducing their efforts to minimal level and helping them focus on important tasks. Omnikart also employs technical experts who assist customers in choosing the right product for their engineering requirement.

Envisagenics is a life science company that applies artificial intelligence to the genetic sequence of patients to discover new therapies. The company's proprietary cloud-based discovery platform, SpliceCore, uses machine learning to prioritize new drug target candidates from patients' RNA. The company focuses on RNA splicing, a cellular process occurring in every cell, that 'edits' RNA to produce functional proteins required for bodies to work.
BeeLine Reader offers digital reading tools to help students learn to read faster and help those with dyslexia and other learning differences read more fluently.
Griti produces fast, on-demand video help that supports college students using on-campus peer networks of subject experts.
Bloomskart Retail operates RainCan, a subscription-based service dealing in home delivery of dairy, meat, bakery, fruits, and vegetables.

S4, previously known as Solapa4, has developed a decision making geo-referenced platform for the agricultural producer. The company integrates the harvest information with soil analysis, planting plan and seed density.

Coinigy brings Bitcoin and Cryptocurrency investment to the masses. Combining powerful tools for both the casual investor and die-hard day-trader, the company makes it simple for anyone to open a brokerage account and tap into the exploding cryptocurrency markets. Deposit funds, monitor balances, place trades, and analyze trends on all the major cryptocurrency exchanges through one interface.

Blubox provides e-tailing solutions for e-commerce companies. The company is capable of providing end-to-end services that make them the ideal partner for brands looking to outsource the full management of their online business.

Pasta Lifestyle Solutions, dba FitMeIn, provides access to multiple fitness studios for a monthly membership fee.On May 12, 2020, FitMeIn was acquired by Health Assure. Terms of the transaction were not disclosed.

inVR's platform enables creators to easily convert 3D designs into virtual reality experiences across all platforms. InVR aims to be the platform for 3D VR, a more immersive experience than 360 video. InVR is one of the most popular VR social networks for creators and consumers; the app is available on the iTunes App Store and Google Play Store.

VrTV, dba Waygate VR, is a new platform where VR enthusiasts from amateur to pro can collaboratively build and instantly publish real-time streaming interactive VR. With VrTV's real-time 3D streaming system all published content is delivered completely on demand to play natively on every device with no installs and no waiting.

Bandura is a cybersecurity software company delivering automated IP threat intelligence technologies to stop network cyber attacks and data leakage for Financial Services, Healthcare, Energy, Government.
Investment POD has developed a digital wealth-management platform for financial advisors.

Rippleshot provides issuers, merchants and processors with a cloud-based technology platform to detect fraud through machine learning and data analytics. The company's technology processes millions of payment card transactions in real-time to proactively pinpoint when and where a breach of card data occurred. Following detection, the platform then identifies which cards are most at risk of seeing fraudulent activity, and suggests appropriate mitigation strategies to best prevent fraud loss.

Kinglet is an online marketplace connecting entrepreneurs and small businesses with flexible office space. The company minimizes inefficiencies in the leasing process for both the host and guest. Flexible monthly terms, collaborative environments and standard agreements allow growing businesses (guests) to stay nimble. Hosts can maximize revenue from unused space, in turn, connecting people, ideas and talent.
Stacks Data has developed an online platform offering a way to share supply chain information.

Sparks Dynamics provides intelligent solutions to industrial customers that enhance business profitability through smart systems that continuously monitor and manage energy, security, and equipment status. This continuous verification allows for increased efficiencies, uptime and business continuity. Its premier art cloud based monitoring solution with data analytics and specially developed artificial intelligence is the backbone of the company offering. Sparks Dynamics provides consulting, auditing, monitoring, system integration, project management, and financing services to maximize the industrial customer's performance envelope, be it energy efficiency, reliability through equipment operating parameters, or facility security.

Arts & Analytics is a company dedicated to serving art & culture organizations. Using predictive analytics, the company shows clients how to grow attendance, attract top performers and exhibits, increase brand awareness and strengthen patron loyalty.
ClientJoy is a cloud-based visual collaboration platform and communication tool for task and project management for enterprises and teams.

Little Bird Technologies, fka Plexus Engine, is a technology company that helps PR agencies, marketers, and media companies analyze connections across the social web to identify top influencers who can galvanize word-of-mouth marketing; build like-minded communities and create relevant content to increase engagement; and identify early-movers to accelerate the discovery of trends.
Streamup gives pro-grade live editing tools and advanced chat controls to encourage them to livestream their own shows - things like cooking programs, or fan Q&As with bands.
Holidify is a destination discovery website that helps travelers find the right destinations according to their preferences and help them plan their holidays in a hassle free manner.

DineDesk offers restaurants a fully integrated suite of tools to manage all aspects of online marketing, reservations and guest management. Its customers use DineDesk to assist with all their front-of-restaurant needs.

MealHopper provides customers an app and web interface to connect with home cooks who want to share extra portions of meals cooking in their homes. The meal options on menu are semi-moderated which ensure great taste and variety. The food is prepared mostly by home makers and is culturally very diverse in nature, which gives our customers great food options from across India to choose from. Customers can choose the meals and make payments COD or online and meals are delivered to them as per their preferred time slots. MealHopper provides the packaging materials and handles all delivery through its in-house logistics team.

Rentomo, founded in 2015, is a platform that enables its users to borrow things from people nearby on a rented price. It allows users to borrow/rent everyday items they may occasionally need, like a drill, ladder, camera, bicycle, travel bag etc. to someone in their trusted network.

Point3 Security uses the Software as a Service model to provide a two-part managed offering –automated software coupled with human-backed analysis. Point3's proprietary engine has the unique ability to understand normal and abnormal behaviors of a cyber-ecosystem. As it detects suspicious activity, it sends this information back to a threat professional for investigation.

Topaz Research has developed Quatrove, a SaaS application that provides cybersecurity for business and personal information that is stored on a computer connected to the internet while also providing functionality in the main areas of project management, collaboration, time tracking, resource management & intelligence management.

Rapport helps small and midsized business reap the rewards of sustainability. The company offers a simple tool to capture, analyze, reduce and report corporate sustainability metrics. Rapport helps companies drive waste and cost out of their operations. The company is an outgrowth of a sustainability consulting firm with over 40 years of collective experience helping company manage, improve and disclose their impact on the planet.

Repiscore provides a portable reputation system to predict trustworthiness. Repiscore takes info from LinkedIn, Facebook, and other sources to validate work experience and educational background to show commonalities between buyer and seller.

Frill Clothing designs sorority recruitment clothing with charity in mind. They are a one-stop shop for sorority girls and donate a portion of each sorority's proceeds to the charity of their choice. In addition to making sorority recruitment products, Frill designs trendy bridesmaid outfits and monogrammed products.

Medikoe provides users a discovery of services which are personally verified and can be trusted. Medikoe wants to connect users with the all healthcare and wellness service providers to make sure the convenience, trust affordability and availability in their neighborhood. The company aims to improve suggestions based on search history, provide value added offer on products and services to the end-user, 360 degree of healthcare and wellness services to connect consumer in a single platform.
MyTaxiIndia is an online platform to book outstation taxi and cab rental services in India.

EasyKhaana is a food tech startup providing homely meals. It allows users to book their meals on the website or via a call. The startup owns the complete delivery supply chain – with a combination of food, logistics & technology.
Sartor offers the finest hand-crafted shirting. The company's mission is to make owning a wardrobe of custom shirts easy and affordable.
Unplugged Instruments is creating electric guitars with aren't "tethered to a wall outlet" and can also interact with smartphones.
AquaCloud is a monitoring system that provides real-time data and analytics about the quality of any body of water.

Care.IT is a web and mobile consumer and provider software platform extending health services to individuals and their plan sponsors. Patients are financially rewarded for maintaining good health and therapeutic compliance. Care.IT plans will be sold through state and federal Exchanges, working toward a national capability by 2019. Care.IT services may be additionally accessed without any insurance.

Community Health TV ("CHTV") is a provider of health videos on the Internet geared toward multicultural consumers. CHTV contains a broad portfolio of service offerings that span the health spectrum, from in-depth medical content for condition prevention and management to fitness and cooking videos to recommendations for achieving a healthy lifestyle. The CHTV websites also offer areas for interactive support communities, health and wellness tools, and answers to frequently asked medical questions.

Life Detection Systems provides a passive non-contact biometric sensing system that monitors the vital signs of target individuals. This includes babies in cribs, adults with cardiovascular and related disease, residents in care facilities and patients in medical facilities.
ProHydration offers professional IV hydration treatments to the amateur athletes.

Cloudgames is a gaming platform that is based on the new HTML5 technology. This 'new' standard allows website to offer a user experience that is almost as good as a downloaded game. On the platform users can play games for free. The platform has an international focus, aiming at the Middle East and Africa.

Mobingi provides an automated app maintenance platform for users of Amazon Web Services (AWS) and other cloud services. Targeting small and medium-sized enterprises, typically unlikely to arrange engineers specifically for maintaining cloud or server environment, the company wants to enable more systems development focus by them through elimination of DevOps tasks.

FilmOrganic specializes in the development and production of 100% compostable mulch films aimed at increasing agricultural productivity. FilmOrganic's technology is effective, environmentally friendly and cost efficient.

Mogile Technologies aims to increase the adoption of electric mobility. The company's flagship product is ChargeHub, a platform that helps people choose their electric vehicle, get set up with charging at home and find charging stations on the go.
Shipsy is a C2C logistics company. Shipsy provides architecture design for analytics, systems for business processes, and an analytics platform for insights.

ThemeGo is a centralized portal for researching and booking theme park vacations, providing tools for users to plan their theme park trips. User reviews and descriptions help to build an itinerary that reflects the user's interests and needs.

Falkon is a real estate app operated by PropertyIDX that supplies data on freestanding property, currently has five full-time employees and roughly 6,000 users. The company provides detailed property reports, owner contact information, and additional real estate data to thousands of members and businesses around the world.
Fixzy is a Thailand-based on-demand startup for handymen.

Million Times, developed by Aniwo, is an online portal for connecting startups and investors. Startups can upload their pitch deck for funding and alliances, and investors can discover new investment opportunities.

CyberTiger is an Asian marketing platform focused on bridging the gap between international mobile application developers to Japanese publishers. For companies aiming to grow their business in Japan, CyberTiger offers services like product localization, local customer support, and more. Their marketing platform enables international advertisers to acquire loyal users in Japan on a performance basis, and to increase and retain high value users. For publishers, CyberTiger offers selected site owners the opportunity to be the first to introduce new games and apps, increasing their revenues and users.

CouponRoller is a gamified savings platform creating casino-type games where players can win coupons for retailers. CouponRoller brings brand awareness, site traffic, and new customers to eCommerce sites, and provides users with entertainment and savings.
WiseFuture is a online brokerage firm that provides professional investment services, available only to high net worth individuals.

TrendiGuru is built upon the collaboration of brands, retailers, and publishers to bring the best shopping experience to customers - so that the customer can discover and purchase the clothes they love. TrendiGuru is developing a web-browser add-on tool for directly connecting images of apparel found online with retailers, so that the user can enjoy a one-click shopping experience. Publishers can enjoy higher revenues and detailed analytics, advertisers can market more effectively, and users can shop more conveniently.

righTune inspires emotional engagement between brands and their potential consumers by playing relevant, personalized background music on websites. The right ambiance can add an emotional dimension to a site's content, which directly impacts consumer behavior and increases revenue. righTune takes the widely-accepted concept of in-store music and leverages it for the online world. While playing music, righTune's patented technology tracks user behavior and engagement levels on the website. righTune uses a behavioral, machine learning algorithm that continually updates the music for new users according to de facto business results, leading to increases in key business metrics.

Actifile is developing a cloud-based document management and security protection system, allowing users to protect and control their digital information. For companies who want to protect and organize digital files created for business projects, Actifile automatically backs up all locally created business files and provides a single, centralized location for easy access and increased transparency.

Neozeka Software is a software development company established in 2014 which focuses on developing SaaS, Cloud, Web and Mobile applications for real estate industry. Neozeka is the developer of highly acclaimed real estate appraisal SaaS platform DTS.
MyTaxiIndia is an online platform to book outstation taxi and cab rental services in India.
Lavadero offers an on-demand laundry and dry-cleaning service in Mexico City.
Master Kiwi is a platform that simplifies video game creation for designers and helps with marketing campaigns.
Disenia is a highly-curated design focused e-commerce website. The site features curated design and clothing products specifically for the customer looking to purchase.
Delphi Sonic utilizes machine learning methods for predictive maintenance of railway vehicles, wind turbines, and marine and heavy production machinery.
Prospecting Health is a Nashville, TN based Lifecycle and Demand Generation Sales organization focused today on healthcare.
Taskulu is a SaaS-based collaboration platform that allows colleagues to work more efficiently.
Askdata offers a natural language search engine for internal data that translates words into SQL queries.

Lifekind creates AI personas that represent real people, deeply resembling their thoughts, memories, behaviors, and interactive conversations. The company has developed comprehensive Artificial Intelligence (AI) solutions for digital human technology, including RAIN, a video game industry solution for creating autonomous characters, and Elise, an AI-powered digital human in VR. On June 1, 2021, Lifekind was acquired by AI Foundation. The terms of the transaction were not disclosed.
ImmunoCloud is a provider of cloud based data storage solutions.
iBinom offers an online platform that offers genome analysis.
Biosoft, founded in 2008, offers an online platform that helps pharmaceutical companies identify prognostic biomarkers of colon cancer.

Worldfavor's cloud-based SaaS solution offers companies worldwide a radical streamlining of its management of information relating to economic, environmental and social sustainability – from collection to compilation and communication. The service can be applied both within the company and in the supply chain, and even visualized toward more and more sustainability-conscious consumers.
ApetEat delivers raw materials for preservative-free Mediterranean balanced diets for the working sector.

DeviceHub.net is a cloud service for Internet of Things communication. It allows users (both makers and companies) to easily create services based on IoT by connecting their Internet-enabled hardware projects to analysis and remote control systems. Practically, it is an IoT web platform which gathers data, summarizes it, and gives the possibility to remotely control connected devices. DeviceHub.net can be integrated with any kind of hardware and is specially designed for smart metering, fleet management, medical industry, home automation, IoT makers, automotive, wearables, and more.

Agroop is a Software as a Service (SaaS) platform aimed at developing tech solutions to collect data and provide meaningful insights to farming agents. It offers Agroop Operational, a farm management application; and Agroop Cooperation, a collaborative software.

Provider of a mobile discovery application for venues. The company's app offers a curated selection of five bars, restaurants, and clubs near the current location of its user. One can filter by price, type of venue, and cuisine, and each profile comes with photos and videos.

Reesio has built a simple and easy system for real estate brokers, agents, clients, and third parties to manage every aspect of a transaction in the cloud. The company offers a system of document sharing, workflow management, alerts/activities, and messaging. This allows everyone to easily manage and understand everything that's taking place in a transaction within a simple, centralized dashboard. We differentiate ourselves from the competition by not requiring any separate paid e-signature accounts, by offering 24x7 customer support, and by focusing on a clean/simple product that can be learned in 10 minutes.
Cheddar Up makes personal paybacks quick, easy and fun. Cheddar Up exists as a quick and easy payment alternative. With it, people never get stuck with the bill and never forget to pay their friends.
AgFunder is an online Venture Capital platform that invests in exceptional entrepreneurs transforming our food and agriculture system.
Avanoo is a marketplace for video Programs that support teams and individuals in achieving peak performance in their lives, on their teams, and in their work.

Backlot Cars is a networking marketplace for automotive dealers designed to connect dealers allowing them to buy, sell and trade inventory without the cost of auctions. The simplistic, clean and open design of BLC provides users zero downtime when incorporating BLC in users wholesale buying or selling process.On September 8th, 2020, Backlot Cars was acquired by KAR Global at a valuation of $425M.
Blueboard allows companies to reward their employees to curated activities and experiences, including yoga, skydiving, mixology classes, spa treatments, and more.
