Wiselike, formerly CareerDean, provides a web-based platform that allows users to sign up with their full credentials and expertise to share their knowledge with folks who have questions. These experts are invite-only, and users who wish to be experts can ask Wiselike for an invite to become a knowledge sharer.

Contentools provides a one-stop content marketing software for businesses that look for website traffic, leads and clients conversion. From strategy to content creation and analytics tracking, with Contentools users set and manage their own workflows to worry less and get more results from inbound marketing.

DCHQ is an enterprise Docker management solution focusing on enterprise application modeling, deployment, service discovery and lifecycle management. The platform accelerates IT modernization and provides developers an express pathway to containerizing their monolithic enterprise applications in addition to automating the deployment and management of new microservices architectures.
Gogohire is a hiring marketplace that connects world-class sales talent with top tech companies.
GridCure provides modular big data software for utility companies. It leverages analytic models and research to produce business solutions for smart grid intelligence.
Growbots outbound sales software automatically generates warm leads for B2B companies.
HelloBit helps people and companies send money globally, at half the cost by leveraging digital currency technology.
Hussle is self-serve staffing, bringing Uber-like ease and logistics to any type of task you need done.

Innovaccer is a healthcare technology company, developing the Data Activation Platform which is custom-built to advance the goal of developing a patient-centered, connected care delivery continuum. Its smart platform creates a unified patient record for healthcare provider and payer use to enable collaborative care delivery. The platform includes a proprietary integration and analysis engine to clean and aggregate healthcare data from sources including electronic health records (EHRs), claims, pharmacies, hospitals, and labs.

Linte increases the efficiency of enterprises to manage large volume of cases and contracts, providing tools for automatic generation of documents, hiring lawyers and corresponding control demands. It is a solution that automates repetitive tasks quickly and securely.
Misterb&b helps connect the global gay community by enabling gay men to earn money from renting out their spare space and travel the world renting rooms from other gay men.

Qimple helps great companies make better hires in less time by creating a hub for all their hiring needs. Companies can create a job ad and distribute it to multiple boards for maximum exposure with just one click. Users can track and compare applicants with the built-in infographic generator and make the best hire – all in one place.
Roost makes it easy to discover storage and parking spaces in neighborhoods, so you can get back to what matters most.
Speedlancer is a freelance marketplace, delivering top-notch design, writing, and data-entry work in just 4 hours.

Yellowdig, is a social collaboration tool that brings knowledge from outside of the classroom into the course material. ResultsOnAir helps advertisers & media planners maximize ROI on Direct Response TV ads. The company accurately captures web traffic that TV adverts attract and show a customers' journey from visit to conversion.
GoPillar connects designers and customers from all over the world and breaking borders

Wishlist offers gifts that encourage people to be active in Colorado. Users can give local experiences, whether it's a guided rafting trip, a massage at a top spa, or another of the company's offerings, that provide the opportunity to try something new. Wishlist is an active, local, and creative option for birthday presents, Christmas presents, wedding presents, or any occasion that calls for a unique gift.

Alumnify is a location based professional networking application that enables communication between mutually interested alumni. Using LinkedIn's API, Alumnify pulls users' professional information and uses filters to match potential graduates who are most likely to have similar interests based on their geolocation, industry, and education. This creates a job networking tool that fosters relationships based on the affinity users have with their university that is fun and addicting.
Pixc develops a high-volume image editing service for e-commerce stores. The company provides a quick, efficient and easy way for users to have retail-ready photos.

ChattingCat is a platform that connects non-native speakers who want to write better English to native speakers who want to help them. Non-native speakers get instant correction of their written English. ChattingCat changes the way people learn to write foreign language and enables them to confidently write English for professional communication. ChattingCat brings disruptive innovation to both the language education and professional language service market.

Virect provides a simple and effective way to get a great video. For customers who need video, Virect provides retrieval to browse and search videos and creators, recommendations based on requirements and statistical data, pitch deck submission and review, secure escrow payment transactions, and project management and feedback for communication.

Coach Market was founded to help people achieve more in their careers by providing expert guidance throughout their lifelong career journey. Coach Market believes that by making it easier to access the best professional career coaches, they can help their customers achieve their career potential and lead happier and more fulfilled lives.

UCreate3D provides a high quality 3D printing infrastructure to the world's largest retailers. UCreate3D is the first company to combine a profitable consumer-driver assortment, infinitive stock without a footprint, and on-demand 3D printing. By optimizing UCreate3D's 3D printing infrastructure through data analysis, consumers find the exact product they are looking for. UCreate3D's global network of professional 3D printing partners enable them to ship the highest quality products at revolutionary speed. UCreate3D combines mass manufactured and locally 3D printed components to offer retailers and consumers breakthrough products that are affordable, high quality, and customizable.

CrowdPlat is a software platform for businesses to crowdsource their application development projects. Customers of all sizes from entrepreneurs to small businesses, and large enterprises can post their projects on the platform, select the project team from a network of freelance talent, and manage execution through the platform. CrowdPlat intents to grow the network of freelance talent and pre-qualify them based on its own assessment, history with the company and customer feedback.

Transfercar runs rental car relocation websites for customers in USA, Australia and New Zealand. It allows rental operators to relocate cars between their branches in order to position their fleet for new hires by facilitating contact between them and travellers. Operators submit their relocations to Transfercar using the web or integrations with fleet management systems and then prospective drivers request the relocations through the website, mobile phones or email.
FishFishMe offers an online marketplace, where customers looking to go on a fishing trip can browse charter boats in various countries and book trips via the site.

Storygami lets users easily add related content into their videos. Users can embed blogs, image galleries, extra videos, maps, subscription tabs, and social media streams right into their video content.

Publishizer is a crowdfunding literacy agency connecting book authors directly with readers and publishers. Once approved, users can start crowdfunding preorders and get connected with interested publishers.

Hazel Lane offers a subscription box that features the best of eco-chic, artisanal products from a new city every month. This enables everyone to explore a new city through its locally-made, locals favorites. It also helps the cities emerging brands gain visibility. We focus on sustainably made, eco-friendly & vegan items as often as possible and all packing materials are made from 100% recycled materials {provided by EcoEnclose}. 10% of all proceeds are donated back to a charity local to that months city.

Kollecto helps users build an affordable art collection by pairing them with a Personal Art Advisor. Upon signing up, users are matched with a personal advisor who has extensive experience navigating the gallery scene. He or she will work with you to figure out needs (something big, over the couch), budget (under $1,500) and overall hopes and dreams.

MoBagel's Decanter AI engine offers real-time analytics tools that let users see the behavior, churning circumstances, command and status history, and malfunctions in visualized graphs. MoBagel helps identify customers and scale business.

Aircall is a cloud-based phone system that acts as a business phone and contact center in one. Aircall integrates with most-used CRMs and support tools to empower a team with relevant data. Aircall allows customers to make sales and manage customer relationships on its platform.

Apptuto provides a financial education platform that allows professionals to prepare for accreditation exams via gamification techniques, which encourage students to study, and help working professionals stay motivated as they prepare. Betterview provides predictive analytics that help insurance carriers to identify and score roof conditions and other property risks. The company analyzes manned aircraft and satellite imagery with the use of machine learning and computer vision. After, Betterview combines this data with other sources such as building permits, assessors’ data, and historical weather to determine the characteristics and condition of a roof to determine the risk of future losses.

ConcertWith.me is a concert recommendation service with a rich content description (e.g. music tracks, video reports, setlists, etc.). It allows to track bands' tours, follow friends' plans and buy tickets together.

Decisive Health Systems offers a platform that helps practices increase revenue, improve outcomes and enhance patient satisfaction with software that supports shared decision making.

Encore Alert is a SaaS platform that uses artificial intelligence to sift through online information 24/7 to derive critical insights used to improve a company's marketing and PR efforts. Eyes On Freight has created a service provider model that matches people/companies to already established logistics and supply chain companies, brokers, and 3PLs worldwide.
fuzzy.ai is AI-as-a-service. It combines a Web-based authoring tool for creating fuzzy logic controllers with a RESTful API for doing fuzzy inference.

GiftStarter is helping brands win consumers with partial payments. Pipefy is a cloud computing company that provides a BPM (Business Process Management System) for small and midsize businesses on a subscription basis. Sajilni is a social ticketing platform that is simply used and is integrated with social media channels that is scalable for any type of events.

Stamplay is developing a platform that allows designers and advertising agencies to create web applications without the need to know a programming language or to deal with all the other technical aspects related to production and server administration.

WeGrow provides the Slack bot for fast and easy feedback at work.
ZendyHealth is a digital health marketplace where patients can bid and pick their own price on standardized health and dental services to get quality, affordable care with top Providers.

mShipper is a crowdsourced delivery platform that connects senders to shippers. Once verified, a user (sender) can book a package from one location to another as well as can search for Shippers in Delhi. Bottle Bright is developing a specialized cleaning product designed for all water bottle's.
FunBites super sturdy and durable curved blade cutter cuts any kids' food into bite-sized fun shapes. FunBites works on kid-friendly food from pancakes, sandwiches, fruit, veggies, brownies and more.

The Boobypack is a fannypack for your rack. Spika's ShareON is a P2P photo & video sharing service that allows users to connect their devices directly. Biztory is a cloud-based POS with Inventory Management and Reporting access (Sales figures, Stock/Inventory, Branch/Staff Performance) available in one click. User's can manage their business in Real Time, anytime, anywhere they have internet connection.

Kono Labs (코노랩스) offers an AI-powered email scheduling assistant. Users just have to CC Kono and it will suggest meeting times based on user's scheduling preferences and automatically mark it on their calendar once it is confirmed.

Stellar Software Technologies operates Stockroom.io, a platform that connects companies to hackers. Fishtrip is an online platform collecting the best fishing opportunities in Denmark. Users are able to choose their favorite fishing trip and simply book it online. The outfitter will be notified directly to ensure that the trip is unoccupied and the online payment will automatically be completed.

The company's team consists of ad tech industry veterans, Big Data engineers and the world's largest team of data scientists dedicated exclusively to the cross-device identification challenge.

Pixode, dba Coinprism, is world's first colored coins web-wallet. Colored coins allow people and organizations to securely issue and trade real-world assets like commodities, stocks and bonds on the Bitcoin network. The company designed the Open Assets Protocol, a standard for colored coins.

CourseLoads is a mobile-first solution for the daily living needs of college students. The company delivers laundry, snacks, and essentials directly to college dorm rooms. Cookunity focuses on great quality, home-style meals from real chefs. Chefs create daily menus, featuring the intersection of timeless classics and reimagined recipes. Each menu item provides well-balanced, nutritious meals that everyone can enjoy.

Zum is a child ride and care service platform created for working mothers and busy families. Zum provides one seamless, real-time interface for parents, drivers, schools, districts, administrators, and operators to transport children safely and with increased visibility and personalized care.

The Gold Rush Nugget Bucket is the only gold panning kit that concentrates the gold first. The kit is made of high-quality plastic meant for providing a lightweight and easy-to-carry means to gold pan, we make the gold panning process easy for everyone of all ages and abilities! Just scoop in your lucky dirt, pour in water and watch the gold concentrate right before your eyes. The more you scoop the more gold you'll find!

KPI6 offers a way of running market research, combining data from traditional sources (like panels and surveys) and web and social insights, enriched with artificial intelligence. Baningo creates a unique customer-bank-relationship. It serves its customers with a simple and consistent online access to banks and their advisers. For bank advisers it provides a completely new sales-pipeline.

Parakey is an access control system for physical access via a smartphone. Parakey was built to meet the rapidly changing needs for physical access in areas such as on-demand access. Provider of a community based collaboration learning tool. The company operates an online community tool designed to enable mutual support in the application of learning. The platform is designed for users to share their knowledge, support, and to learn from each other. [Keyword; Web 2.0]

Encentiv Energy partners with utilities, energy efficiency vendors, finance companies, and non-residential customers to maximize participation in energy efficiency programs using our technology platform.

Opstarts aims to simplify planning and forecasting for startups and small businesses. Meet Univ is a university research portal with 2000+ international universities and 45000+ courses listed on its network. Students get personalized expert guidance, unbiased advice and can engage with universities directly from the website.

Customer Labs is a predictive customer analytics platform that helps businesses understand their customers better and enables them to pro-actively target, engage and personalize the customer life cycle. Currently, they have clients from 4 countries.

EPaathSala is a cloud based quality improvement and reporting solution for higher education institutions. More than 40 institutions across India are using EPaathSala for compliance management on the cloud.

TradeLab Software is a user-friendly tool focused on Technical analysis of financial securities. This software has several sub-components like, 1) Comprehensive charting, 2) Signal Generations, 3) Market Watch, 4) Payoff Strategies, 5) News Service, 6) Market Reports. This product is for retail active traders, individual investors, brokers.
Decisive Health Systems offers a platform that helps practices increase revenue, improve outcomes and enhance patient satisfaction with software that supports shared decision making.

Redox provides a modern API for healthcare, allowing software to easily and securely interoperate with EHRs in a health system infrastructure. Through Redox's standardized data models and interoperable network, software applications connect to Redox once and then have the ability to integrate with any health system and EHR.

Chef'd provides a food delivery service featuring chef-cooked recipe kits filled with fresh ingredients and delivered to customers' homes. Naboomboo is a free community to improve foreign language fluency and talk about favorite topics with native-speaking friends.

AdWerx provides localized online advertising solutions for Real Estate professionals. With a strong focus on retargeting advertisements, AdWerx is committed to helping those in the Real Estate industry utilize the technology they need to be successful and stay top-of-mind in their local markets.

Atikus is a for-profit, socially focused enterprise dedicated to expanding access to capital for qualified yet underserved individuals in developing markets. Emotion Intelligence is the developer behind a conversion improvement platform for e-commerce sites called ZenClerk. eduCanon is a provider of tools to create on-line direct instruction that links videos, assessments and student interaction, and lets teachers identify and track students' grasp of concepts.

WeTransfer is an online file-transferring platform. The platform allows users to send large files while WeTransfer transfers it to the necessary recipients.

Plato Labs, dba ROIKOI, delivers an employee referral software allowing automated employee onboardings resulting in diverse hires.On April 23rd,2020, ROIKOI was acquired by Terminal. Terms of the transaction were not disclosed.

Fohr Card helps users make money from social media followers. As a B2B service, Fohr Card helps brands discover the creative talent behind the best fashion blogs. Cookmood lets one learn how to cook new dishes via live collaborative classes. Additionally, if one is a good cook, the platform lets users make money by teaching classes from their own kitchen.

Cirtru is a local classifieds from trustworthy people. Users are verified based on their employer or university. The BevBoy features a revolutionary technology that allows your drink of choice to float in water without tipping over or spilling.

The World Record Striper Company was founded in 2011 by Greg Myerson, a life-long angler, hunter, outdoorsman and owner, at 81.8 pounds, of the all-tackle world record for striped bass. The company is dedicated to providing fresh and salt-water anglers with fishing tackle designed to attract fish to their bait. The company's flagship product is the RattleSinker, proven to be the best striper lure in striped bass.

Locurity is a cloud based "Authentication as a Service" that protects online user accounts, transactions, cloud services and web based enterprise assets by thwarting unauthorized access attempts. Locurity's proprietary approach has no impact on user experience and is completely invisible to the end user acheiving balance between security and usability. Locurity can be deployed in minutes and is founded by a team with many years of experience protecting confidential and proprietary enterprise data.

TensorWrench's business intelligence platform allows applications to integrate at the user interface layer to produce context aware mashups across multiple, decentralized data repositories. This reduces development cost and risk while improving the user experience, data security, and agility over traditional "widgets & dashboards" models.

418 Intelligence is developing a gamified and monetized prediction market platform for enterprises that are struggling to stay on top of the hyper-expanding job of cybersecurity. The company seeks to incentivize and score security analysts from inside and out in providing them accurate on-demand assessments of threat risks and trend impacts that are actionable in real time.

Cyber Algorithms is a provider of user behavior analytics solutions that reduce the time it takes to detect cyber-attacks. Cyber Algorithms aims to increase the productivity and effectiveness of valuable security operations teams by enabling them to cut through the noise of thousands of alerts and focus immediately on high-risk user profiles and behaviors.

Cyber 20/20 has developed a highly-accurate malware detection system using machine learning and a novel characterization of applications. The company's solution monitors network traffic for suspicious applications and automatically submits them to a machine learning platform, where they are analyzed and predicted to be malicious or not. Cyber 20/20's proprietary machine learning engine automatically constructs profiles of software and continually becomes more accurate over time.

Anatrope provides next generation fleet management, location-based services, and fee collection technology for personal and commercial automobiles. Sensors developed to detect always-on features in vehicles, provide easily integrated automotive solutions.
Atomic Corporate Industries (Atomicorp) develops Unified Threat Manager for web, userspace and Kernel level software for preventing malicious code.

Eunomic creates software for network switches that takes away the attacker's advantage and makes critical networks secure. The company's solution runs on commodity processors to reduce the total cost of ownership.
Paper is an educational support system. Paper's ESS increases student achievement and teacher effectiveness.

CoRecruiters is a technology company that brings together passionate individuals specialized in redefining and optimizing the laborious recruitment process. Recruitment professionals are constantly (and independently) searching and qualifying talent. An enormous amount of work goes into pre-screening great candidates that often do not get placed in currently available positions. Whether these individuals didn't exactly fit the job description, or the chemistry with the employer was not perfect, these are strong and valuable candidates worth holding onto. CoRecruiters has developped a solution (the Trusted Private Network for Candidate Referrals) that connects and empowers recruiters to effectively share quality pre-screened leads from one another; leveraging cooperation and economie...
PACTA offers proactive contract management software solutions.
Periodic offers white label booking and reservations API.
Bus.com is a marketplace for ride-shared and private charter buses, providing customers with a solution to finding reliable transportation to and from events.
Spot has turned the simple video player into a content creation platform that allows anyone to add interactive apps inside their video in order to increase audience engagement and conversion.
Studyo is an engaging tool for students and teachers that facilitates the management of school tasks and projects. It encourages autonomy and responsibility among students and saves teachers time.

SpherePlay is a start-up that develops, among other products, a complete technological solution that allows broadcasters and media companies to distribute virtual reality content on their own platform (web, smart TV, mobile, etc.), easily and quickly.
Zora helps landlords land and keep great tenants by removing uncertainty about who to rent to and when they will get paid.

Ubios is the future of the smart connected home that promises increased security, unparalleled comfort and lower heating and insurance bills, and seamless integration with the surrounding neighborhood, city and spaces.

DigitalState is a complete Digital Public Services platform that transforms the way governments deliver services online. The company lets governments use drag and drop tools to rapidly build digital services, engage with citizens, andreport on service performance.
Today Delivery is a crowdsourced e-commerce delivery service platform.

Viewbix is a video analytics and engagement platform used by brands, agencies and networks around the world to help them understand what messages are resonating with their video viewers and how to leverage that data to enrich and empower a more effective video experience.
Hearken, formerly Curious Nation, is an audience-driven platform enabling journalists to partner with the public to create relevant and high performing stories.

Motherly, your #momlife manual-guides Millennial women from planning a pregnancy through the preschool years. Their current product offerings include a week-by-week newsletter, video classes, expert articles, mom-to-mom essays and tutorials. Encouraging and non-judgmental, Motherly reminds this generation of highly-accomplished, digitally-native new moms that, "you've got this."
Huzza enables musicians to engage, grow and monetize their online audiences through live-stream video performances combined with interactive Q&A.

Mingyian is a China brand management startup for western celebrities and influencers. The company is developing a micro-event platform for celebrities to host online events that engage, grow, and monetize their fan base in the Chinese market.

Redivis democratizes access to data and the tools to understand them, allowing anyone to tell compelling data-driven stories. The company's platform crowdsources public data from around the world for activists, journalists, and researchers to use in the development and presentation of stories they create.

Parlio is a global online community to share and discuss perspectives on what matters. The company's mission is to elevate online discourse and create an experience centered around thoughtfulness, diversity, and civility.

PFITR (Public Funds Investment Tracking and Reporting) serves public entities by helping them track investments, quantify investing objectives and improve returns while also keeping them compliant with regulations.

PFITR (Public Funds Investment Tracking and Reporting) serves public entities by helping them track investments, quantify investing objectives and improve returns while also keeping them compliant with regulations.
Dabble is a community marketplace for people to discover, teach & host unique and affordable one-time classes.

rankedHiRe is an online recruitment platform that simplifies the way businesses and staffing agencies communicate. Gone are the days of incessant cold-calls and e-mails from recruiters. With rankedHiRe, staffing agencies advertise anonymous talent online and businesses only engage with agencies that have talent they need. Our web-based application gives employers access to a network of pre-screened agency talent and sophisticated rankings based on data-driven metrics, enabling them to make smarter hiring decisions. Our transparency, communication tools, and pricing model make finding skilled candidates easier than ever before.
Greetabl has come up with a greeting card that folds up into a small gift box.
Invisible Industries creates crowdsourced conversations that provide personal, one-on-one interactions in real-time.
Need Fixed is a nationwide wholesaler of smartphone and tablet replacement parts.

MeterGenius puts smart meters to work in a way that saves money for both consumers and electricity suppliers. Through an innovative software platform, MeterGenius allows residential consumers to view their electricity consumption data, set an energy budget, and earn rewards for saving energy.

i-Finish is a platform for the next of kin of a deceased person and helps the next of kin deal with the digital and online legacy of a person. The company helps with access to locked computers and with closing social media accounts.

ELXR Health focuses on managing electronic patient consent between doctors and patients. With its platform patients make informed, meaningful decisions with their health. ELXR Health helps doctors exchange and acquire more data from patients to provide better care.

BoomboxFM is a direct-to-fan distribution platform that helps independent artists market themselves to new music fans in a more effective and efficient way. The company curates the best undiscovered music throughout the world, then customize it based on the listener's personal preferences, and conveniently deliver it directly to users on their personal Boombox page. Every week thousands of listeners are introduced to three new artists with three new songs – free and downloadable. BoomboxFM is the next step in music marketing, discovery and data.

AnyCloud is the only secure web service where consumers can centrally find, manage, and enjoy all their photos – from any photo service, cloud storage, social network, or email – neatly organized on one web site. Given the flood of photos that consumers have spread across multiple services, AnyCloud provides a central portal that helps them save time and enjoy their photos more with family and friends.
Suitable quantifies soft skill competencies and uses gamification to help universities prepare their students for the job market.

TravelWits helps travelers find cheaper and more convenient ways to travel, both for business and leisure. Users enter in their origin and destination, and the company searches all airports, small and large, that are within driving distance, and finds the combinations that saves the most money.

MechOptix is transforming the brake light into a deceleration indicator that lights up every time a vehicle rapidly slows down. This is the first automatic brake light solution within the lamp, which means no modifications to a vehicle is required.

CarForce has developed a cloud-based SaaS solution that leverages connected car telematics to provide dealerships with real time updates on the health of their customer's vehicles, enabling dealers to provide their customers with a customer service experience that includes remote diagnostics.

PrepFlash creates study aids such as flashcards, multiple choice, and true/false quizzes in real time, automatically using cognitive science software similar to what is in Siri and IBM Watson. Users upload content such as PDF files, web pages, YouTube videos, wiki pages and PrepFlash uses cognitive computing software IBM Watson (similar to SIRI and Google Now) to automatically rank themes and key concepts and create study aids. Study aids include vocabulary, fill in the blank flashcards; and multiple choice/True False quiz questions.
PetQuest offers online veterinary advice for Chinese pet owners through a group of veterinarians who answer questions about pet health instantly for $5.
Gengirl Media offers a collection of dolls, books & online "edutainment" that promotes entrepreneurship and technology learning for young girls.

SocialSign.in helps physical venues, stores and places connect with their guests by leveraging free WiFi. The company's software service provides a platform for establishing relationships with customers through free connectivity. Through its service users can generate mailing lists, dynamically message visitors, drive app downloads, and promote social accounts to a physically present and contextually relevant audience. The company's service offers a set of realtime tools to help understand customers and visitors like never before.

CodeSpark is a system for teaching young kids about computer science. The company has playtested its way to a custom curriculum for kids 5-8. codeSpark's "pick up and play" game mechanics are specifically designed to appeal to a broad range of learning styles and abilities. In its tablet-based game, players control characters called Foos. Problems are solved, games are made and things are built by programing Foos. Now and then a Glitch gets loose and messes things up.On May 25th, 2021, codeSpark was acquired by Homer. The terms of the transaction were not disclosed.
Lab4U provides a platform that enables hands-on lab experiences through web and mobile devices, delivering low-cost solutions for science education.

Learn Fresh is a 501(c)3 nonprofit that provides a fresh take on academic exploration through Student Centered Design, sparking students' curiosity in the educational value of the ordinary and extraordinary in their lives. The company utilizes culturally relevant topics to develop fundamental academic skills and show students that learning can be derived from the things that matter most to them. Through relationships with iconic individuals and brands that students revere, Learn Fresh brings these experiences to life in and out of the classroom.

Papero is a platform that reunites the sense of animated discussion from a thought-provoking article, and when users engage, it benefits the publisher as well. Papero lets the user experience articles and videos via an interactive social layer that lives on the surface of existing media content together with the people the user cares about.
RoomRanger is a complete hotel management platform that helps hotels boost their revenue by empowering them to deliver unforgettable guest experiences.
Homecamp offers quality outdoor supplies & luxe, pop up camp accommodation, based in Melbourne, Australia.

Hijro, formerly Fluent, develops a blockchain based financial operating network for global commerce featuring real-time B2B payments, supply chain financing, and a peer-to-peer working capital marketplace that provide banking partners and non-bank lenders alike-such as alternative finance providers, asset-based lenders, and hedge funds-an alternative platform for lending into global supply chains.
Robby (formerly Shifts) – makes an employee's life easier by facilitating shift work.

GripeO is a website and mobile application available to both consumers and businesses which improves the way people complain. Consumers can conveniently submit product or service complaints from their mobile or PC. Business use GripeO to mediate complaints, identify systemic problems, and improve customer service. Ignored gripes are moved to the GripeO "Complaint Marketplace" where competitive businesses can purchase the complaint in an ad-market style and use GripeO to convert new business. To this end, GripeO will be a model capable of collecting complaints and leveraging third party API's to successfully monetize complaint data on the internet.

Lectorati is a social network for readers in Latin America. The company provides a community where users can recommend books, compare what they have read with their friends, create libraries of what they have read, and form reading clubs.
Blended is a free school platform that connects parents, teachers and students safely and in real time.

FutureDocs Latin America develops digital engagement solutions for mobile Doctors and Patients. ConsultorioMOVIL.net, its main product, is a cloud-based engagement platform for doctors and patients developed to achieve higher adherence levels in chronic treatments.
Catycan is a marketplace that specializes in items for pets. It delivers hundreds of products each week to homes with dogs and/or cats, including food, accessories, treats, toys, and clothing.
DaloPorHecho is a marketplace that categorizes, verifies, and rates every type of service provider. Users can hire professional services with the option of either a set price or an estimate.
Trocafone is a marketplace in LATAM focused on improving the buying and selling experience of used electronics.
DreamJobs is an online platform that allows people to search for work by location. The platform also allows companies to manage the hiring process and job offers.

Emplified helps employees remain engaged with their job and provides managers with the insight needed to increase satisfaction of their teams. The company empowers employees to proactively amplify their skills, accomplishments and needs within their workplace while providing managers with better visibility into the capabilities, progress and needs of their teams.

Vendty provides software that aims to help companies control their warehouses. Its software can generate invoices, control inventory, record expenses, and generate reports to help companies make decisions.

OhmyFi is a web platform that converts Wi-Fi internet access points from commercial establishments into an alternative and effective means of communication through the creation of loyalty experiences. This application also functions as a complete advertising and customer awareness system.

Callpage is a webpage tool that helps users gain 75% more calls from customers. The CallPage widget offers visitors to callback the company in 28 seconds, helping the owners of websites to receive more calls from potential customers and giving website visitors ways to communicate with the company.
Class101 is an online platform that offers hobby classes and materials. Class101 offers a digital platform that offers art classes for illustration, drawing, digital art and more.
Skycryptor is a cybersecurity company. Skycryptor's software BeSafe can be integrated with Dropbox, Google Drive or Slack so a user can access files securely from any location.
Developer of an app for video restaurant reviews.
SurBTC is a Chile-based bitcoin exchange offering a space where people and/or companies gather to exchange bitcoins for Chilean pesos, in a safe and friendly web platform.

ReturnTrucks is a collaborative platform connecting truck and goods owners for an effective, timely and economic engagement. It's platform prioritize engaging trucks waiting for loads on their return journey and bring economic benefit to the goods well as the truck owners.

PediaConnect is building a software platform that addresses challenges in pediatric care for children with acute, chronic, and rare conditions. The company's vision is to fill the gap in funding and focus in dedicated pediatric research and to provide a collaborative ecosystem for care that can facilitate discovery of new cures.

Credit Without Borders, formerly ModernLend, is an online lender to international citizens in the U.S. who lack a FICO score. The company uses alternative metrics-including education, employment, social and behavioral data-to identify creditworthy borrowers.
LifeDB bridges the gap between a life insurance policy and the intended beneficiary. Their software makes it easier and faster to facilitate the payment of a life insurance claim.

Tyche is an interactive platform that allows casualty underwriters to assess casualty risk like never before. By blending risk-relevant, open data with machine learning, Tyche uncovers the true factors driving the risk of each submission, and provides an interactive explorer for underwriters to turn casualty factors into actionable insights to drive better underwriting judgment.

Pablow created a flexible insurance policy system that gives travelers the ability to purchase vacation rental insurance on their terms and on their own timeline, better protecting the renter and the manager.

ClinicNote is a software platform designed to simplify the relationship between private practice therapists and insurance companies by eliminating inefficiencies by automatically aggregating therapy session notes to generate required insurance reports and reimbursement claims.
Bunchcut is a cloud-hosted, SaaS collaboration platform to help teams work with rich media more quickly & intelligently. The company is a B2B collaboration engine for managing visual content.
Alumni Spaces is a platform used by university alumni associations to better engage their member groups and expand their active donor base.
Eventable is a calendar marketing automation service that helps brands engage with audiences through events and scheduling.

BlinkPix, an app by Blinkbuggy, is a monthly subscription service that let's users select 5 photos from their iOS photo gallery, upload them to BlinkPix's safe & secure server, which in turn prints and mails two sets (10 prints total) to two different addresses of the user's choosing.

Rollinglobe is an accredited online travel agency and virtual agent network that connects travel professionals with the latest technology and leading tourism brands and destinations. Rollinglobe is an e-commerce platform for selling trip packages and travel activities.

Dezignable is an online home design marketplace that connects clients with professionals to create custom designs for the home, including detailed floor plans and product lists. The result is a curated e-commerce experience, designed specifically to the consumer's budget and style.

With Clarity is an online jeweler that provides all of the benefits of in-store shopping, at home. Shoppers can experience their favorite diamond engagement rings before they purchase through an exclusive replica ring home preview.

Fund That Flip provides short-term loans to experienced real estate redevelopers who buy and renovate residential properties. After origination, Fund That Flip offers accredited and institutional investors the opportunity to purchase fractional shares of the loan and earn an 8%-9% annualized yield.

KitSplit is a rental marketplace for cameras and related equipment, including lights, lenses, and virtual reality rigs. KitSplit expands the rental industry by bringing $30 billion in privately owned gear into the market.

Lately is a platform that unifies marketing tools, processes, and people. The company's single-tool solution integrates social and traditional media content, communications, budgets, files, analytics, and calendars. Whether seasoned or just starting out, marketers get all the tools they need, organized in one place.

MuseFind is a platform that lets brands identify and connect with their most effective influencers. The company transforms influencer marketing into an on-demand channel, enabling brands to reach social media influencers at scale. Brands are already reaching millions of their target customers using MuseFind.

Sweet is a platform that allows wholesale food distributors to save money by automating existing manual processes. Its cloud-based solution enables online ordering, invoicing, and real-time inventory management. Sweet replaces antiquated systems that dominate today's market, helping producers, wholesalers and restaurants alike.
Drive Yello is a service ensuring the efficient and reliable delivery of food by allowing food service businesses to search, book, manage, pay, train and monitor their delivery drivers.
Fluid Education offers web and mobile app for schools, combining homework management, learning resources, student reporting, and communication into a single, unified experience.
Our Little Foxes offers craft and activity box subscription for kids aged three to 10 years old.
Persollo offers a tool that makes selling online, making donations or trading services quick and easy by using a simple URL.
Simpla allows web developers to build better websites, web apps, and tools much faster by enabling edits to be made live on a page.

Camp Native is a trusted marketplace for campgrounds and campers, enabling them to list, discover, and reserve the perfect campsite. Camp Native users can track their camping memories and plan trips with friends, sharing reviews and photos of their favorite campsites.

Pingle is an automated credential management and verification platform. Pingle facilitates registration of employees with their mandatory professional certifications and keeps those certifications updated through partnerships with educational institutes.

Qalendra' algorithms ingest data from many sources, compare all destinations at once and identify where the best conditions for each type of vacations are, anywhere in the world, with up to 4 months in advance. The company develops contextual technologies for travel and hospitality and deliver it as an API to OTAs, GDSs, airlines, aggregators, tour operators, content providers on a monthly subscription basis.

SalesPrepper helps salespeople convert more emails & calls into opportunities by automatically benchmarking performance compared to peers and creating provocative, value-based messages. These insights can be used in prospecting emails and cold calls to make outreach efforts more effective. This leads to higher response rates, more meetings secured, and more deals closed.
Variat provides quality control solution optimized for medium-sized manufacturers with global aspirations.

In the Sports Zone creates activity books for teams, brands, and leagues. The activity books include 48-pages of puzzles, activities, games, drawing, dream team cards, fun facts, and pix puzzles. The company utilizes education and sports to create licensed products for teams, leagues, and brands.
SimplyProse is a collaborative writing platform that allows writers to receive productive feedback and seamlessly connect with literary professionals

UrComped connects "high-value" slot and table game players with casinos and cruise lines in order to receive special privileges. The software also includes a social media engagement tool to help build its community.

The Citizenry is an e-retail site that partners with artists and crafts-makers around the world to sell "ethically crafted home goods without the markup of luxury boutiques." The site says it has partnered with about 200 artisans in three countries.
Everthread is an e-commerce site with on-demand digital printing targeted to create customized printed fabrics for interior designers and others.

Scoro provides a SaaS-based work management solution which allows professional and creative services to control the entire workflow, to streamline work and eliminate unnecessary processes to ensure a business runs efficiently its processes, from sales right through to billing. Features include calendaring, task and project management, quoting and billing, enterprise-level reporting and a real-time dashboard.

Zipline helps retailers coordinate their brick-and-mortar stores by streamlining communications between HQ and the field. By easily centralizing and personalizing messages, retailers boost accountability and employee engagement.

47Line is building cloud products and solutions to simplify cloud access to enterprises. 47Line's core team has been working in the cloud computing domain for over 5 years and has delivered cloud solutions to businesses of all sizes, ranging from startups to Fortune 50, across a number of verticals.
LaunchDarkly provides product managers with a continuous delivery platform to deliver, measure and control their software features.

Cobalt, previously known as CrowdCurity, is a SaaS-based marketplace enabling modern businesses to crowdsource application security by connecting them with a talented, vetted community of security researchers.
WorkHands is a blue collar network that makes it easier to showcase your skills and find work in the trades online.

Cellabus is a mobile device management and application platform for education. The company is a Good Technology/Airwatch + Flurry for education, with features and tools built for unique needs of the stakeholders in education complying with education and children specific data privacy laws like COPPA and FERPA. Cellabus is building a mobile ecosystem for education that makes learning more engaging for students, managing student-device interaction in the classroom easier for teachers, disparate devices more manageable for schools and applications easier to develop, sell and deploy for edtech developers.

Macromeasures is a platform that collects public, unstructured data and transforms it into actionable customer-level intelligence for brands. The comnpany allows brands to increase the effectiveness of their marketing and advertising efforts by more accurately identifying and segmenting their customers – and making that data actionable across channels.

Carrum Health is a marketplace for planned healthcare procedures. Carrum Health is transforming the way healthcare is purchased, consumed and delivered with a marketplace solution. The company is on a mission to make healthcare more affordable and consumer-centric.

Exabyte.io is a team of top tier scientists and engineers building the fastest way to design and discover new materials. In our vision, the next generations of microprocessors, solar cells, catalysts, batteries, alloys and composites are created not through long and expensive physical tests, but through fast and accurate software models.

InsideWarehouse allows online publishers to plugin an ecommerce store with products relevant to each individual article. This includes blogs, community forums, social networks and portals. So publishers are able to capitalize on all of their content.

Litmus Automation enables Industry 4.0 teams to deploy and operate unified Edge to Cloud systems. Its industrial IoT platform allows businesses to securely connect, manage and analyze data from legacy to modern devices or assets.

Qbox, formerly StackSearch, offers a cloud-powered product search that provides end users with best-practice on-site product search. These features include multi-select faceting, sorting, pagination, product counts, refinement panels, and more.
Nightingale Analytics provides decision software for streaming data.
QC Ware is an early-stage company developing a cloud-based platform for quantum computing machines. QC Ware's platform simplifies QC programming and provides low-cost access to QC machines.

Thinnect's networking technology helps to execute applications at the edge of the network and deliver Information to the cloud reliably. The company has combined mesh networking with a service based application architecture in the Thinnect Mist stack, simplifying the creation of networked applications consisting of smart devices. The Thinnect Mist stack is a comprehensive communication stack from the MAC layer to the service based application layer. Thinnect enables rapid development of IoT applications as the application developer is not concerned with communication but can focus on the application development. Thinnect reduces bandwidth requirements as devices can share data locally, eliminating the need for connectivity to a central server.

OpenChannel provides a complete end-to-end community and marketplace solution to manage your developer community.The platform lets users discover, purchase, rate and review apps across any device, and launch apps from any website, mobile device, or desktop.
CLEER Networks enables The Delivery Of Highly Interactive Digital Media And Applications - Cloud-Delivered Streaming Games, Augmented And Virtual Reality, Interactive IPTV - From The Cloud.

DeltaBid is an online sourcing solution for companies. It replaces inefficient "Email and Excel" based sourcing methods with a modern, streamlined and transparent process, reducing costs and giving a real-time oversight.

Pnyks, dba DataWallet, is a C2B data marketplace which directly links businesses wanting to buy data with internet users that can provide precisely this data and in turn get paid for it. DataWallet will provide not only the most ethical way to buy data, but it will bring transparency of unprecedented scale to the Data Brokerage sector. It will allow firms to work with data that is more accurate than ever before and help users get paid for what is rightfully theirs.

Timekit offers a developer-friendly online booking platform, and is an easy to use and powerful scheduling API that allows developers to power up their products with an intelligent matching engine without building or maintaining any infrastructure.On November 24th 2020, Timekit was acquired by Tulip. The terms of the transaction were not disclosed.

WholeMeaning turns the growing amount of customer comments companies are receiving from many different sources into distilled user-specific insights to increase sales, reduce costs or generate loyal customers. WholeMeaning filters out all the irrelevant data and provides Actionable Insights that allow people to make well informed decisions. An actionable insight is more than just sentiment. An actionable insight tells someone how and why customers are acting in a certain way and what is relevant to them.

Zycada is an AI-powered cloud orchestration and acceleration platform that aims to help online videos and e-commerce brands increase engagement by making applications more responsive to end-user connections and interactions.

Riovic is an insurance market that connects underwriters directly with risk managers. The company was founded in 2015 and the market was launched in 2016 in response to the need for reinsurance in the Peer-to-Peer insurance space and the increased cost in traditional reinsurance.
Leaseful allows college students to sublet parts of leases. Request a booking, connect with the host, and pay - all through Leaseful's secure platform.
Casalova streamlines the rental process by allowing users to search for rentals, schedule viewings, make offers, and pay rent - all online.
Blue J offers a digital legal platform that uses machine learning and natural language processing technology to help provide insight and predict outcomes of future cases.

ConferenceCloud is a virtual platform for Conference events. The company allows conference organizers to monetize conference content online and sell tickets to virtual attendees from anywhere in the world. The platform aggregates interactive content, ticket sales, and virtual networking in one location.

Crowd2Know operates in the area of stakeholder engagement. The company brings organizations operating in urban development closer to their customers, citizens and end users by providing a platform for listening, analyzing, and effectively communicating with each other. Crowd2Know achieves this through a systematic process using a suite of software products and expert services that facilitate the analysis of social media, project documents, and other records. Using its urban infrastructure knowledge base and set of analysis algorithms the company provides a real-time mapping of stakeholders, discussion topics, and relative alignment of opinions which drive consistent recommendations for decision makers.
Vennd.io is building a toolset to help users build blockchain apps.

CapacityHQ is transforming the way in which businesses access legal services. CapacityHQ lawyers come from top-tier and highly regarded in-house backgrounds and are available at rates that compare favorably with more rigid employment options.
Nexus Notes is an online marketplace for student notes.
PixelTogether is a website builder that helps users design their own sites.
ContactOut offers a plugin that instantly allows users to find anyone's email.

Elevio reduces support load for sites by delivering the relevant help they need wherever and whenever they need it. The company is based in Melbourne.On February 17th, 2021, Elevio was acquired by Dixa at a valuation of $15M.
Journalmate makes medical research accessible.

Today We Learned is a website and app that makes it easy and fast for teachers to send a class-wide update home to every family, which helps parents and students have better learning conversations at home.
Workyard is a network connecting building contractors for work.

Giftinion is a platform for easy, fast, and affordable market research. Corporate clients can acquire new customers and meet their customers' preferences, while users can attend events and experiences and earn rewards for their opinion.

28msec,dba 28.io, provides a powerful query layer that works on polyglot persistence. From document stores to relational databases or cloud services, 28.io enables users to efficiently consolidate data silos. The query workload will be automatically balanced on the company's query processing servers. For large datasets or particularly complex queries, a single query execution is parallelized across several servers.
BuyerDeck provides a portal for sales reps to manage deals with their buyers.

Live Better With offers support that goes beyond medical treatment: together with the cancer community, Live Better With handpicks products that help ease symptoms and side effects, and improve the quality of day-to-day life.

twosigmas is an online platform connecting educators with students through personal tutoring. It works closely with elementary schools in China, with the aim of bringing the best of American education to the growing Chinese market.

Vidsy is a London-based creator network that helps brands connect with young talent to create mobile-first video campaigns. Vidsy crowdsources the production of micro-video content for brands, with a view to enabling them to develop a direct connection with a millennial audience and drive engagement online.
Zipcube is a community marketplace for professionals to list, discover, and book offices, meeting rooms, event spaces and unique spaces around the world online.

Adventure Bucket List's Agenda booking software integrates directly with tour operator's websites allowing travelers to book and pay for tours on demand with real-time availability. Agenda saves tour operators hours each day in admin work by helping them automate tasks, while increasing their website sales.

Agribots is an agricultural data company that helps producers improve their businesses. Agribots plans to build a database of agricultural data from public and private sources to enhance agricultural benchmarking, thereby increasing yields and crop quality. Agribots' application delivers analytics from the Agribots sensor and from private and public sources.

Athways provides a web and mobile platform that allows coaches to create strength and conditioning workouts, distribute those workouts to their athletes, and view analytics on athletes' workout performance.

Beelivery is a same-day grocery delivery and alcohol delivery platform that delivers to over 300 towns and cities, including Birmingham, Bristol, Cardiff, Edinburgh, Glasgow, Leeds, Liverpool, London, Manchester, Belfast, Bradford, Leicester, Newcastle, Stoke-on-trent, Sunderland, Worcester, Sheffield, Oxford, Portsmouth, Southampton, Cambridge, and more.

Capta360 helps brands' social media campaigns go viral to improve engagement with customers. Its system is based on 2D barcodes and allows event attendees to automatically identify, retrieve, and post branded pictures and videos of themselves to their social media accounts.
Investopi, by Trading Club, is an e-learning platform, providing lessons in investing in stocks, forex, option and futures.

ConsorcioAbierto has developed a management software for unit owners, tenants, and the property manager. Building property managers can get input from tenants and unit owners as well as easily share information and news with them. It also allows them to keep track of who is coming and going from the building.

Data Craft & Magic specializes in the conceptualization, design and development of vertical-specific and bespoke Data Mining solutions to meet the challenges of modern Big Data processing and its meaningful utilization.

DELI Global is a platform that provides users with personalized city guides based on a personality algorithm created through behavioral and psychological research which links the answers of a short personality test to a database curated by locals.
DesRueda.com is an online platform for users to get quotes from multiple mechanics at once and compare prices. Users can reserve mechanics for specific time through the site.

DevCode is an online community of web designers and developers. It provides advanced courses in web and mobile development and connects students with employment opportunities. Classes last a maximum of two hours and are accessible 24/7. Classes are collaborative and students can communicate with one another.
Embuda.me is a tool for retail companies to find, analyze, and incorporate new products.

Flixtio is an online marketplace where creative people connect to buy and sell products through short videos. In these videos sellers explain the concept and story behind their products and demonstrate their uses before they invite people to shop.
Hubchi is an online marketplace to find and book things to do in every city in art, adventure, outdoor, entertainment, and travel categories.

HypeMentor is a Software-as-a-Service that enables organizations to harness the power of their network by connecting past and present members. It consolidates organizational networks into a searchable database and interface that facilitates interactions between current members and alumni.

Keyword Tool is a keyword research tool that helps to find long-tail keywords for content creators, SEO, and SEM professionals. It uses Google Autocomplete to generate relevant long-tail keywords for any topic. It extracts Google keyword suggestions and presents them to the user.

Careseekers is a national service that connects people needing in-home carers with people looking for carer work.

Gamurs is a media network allowing gamers to share achievements, keep up to date with esports news, and improve skills. Dot Esports is an online publication and community page covering esports and competitive gaming. The platform offers members breaking news, in-depth coverage of esports personalities and events, and includes an esports database – covering the rankings and stats for all major esports games.
Camplify connects would be campers with owners of caravans and RVs, holiday parks, camping grounds and camping related experiences.
Oncora Medical is developing an analytics platform that helps radiation oncologists to use data to provide care for cancer patients.
Havenly offers an online platform that connects homeowners with vetted interior designers while minimizing financial extravagance.
Idaciti is a platform that provides real-time access to global financial data for users to easily create, visualize, analyze, share and collaborate around 'stories' about companies and trends.
Intelligent Eyes helps companies spot the best way to visualize their data. Intelligent Eyes lets companies select the right business intelligence and data visualization tools.

Mapistry is cloud-based mapping (GIS) software which allows scientists and engineers to store, visualize, and analyze data and produce elegant maps for reports/plans. The company's online software eliminates the need for specialized training and puts powerful mapping features in the hands of everyone, not just mapping specialists.
Sugarwish is an online candy gift giving service. Gift-givers purchase a candy box of a certain size and recipients choose from among 80 favorite candies.
TomboyX is progressive underwear and apparel brand for people of all shapes, sizes, and orientations. The company empowers people to live their most confident life in comfort & style.

The QuickZip Sheet is an e-commerce store that provides linens. The company's products are easy-change, zip-on fitted sheets, that help relieve a pain point for changing sheets on cribs, bunk beds, beds of the elderly and more.

CleverSharks has built a career intelligence tool which projects career trends, alumni career paths, switching options relevant to user interests, branch, sector & company. The startup also covers interviews & case studies of its alumnus and has set up a forum to solve personalised and specific queries.

Dealwithus is a cash back site which has features like automated link building and cash back meter where the cash can be used for recharging users' mobile phones or transferring the money to their accounts from wallets.
Snackexperts is an online platform providing nutritious, wholesome and tasty snacking options for delivery.

Appbase has developed a real-time events-based database with full-text search and collaborative features via an easy-to-use API. With Appbase, building a real-time production app takes only a few hours.

Handkrafted is an online platform connecting artisans and craftspeople with users looking for custom-made items. The company creates a way to help discerning buyers seek and find unique, high-quality and sustainably produced goods and connect with the right craftspeople and artisans.
Kimono is an enterprise messaging platform that transforms how people communicate at work, with an unbelievably simple solution.

SimpleCitizen is an online do-it-themselves tool for immigrants who need to file for a green card or other basic immigration documentation.On September 23rd, 2020, SimpleCitizen was acquired by Fragomen, terms of the transaction were not disclosed.
Crowd Supply helps creators launch with the funding and support they need to deliver thoughtfully crafted products to delighted backers.

Poached Jobs is a deep dive into a passionate and unique industry offering valuable tools to help busy restauranteurs better staff their businesses. Poached streamlines the hiring process, connects high quality job seekers with the best jobs available, and creates an easy hiring experience for a busy industry.

ActionSprout tools helps organizations reach and acquire email addresses from supporters, engage existing supporters beyond Likes, Comments, and Shares, and leverage the social network to amplify their off Facebook activities and fundraising efforts. From petition signing to donating, ActionSprout helps nonprofits grow fundraising efforts by reaching and engaging millions of supporters around mission related actions.

Amplion informs strategic decisions involving the commercial use of molecular biomarkers. Amplion provides an intelligence platform using machine learning and biomedical domain expertise to accelerate Precision Medicine. By harnessing biomedical evidence, the company's solutions deliver insights to enable strategic decisions in drug and diagnostic development.
Bigleaf Networks is an intelligent networking service that optimizes Internet and Cloud performance by choosing a connection based on real-time usage and diagnostics.

CrowdStreet offers an online, commercial real estate investment marketplace. The company's solutions allow real estate developers and operators to accelerate their fundraising processes while achieving enhanced visibility and control over all aspects of investor relations and life-cycle management.

Zembula, formerly Scratch-it, is a provider of a software as a service (SaaS) platform that enables enterprise marketers to create, manage, and deploy templated rich interactive content. Users are able to do this across several digital channels that delights their customers, drives conversions and provides measurable results.

Miramix is a maker's platform for common everyday blends. The platform is designed for experts in supplements and cosmetics to make custom mixes for individuals, based on what their needs. The company connects health experts with consumers and allows them to use its turnkey production equipment to make every order exactly to the user's specifications.
Golix, formerly BitFinance, is a Zimbabwe-based bitcoin exchange startup. Golix makes it easy to buy and/or sell Bitcoin no matter what money service is being used.

Carson Life retails weight loss, hair care, skincare, and rejuvenation solutions. The company has 33 products, from vitamins to shampoo, using natural ingredients common to the Hispanic community, like papaya.

AltusCampus is a self-paced way for medical professionals and healthcare facilities to achieve and maintain all of their licensing and certification needs. The company's cloud-based Learning Management System (LMS) and programming expertise makes the eLearning platform easier to use than any other provider.

Bright Cellars is a monthly wine club that matches users with wine that they love. The Bright Points algorithm scores each wine by comparing 18 attributes to preferences, matching users with their monthly experience.

Education Modified offers a platform that empowers teachers who serve students with special needs using the latest research-based strategies and Learning Biographies for seamless collaboration.

Knowledge to Practice is an education technology firm improving patient-centered care through personalized, mastery-based postgraduate medical education. K2P catalyzes and accelerates progress in postgraduate medical education. Its offering helps AMC's defend their academic leadership position by setting new levels of excellence and efficacy for postgraduate medical education.

PIP Learning Technologies offers the Trust Platform, a service that helps school districts manage access to 3rd party systems holding sensitive data, reducing cost and complexity for both sides while respecting student privacy guidelines.

Empirical is a nonprofit developer of free, interactive learning tools. The company's mission is to make students active players in their education by presenting students with problems to solve and allowing them to construct solutions. In this environment students take charge of their own education. The company's Quill is literacy tool that builds students' grammar skills through personalized writing and proofreading activities.

GroupHub provides software to insurance brokers so they can provide the same technology to their clients that the new online brokers provide, letting the brokers focus more time on generating new business and providing exceptional client support.
Signifikance has developed software to automate the generation of a genetic test report, allowing them to process more genetic tests and generate additional revenue.

Founded in 2013, TapGenes uses its proprietary risk analysis engine to determine a TapGenes health score and specific risk factors from basic information on the diseases and conditions a user's family has had. TapGenes constantly monitors new evidence and alerts TapGenes members of factors that could influence their health, based on their family history or genetics.
Hability is the patient engagement solution for physical therapy designed to help strengthen the relationship between patients and practitioners.

33coupons.in is a tool to find online coupons and various deals available on all leading online stores in India. Users can get a listing of all sorts of deals, coupon codes, cash back offers, freebies and discount vouchers.

Bigpicture Interactive is a digital entertainment company that provides content specialized for the eSports gaming experience. The company offers Gamecoach, an eSports instructional platform that fosters amateurs into professional gamers. Its GameCoach Academy lets users take courses from pro gamers for titles such as Overwatch, League of Legends, Fifa 3, and Hearthstone. In addition, Bigpicture Interactive operates Element Mystic, a professional eSports club; Allforgamer, a comprehensive platform which provides a diverse range of gaming service all-in-one, from subscription to payment; VersusOn, a game tournament platform for game publishers who wish to open and promote their on-line and off-line tournaments; and GCL (Game Culture Leader), a channel for esports and gaming video con...

Virtkick is a SaaS cloud management panel that offers simplicity and great user experience for customers - hosting companies - and their end customers - software developers, software houses, designers and other individuals in need of hosting services. With Virtkick, independent hosting companies increase conversion rates, simplify server management and take on the biggest hosting providers.

BitFusion offers AI infrastructure management solutions to help industries in fields such as pharmaceuticals, financial services, and machine learning to gain market advantage by conducting high-volume computations faster without having to add server capacity.

Tenfold integrates customer relationship management systems with company phone systems to collect data to help businesses engage with customers. The application offers call tracking, computer telephony integration, display of specific information about the caller, and advertising channel information for incoming phone calls, as well as software maintenance and upgrades and customer support which enable businesses to track the performance of their advertising campaigns.On October 27th, 2021, Tenfold was acquired by LivePerson. The terms of the transaction were not disclosed.
Designer Wardrobe created a social marketplace for like-minded women to buy, sell & rent designer fashion with each other.

Justly is a cloud SaaS app that puts the lawyer and client on the same page through a secure online portal where they can collaborate on the production of legal solutions. The company is a web application that enables individuals to create their own simple-language testamentary legal documents end-to-end, online and in a matter of minutes: Will, Power of Attorney, Advance Medical Directive.

Roll was developed to streamline a creative businesses internal process and solve a massive problem in the sector that has been clearly validated by extensive market research and customer development.
Wearit is an online/mobile social platform where reals girls can personally suggest clothes to real guys.

Preno is developed by a hotelier for hoteliers, because of a need to help operators better compete in a increasingly complex market. The company is a property management system, developed for unique and boutique accommodation providers.

Cognilab is a research suite for the scientific study of the human mind. Users can create cognitive tests, collect data and analyze results in days instead of months and Cognilab research-grade tools capture participant responses with millisecond precision.

Dinst is a platform for connecting elderly, disabled and housebound people with home service providers. With just a few simple clicks people can find, compare and book reliable professionals who can help them with their needs.
Fysio24 is an instant online assistant for injury prevention and recovery. Through the app, people can access a library of tailored do-it-yourself programs and live online physical therapy coaching.

Skolafund is a digital platform that provides matchmaking and mediation services to those who want to help fund tertiary education for students from low to middle-income families. The platform enables students to request for funds, filtered based on need, to campaign for funding. Skolafund filters and verifies the application, and provides transparency of financial transactions and the students' progress reports to the sponsors.
Boxgreen is an online service that delivers an assortment of healthy snacks to consumers on a monthly basis.

Kamraa is a housing rental meta-search for India, by the room.
Wiindi is a social discovery commerce platform for Southeast Asia.
GetLinks is a personalized and visual job hunting app for startup and digital jobs.
Koncierge streamlines the process of trip planning by aggregating information on attractions, restaurants, and events along with reviews, and generating map-centric itineraries.
Forecastr provides ready-made analytics and predictive recommendations specifically tailored for television executives available via the cloud.
Whose Your Landlord enables renters to rate their landlords and housing complexes and giving them the ability to find their next home.
Embe is an ecommerce platform offering baby products, accessories and toys.

EverVest, previously known as Cardinal Wind, provides advanced software for analyzing, valuing, and financing renewable energy projects. The company's software provides more accurate financial projections, enables faster deal screening, and helps investors manage portfolios of renewable assets. The system leverages the technical data of a site and applies proprietary machine learning algorithm technology.

Rapport helps small and midsized business reap the rewards of sustainability. The company offers a simple tool to capture, analyze, reduce and report corporate sustainability metrics. Rapport helps companies drive waste and cost out of their operations. The company is an outgrowth of a sustainability consulting firm with over 40 years of collective experience helping company manage, improve and disclose their impact on the planet.

Tank Utility offers a remote propane monitoring system providing tank level data through wireless sensors and smartphone app for fuel deliveries.On September 20th, 2021, Tank Utility was acquired by Generac Holdings. Terms of the transaction were not disclosed.
Shuttlecook helps answer the question, "What's for dinner tonight" The company provides everything needed for a fresh meal, delivered same day to one's place of employment to take home and cook.

Recualizer is a smart evaluation tool that helps companies recruit better, faster and more accurately.
