Zenso is a wearable sensor to manage anxiety and stress. Zenso teaches how to voluntarily control wearer' heart rate through haptic biofeedback.

SPIXII is an automated insurance agent dedicated to making insurance quicker, easier and more personal. With a simple conversation, users can find out what insurance would be right in an instant without any form-filling or confusing jargon.

CoVi Analytics allow insurance firms to extract value from their compliance activities and identify operational efficiencies by building a smarter, more efficient and engaging risk & compliance interface that simplifies the day-to-day dealings of business teams at banks, insurers and intermediaries.
massUp offers an insurance API and transaction shop for small protection insurance to B2B partners.

RightIndem is a web-based, self-service insurance claims platform for multiple insurance verticals. Operating globally, with pilots in Automotive, Home and Marine insurance, the software platform helps improve productivity and reduce cost within insurers, whilst providing a much better user experience for end customers. The customer-centric approach allows insurance customers to interact with their claim in their own time, the web app removes the insurance jargon and thus drastically improves claim cycle times and customer satisfaction. The platform's backend service reduces the administration support needed to process a claim. It helps claims handlers focus more on higher value jobs and brokers spend more time on new deals, minimizing the time spent on explanation processes and neg...

Domotz is a provider of monitoring and remote tech support systems for professionals and businesses. Including a mobile/web apps and software based agent, Domotz enables professionals to provide digital tech support from anywhere and anytime.
FitSense helps health & life insurance companies personalize insurance by using data from wearable devices.

Buzzmove, fka Removal Stars, is a comparison site for moving services that allows customers to instantly compare certified movers and book online immediately. It is has an excusive partnership with the BAR (British Association of Removers) and has vetted and validated the vendors listed on the platform.

Digitteria has designed advanced solutions to address the growing use of personal information online with models that put people at the heart of managing the use of their data. Digitteria's products allow people to protect and share their information with third parties on their own terms, at their own pace and in manners with which they are comfortable. The company's metaMe enables users to use wellbeing data from wearables and private records to earn tailored and better-priced insurance.

Bind Health simplifies genetic testing for consumers by allowing them to discover, compare and order genetic tests online. Users can review genetic tests curated for their medical profile and state of residence, as well as get pre- and post-test genetic counseling. Bind also provides testing companies the infrastructure to market tests online and charges a referral fee for each test ordered.

DocDelta is a predictive analytics solution to help healthcare providers recruit and retain top talent, focusing on physicians and nurses. DocDelta leverages multiple big data sources to identify top passive job candidates and assess their interest in new opportunities. Clients pay a monthly subscription to use DocDelta's web-based platform, and the company also offers customized applications and consulting services.

HIPAAfix provides a comprehensive "HIPAA-in-a-box" solution for small physician practices. The company automates compliance with HIPAA regulations, turning an expensive consulting problem into a simple software enabled service. Features include data protection, friendly and intuitive training, and automated creation of forms and documentation.

MedPilot is a medical bill resolution platform. MedPilot offers healthcare providers fully automated software to help patients resolve their outstanding bills before being sent to third-party debt collectors.On February 17th, 2021, MedPilot was acquired by Vytalize Health. The terms of the transaction were not disclosed.

Oculus Health brings disease management, care coordination, and price-to-value transparency solutions across the health continuum for individuals, providers, and payers. The company makes it simple for physicians to deliver customized chronic care management services to their patients

Position Health uses a simple smartphone application, downloaded at the time of discharge, to notify providers when a prior patient arrives at an emergency room anywhere in the country. The Position Health solution allows providers and hospitals to intervene before important ER decisions are made, preventing unnecessary re-admissions and testing.

Psocratic is a stress management solution for companies that helps identify employees who are struggling with stressors in their work or personal life. Psocratic provides time management, productivity, and stress management training exercises to help employees overcome their stressors. In addition, the Psocratic platform provides an overall assessment of an organization's mental well-being and resilience.
AdmitSee is a crowd-sourced undergrad and grad school admissions resource. Read application essays and advice direct from the students who got in.

BrightLoop is Evernote for teachers. We help teachers use qualitative classroom data to personalize learning and communicate progress. Created by teachers, we support teachers in being able to manage it all while helping them to grow into 21st century learning models.BrightLoop increases teacher satisfaction by taking the stress out of personalized instruction - improving student achievement and teacher retention. By supporting teachers in personalizing instruction, offsetting reliance on standardized data and highlighting a teacher's positive impact on students, BrightLoop strives to decrease teacher turnover and renew a sense of confidence and respect for the teaching profession.
At its core, Chesscademy is a service that identifies specific areas of improvement for the user and supplies the relevant content.
CoLearn is a community of parents who seek ways to support each other with educating their children at home.
Edusight is an analytics platform for K-12 educators. The company provides teachers with the simplest online tools to track student performance.

Eduvee is a study tool that combines open education resources (OER's) and personalized learning to improve students' performance in science courses. Eduvee provides study texts from OER's and combines them with YouTube videos to organize study materials for students.

Formative is an assessment platform that updates in real-time. Teachers can upload assignments, assign them to students, and in response, students record answers that immediately show up on the teacher's dashboard.
Leada is an online training course that teaches professionals data science.
MathChat helps students help each other. On MathChat, students can enter or draw a math problem, add friends to it, and collaborate by drawing, typing, and asking each other follow-up questions.

Mission 100% makes best practices in teaching widely available. The company starts by videotaping top educators from around the U.S. in their classrooms, then edits those videos down to short clips that can be accessed via their online platform. Each clip is tagged according to Mission 100%'s pedagogical framework for easy searching and incorporation in lessons. Aimed at school leaders, instructional coaches, and teachers, Mission 100% is subscription-based and offers content for K-12 students.

Mosa Mack Science offers inquiry-based lessons and videos for science classrooms grades 3-8, guided by a diverse set of characters. Each lesson--there are now three, on food webs, climate change, and photosynthesis, and plans for 16 additional lessons are in the works--offers an animated mystery with songs, customizable inquiry options, and corresponding classroom activities.

Peekapak bridges the gap between learning in class and learning at home with a preK to grade 3 digital learning program that connects the class and home. All lesson plans are Common Core aligned and include both an original storybook covering important Social & Emotional Learning (SEL) topics and related activities designed by curriculum experts to accelerate early childhood development.
Picolab syncs with Google accounts to make professional collaboration more efficient. The platform helps users organize data, take notes as a group, and track meeting objectives.

ReadWorks.org helps teachers meet the nationwide crisis in reading comprehension. The non-profit helps teachers improve their effectiveness through research-based, classroom-proven practices and curriculum. ReadWorks is a non-profit, 501(c)3 organization delivering lesson plans directly to teachers online. There is no cost to educators or their schools.

Tickle lets students of all ages learn to code on their mobile devices. Using a block-based programing language similar to Scratch and Blockly, students can create games and interactive stories, and even program their Smart Toys.

Forkable, dba Trinket, is an open teaching platform & the easiest way to create and teach your next course. Trinket is an all-in-one coding environment designed for education. Teachers and students use trinket to code during class, while online courses and coding clubs use trinket to make interactive projects for their students.

Founded in 2012, TeachMe is an online suite of internet math games, available for teachers, students, and parents to use inside and outside the classroom. Covering math concepts in Pre-K to 9th grade and searchable by Common Core State Standards, TeachMe also has progress reports and dashboards for parents and teachers to track individual student performance.
MyFutureNow combines old pension plans into one low cost online account helping people take control of their planning.
Juke making fantasy simpler, quicker and more fun.

Kinduct Technologies (formerly Leader Interactive) develops intelligent health, fitness, and sport performance software and content. The company's product, Kinduct, provides organizations with dynamic, expert-driven applications that help standardize the delivery of knowledge, content, and programming down through an organization to the grassroots levels. Its interactive, white-labelled approach has led the company to partnerships with some of the world's leading healthcare, sport, fitness, military, education, and corporate wellness organizations.On September 22, 2020, Kinduct Technologies was acquired by mCube. The terms of the transaction were not disclosed.
LeagueApps equips organizers with the technology and community they need to play for the future.
Sideprize allows season-long fantasy players to challenge anyone on their league on any given week.

Swish Analytics provides sports predictions and analytics by using historical data and proprietary algorithms. The company's platform serves fans, bettors and media partners via licensing and subscription based services/products.
Founded in 2012, DecisionIQ is a data analytics tool to track information from sensors on heavy equipment and provide long-lead prediction of failures.

GetLawyer is an app that aims to connect lawyers and clients using Smartphone technologies, wisdom of the crowd and social media. The client is asked to fill out a short & intuitive questionnaire; the App sends the case to the right lawyers (field of expertise & geography) and gets back to the client with a short list of lawyers in their area including comparative information: price, rating, distance and recommendations. The client will be able to compare and choose the right lawyer easily, as well as other derivative services, such as funding, medical experts, private investigators etc.

Gramarye Media is a commercial publisher producing original books in hardback, paperback, and audio … and in something else, something special. Gramarye Media is also a vendor creating "magic books" for traditional book publishers, film and television studios, text book publishers, corporations, and to advertising and marketing agencies. Gramarye Books combine text, video, music, games, social media, and more surprises into a tablet or smartphone app to make an engaging and truly immersive reading experience that helps readers get lost in a story.
Melii conntects shippers directly with freight carriers. The company has revolutionized logistics so truckers never have to drive empty and shippers never have to search for qualified carriers.
RoadSync is an online payment platform that allows shippers to make direct lumper fee payments to lumper companies.

PDAN (Personality Disorder Awareness Network) produces and markets an online network and mobile app for mental health coaching and peer-to-peer coordination. The network focuses on personality disorders that have significant effects on families through emotional dysregulation, and for which a good amount of scientific research is already available, namely Borderline, Narcissistic, Antisocial and Obsessive-Compulsive.
SalesTing is a sales acceleration platform.
Stemmed connects companies that value diversity with under-represented computer science and engineering college students that are looking for internships, co-ops & entry-level technology positions.
TimeSpiral takes 5-12 year-olds on a hands-on chronological journey through world culture. The story-driven edutainment is featured on YouTube Kids, website and app

Otheyos provides cloud based software to take the time and anxiety out of running your incorporated association. Meetings, agendas, minutes, motions and action items taken care of for you. Like accounting software is for the Treasurer, Process PA is for the Secretary.
Founded in 2015, Green Socks is a platform that connects people who don't want to mow their own lawns with people who want to earn extra income mowing lawns.
Puntaa is a peer to peer social betting platform that allows people to place wagers with their friends on anything, share bets on social media and seamlessly transfer money for won and lost bets.
Affordable College created a "transfer student marketplace" that helps connect community colleges, four-year universities, and students trying to complete a bachelor's degree.
Bab'l Books uses crowdsourced translations and print-on-demand technology to "make bilingual children's books accessible to anyone, anywhere, in any language."
Mindsets Learning offers education technology with a mission is to spark students' creativity and entrepreneurial thinking and help prepare students with the skills to succeed.
Learning Games Studios is an educational games studio led by a team with experience in the learning sciences, instructional design, and video game development.
Menlo Learn provides an online platform that offers tutoring and college admissions consulting services for students worldwide.
Skookii is a payment app that allows parents of K-12 students to easily pay for school expenses like uniforms, lunches, and after-school activities.

TeachersConnect is a mentorship and collaboration network for new K-12 teachers.On May 26, 2021, TeachersConnect was acquired by Public Consulting Group. The terms of the transaction were not disclosed.
Eureka King enables publishers to maximize the life-time value of their users across web and mobile, by delivering intelligent and responsive user-prompts throughout the user's journey.

PersonalHeroes is a platform for ordinary people, performing extraordinary acts. The app enables you to tag, reward and geolocate those people that are doing good deeds to you. From a small random act of kindness, until a life changing situation, PersonalHeroes invites you & everyone to RATE the impact of those positive acts creating the biggest data of everyday heroism based on collective intelligence, and therefore aggregating a new layer of information to places, organizations, companies and cities, relying on Goodness.

NextRequest aims to make public records requests friendlier for the public and easier for governments.On June 24th, 2021, NextRequest was acquired by ArchiveSocial. The terms of the transaction were not disclosed.
45 Degrees Health is a technology platform for improving patient experience and outcomes through data driven concussion management.

Neurish is a location-based mobile social network to improve the lives of people affected by epilepsy and other neurological disorders. The company's mission is to connect patients and caregivers to mentors, doctors, events, and other quality resources to improve the quality of life for the patient and caregiver.
Zyrobotics is creating accessible technologies that engage and empower children with motor disabilities to enhance their quality of life.
BioScreen Health offers various outputs that help employers maintain the health and wellness of their employees. The company offers Health Assessment Kiosks and online software solutions.
Dynamic Res is a reservation platform designed for Travel Agencies and Travel Management Companies.

Express Empire is a publishing platform for digital content creators, empowering them to grow their audience, increase their revenue and own their relationship with their followers. The company's platform provides targeted content to readers, so readers only see content that is relevant to them. For publishers, it provides a 'network of followers' unlocking the access to premium advertising rates.
GRAMMA Music is a mobile music discovery and recommendation service which plays the perfect song for every moment based on the user's mood, environment and tastes, all in real time.
Groopeze offers an online platform that allows users to make, manage and pay for group bookings.

Recipe Guru is a global recipe content and data insights solution provider. The company works with global Kitchen Brands, Grocery Retail, Smart Kitchen, FMCG/CPG Food brands and advertising agencies globally.
Seen On Set is the definitive resource for furniture and other items seen on the set's of movies and television shows.

SwitchMetrics is the Google Analytics for telephone calls. The SwitchMetrics dashboard provides operational insights into phone call activity, enabling small and medium firms make decisions that grow their revenue.

Wyzerr is a communication platform that helps businesses target, engage, and better understand their customers. The company helps customers communicate feedback directly to the business at point-of-sale. Wyzerr businesses use Smartforms, the modern way to capture customer feedback. Smartforms harness the power of artificial intelligence to take all customer feedback - the good, the bad, and the ugly - and recycle them into powerful insight to drive customer satisfaction, retention, and loyalty.On July 16th, 2020, Wyzerr was acquired by PopCom. The terms of the transaction were not disclosed.

AdAdapted develops on-line advertising technology. AdAdapted provides the first scalable model for serving highly integrated ads in mobile games and apps. The AdAdapted platform gives publishers tools to create and register customized dynamic ad spots that are 'native', meaning they fit the content of the game or app.
OROS Apparel develops the Lukla jacket, which uses the same technology applied by NASA as insulation in spacesuits. The company's product line includes quarter-zips, beanies, fleeces and vests.
Jersey Watch provides sports league management software.

Benchmark Intelligence has a product suite that helps retail chains analyze why certain locations perform better than others by collecting customer data in a variety of ways including social media listening, mobile text messaging comments, surveys and field audits. It discovers the factors (customer service, product quality, cleanliness, etc.) that affect unit performance. The company then surfaces actionable insights to retail chain back office that they can use to improve the customer experience across their portfolio of locations.

Casamatic matches people to the perfect home by learning about the people and activities that they love, through an engaging and highly personalized experience. When users find the perfect home, Casamatic pairs them up with an expert real estate agent to go see it in-person-instantly.
andros, formerly known as CredSimple, provides a simple, online platform where a health provider can manage the credentialing requirements of all of its staff.

Navinata Health is developing technology platforms that will elevate the level of collaboration across the Healthcare Ecosystem to drive Innovation. The company's Pharma-MD Engagement Platform is uniquely designed to optimize 2-way knowledge exchange between Pharma & Physicians

WholesomeONE is a monthly Natural Remedy Box delivered right to peoples doors. Each box is customized for a particular health condition. Products are selected by our team of doctors and natural health practitioners. They bring their educational knowledge and professional experience to the process. Boxes are currently offered for Migraines, Osteoarthritis, and Fibromyalgia.

Pathgather is a social learning platform for companies that connects people around personal and professional development. The company helps employees discover great learning content, learn from the experts around them, and grow to become experts themselves.
News Deeply is a network of single-topic platforms combining journalistic insights and analysis, expert contributions, and community engagement.
Beavly is a social community for skill-seekers to discover apprenticeships and connect with like-minded people to build businesses.

Agriversity is the first online education and training platform designed to address the specific needs of agriculture. The platform offers courses for developing basic skills and advanced technical training. Ranging from tutorials and workshops to more complex courses aimed at users looking for higher qualification and companies wishing to train their staff or provide technical assistance to customers.
7 Generation Games creates educational video games combining math, Native American history and adventure gaming.

CrowdSchool is building a community platform for K-12 teachers to create and share project based units that make learning truly fun and engaging for students, on any device. CrowdSchool also offers a space for students to showcase their remarkable work to online audiences.

Emotuit is understanding student engagement & efficacy of content in online learning. Using facial expression recognition to analyze engagement. Learning how you students learn. Adapting to their needs.

The Imaginie is the largest newsrooms correction platform in Brazil. Gathered hundreds of qualified brokers for students or schools can be assessed convenience and speed correction. Take Imaginie to your school and see results in quality education. Talk to one of our professionals and improve the performance of their students in ENEM and text production.

WriteWell eliminates the paralyzing threat of the blank page. For new writers, the program helps organize their material into a coherent package, and outline the elements they need to make a story. For pros, it can store months of reporting in cloud-based, smartly organized files that can be pulled in and out of the story as it develops.
Zamenhof helps language schools to organize lessons (online or over the phone) between their students and native-speaking teachers.

SimpleCitizen is an online do-it-themselves tool for immigrants who need to file for a green card or other basic immigration documentation.On September 23rd, 2020, SimpleCitizen was acquired by Fragomen, terms of the transaction were not disclosed.

Parakeet is a vacation rental property management automation platform built for property management professionals. The company's system allows for centralized remote access control of primary property functions like door locks, garage doors, thermostats as well as freeze/flood sensors and has the ability to scale from a single property to hundreds of properties.On March 3rd, 2020, Parakeet was acquired by Brivo. Terms of the transaction were not disclosed.

PrismXKB is a tool that takes the mystery out of team building as this is the first assessment APP that delivers meaningful, measurable and quantifiable results that can be graphically illustrated to help everyone's productivity from problem employee to star performer.

Basedin offers an online platform providing research on businesses based on nearby cities. The company compares and analyzes businesses' data with other competitors across the city. The business scores is the easiest way to compare a company's overall online reputation. Businesses are scored from 1-10. The higher the score, the better the online reputation.
QuickZip is the first innovation to the fitted sheet since 1959. It's a patented two-piece fitted sheet with a base and a zip-on sheet.

College Sports USA will help people find and get noticed by the top colleges & universities in the country. College Sports USA will help users create a Professional Athletic & Academic Profile that you can send to the colleges & universities you want to attend.

The Swapping Company allows online fashion resale stores, consignment stores, and individuals to quickly upload their items for sale at The Swapping Company's online community while also distributing the information to other selling sites. This one-two punch maximizes market exposure of that merchandise to the ideal customers.
VeriQuikis a background check provider. The company allows people to find out what is in their background now and send a request to see what is in someone else's.
StartTalking allows therapists to connect with those who need help through secure online sessions.
EditBIOMED specializes in editing biomedical manuscripts, grants, and other scientific documents for non-native English-speaking scientists.

PartCycle is an e-commerce marketplace created specifically for the auto parts industry. The company connects people who need auto parts with people who have them for sale using a platform that is trustworthy, modern and really simple to use.On December 22nd, 2020, PartCycle was acquired by Original One Parts. The terms of the transaction were not disclosed.

Foodscape allows users with an empty plots of land to connect online and get matched with local gardeners, who then come and plant food crops according to the user's needs. Scape also has programs for people who already have a garden but need help tending it, or want a home garden but don't have the space.

DiverseNote provides corporations with a recruitment pool of over 1 Million professionals within the diversity community (all inclusive). DiverseNote is more than a recruiting channel or mere job board. The company offers a network that is engaged in mentoring, career development, and building relationships between companies and job candidates in the diversity community.
RunThatApp is a platform that allows users to stream, demo, and share mobile apps within a Web browser before releasing them to the public.

Telemetrio offers digital tools that track fitness metrics have never been hotter, and Telemetrio plans to capitalize on that trend by offering users a broadcasting and statistics platform designed for recreational athletes.
Audienced is a platform that changes how events take place by ensuring there is a guaratneed attendance before an event is finalized.
Once N Out is a community market place that allows fashionistas who want to look good, while saving money and the world buy, donate and sell items they once loved anonymously.

Feedbac is a data-driven program for brands to create and release videos that are better suited for the immediacy of the Internet and social media. The online, software-as-a-service platform allows companies to analyze social trends and stories, create a collaborative workflow to edit and approve the video, and then launch the video to targeted markets. The program is designed to be a means to have brands provide relevant content to their audiences in a timely manner.

Stafr is a provider of on-demand event staffing. Stafr developed a platform where companies can post jobs, outline how many people they need, where and when they need those people and how much they'll pay. That posting is sent out to the local pool of staffers using the program. The companies then can select the applicants they like, plus a couple of back-ups.
Visibl is a video marketing platform that makes it possible for anyone to execute a highly targeted video ad campaign across the biggest sites on the web.

Revaluate offers ratings and reviews for homes, condos, & apartments. Learn about hidden issues, potential problems, and the good things about any apartment, co-op, or condo in Manhattan or San Francisco.

SideDoor provides ways to buy or sell a home online, without an agent. The platform helps guide the buyers from preapproval to closing and all of it is made possible by their legal and title partners.

Bold Betties aims to promote outdoor adventures for women. The firm organizes meetups for women to climb, mountain bike, hike, fly fish, and do other outdoor activities. It also offers an eCommerce site, where women can rent adventure travel and outdoor apparel and gear. The site also features packing lists, gear reviews, product recommendations, and other tips to help users plan their next adventure.
Qwip It allows anyone to create 11 second clips of their favorite videos and share them to the world.

Shoelace is an AI assistant that helps eCommerce merchants launch retargeting campaigns on social media. The company analyzes data from their store to implement retargeting campaigns on Facebook and Instagram.

Pixmoto helps brands, online reatailers and advertisers to cut through the message clutter of the Internet, engage more consumers and transact more sales. The company's platform collects, collates and clearly communicates intelligence about the entire consumer buying experience so users can determine the cost/benefit analysis against sales and performance tune the customer buying journey. Pixmoto offers video + social + e-commerce.

Adistry is an online advertising network for cannabis-related businesses, products and services. The company's platform and team actively assist advertisers in buying media that provides an optimal opportunity for a good return.

Colorado Pot Guide is the definitive online guide to cannabis in the Mile High State, and beyond. The company connects cannabis consumers with service providers, showing them where to buy, where to stay, what to do and understanding the law.

Glasshous is a recently launched ecommerce startup in the cannabis accessories and online head shop space. Glasshous is looking to change the stigma associated with purchasing cannabis accessories by making the experience akin to the way people buy clothing online.

Healthy Headie Lifestyle is an in-home, direct sales, and demonstration company for the Cannabis lifestyle. The company's mission is to provide tools, resources and information to people interested in alternatives for their health.

Highest Reward uses technology to automate the human resource process for retail, production and support service businesses in the cannabis industry. The company provides an independent HR department. Highest Reward's service simplifies a complex, time-consuming, and costly management function. The company takes the pain out of doing HR by eliminating paperwork, ensuring adherence to regulations, and providing dedicated HR professionals.
The Herbalista Set, fka Shivanysa, designs and manufactures cannabis lifestyle accessories for women.

Founded in 2014, STASHLOGIX was developed on the principles of privacy and security. STASHLOGIX is the one place where people can keep everything safely, securely and discretely. STASHLOGIX created the first ever integrated combination locking portable safe that is easy to store, organize, and lock cannabis and cannabis infused edibles.
Trade is an online wholesale marketplace for licensed cannabis businesses. Users are able to buy, sell, and ship wholesale marijuana directly from their internet browser.

CannaHacker is the hub of the how-to's and what-ifs of cannabis: how to make pot tea, what if drone delivery became a reality, and thorough evaluation of the current state of the cannabis industry-from highlights of the legal landscape to the presentation of the industry in mainstream media. A lifehacker for the Cannabis-centric, CannaHacker presents a cornucopia of ideas, tips and tools.

Compliant Cannabis provides peace of mind to business owners in the legal cannabis industry. By automating the data gathering needed for compliance, the company's software service turns any smartphone into a real-time inventory management system. Cannabis cultivators, dispensaries and infused product managers gain actionable insights into their inventory, protecting margins and boosting profits.
Elevate's offering caters to the cannabis connoisseur with premium smoking accessories crafted with olive and rosewood. The company offers smoking supplies and cannabis-related lifestyle products.
Ganjapreneur, formerly Ganja Boxes, is a web resource for cannabis industry professionals and business owners, and a source for daily cannabis news, commentary, and industry information.

The Hemp Business Journal delivers well-researched information about the economics of the fledgling hemp industry in the United States. The Hemp Business Journal aims to help develop the industry as a whole and inform companies – from start-ups to Fortune 100s – how to best grow, manufacture and use industrial hemp as a part of their business.

Leafcart empowers smoke shops, glass artists, and other individual sellers by providing a decentralized local marketplace to buy and sell online instantly. Leafcart is a B2B wholesale marketplace that changes the way manufacturers and retailers discover, buy, and sell smoking accessories.

The Pot Scientist Reports is a web video series covering marijuana culture, industry, and science. TPS (The Pot Scientist) Reports – educational and entertaining spots that break down the industry topics, including marijuana's changing legal landscape, women in the industry and the future of cannibis testing.

Benchmark Intelligence has a product suite that helps retail chains analyze why certain locations perform better than others by collecting customer data in a variety of ways including social media listening, mobile text messaging comments, surveys and field audits. It discovers the factors (customer service, product quality, cleanliness, etc.) that affect unit performance. The company then surfaces actionable insights to retail chain back office that they can use to improve the customer experience across their portfolio of locations.

Nebulab is a data management solution that allows researchers to add context (e.g. tags, attachments, comments, links) to their data, making it easier to search for, verify, and share research. The company is also the only data management solution designed to layer over the workflows and consumer apps that researchers. Nebulab can therefore act as the interface to all their stored data.

Stabilitas enables leaders at global organizations to safeguard their enterprises. The company's technology enables the security crowd to keep people safe by connecting them to relevant intelligence.On August 11, 2020, Stabilitas was acquired by OnSolve, terms of the transaction were not disclosed.

Captain Planner, previously Kongcierge, adds rich content on a hotels website in the form of a fun, interactive co-branded trip planner, which drives user engagement. Ekovia helps hospitals recruit top talent, focusing on nursing staff initially. The company monitors a number of online data sources to identify top job candidates and assess their interest in new opportunities.
Ambie is a legal, personalised, music streaming service for businesses.

Deekit is a virtual whiteboard to help remote teams work seamlessly. Deekit is a collaborative canvas, a whiteboard where your team can draw, write, edit or add other content together in real-time. Hackajob is a data-driven recruitment platform that matches people with jobs relevant to their skillsets and expectations then challenges people to 'hack' them.
Headliner is a marketplace connecting event planners with the world's live entertainment to easily book acts for weddings, celebrations or corporate events.

EnjoyHQ helps UX and product teams learn from customers faster by streamlining the customer research process, accelerating growth, lowering churn, and increasing customer satisfaction.On April 15, 2021, EnjoyHQ was acquired by UserZoom. The terms of the transaction were not disclosed.

PrintToPeer is a web platform and printer driver that simplifies the 3D printing process. Printing an object is really awkward; you currently need three different pieces of software, with hundreds of settings in each. Each printer, object, and material has different settings that need to be entered manually, and your laptop has to stay with the printer for the entire 18 hour print unless you physically transferred files via SD card.
Sorry as a Service accompanies e-commerce sites as part of their loyalty and customer service strategy by sending personalized gifts for them in case of problems related to online orders.

TeskaLabs provides Enterprise-grade Security Solutions for industrial, consumer mobile, and Internet of Things applications. Mixupload.org site offers a free platform to listen to Dubstep, Electro House, Trance, Drum and bass and other electronic music.
Bleeve is a social online marketplace that empowers local communities and homeowners to lower their energy bills and upgrade their houses to make them more energy efficient.

Zenodys provides connectivity with old and new devices so people can automate their homes, offices, or develop professional IoT applications.

Deskbookers, founded in 2013, provides businesses and freelancers with direct access to thousands of work and meeting places throughout the Netherlands, Germany and Belgium. Klets helps businesses communicate better externally.
KOLLEKT.FM offers personally selected in-store music. Based on the Music Identity, each brand is connected to a personal music curator who hand-picks music exclusively for you.

Live On Demand is a crowdfunding platform where fans can start and join requests for live performances of speakers, artists, musicians or DJ's. When enough fans join a request, Live On Demand books the artist to a stage nearby.

Mobingi provides an automated app maintenance platform for users of Amazon Web Services (AWS) and other cloud services. WheelStreet caters an online platform for all the bike lovers across India. The Company connects bike owner to renter and provides a hassle free bike renting experience.

Collectionair is an online marketplace for fine arts in emerging markets including MENA. Collectionair acts as an online marketplace for art lovers from around the world to buy, rent and swap works from the comfort of the persons home.

AltusMedical Group is a collection of products for the healthcare community to achieve better patient outcomes through medical education and patient data transparency. We are developing digital signage solution in a cloud – oosmTV. oosmTV is creative digital advertising on screens. On any screens. Anywhere. oosmTV web app will simplify digital communication. It is cheaper by the costs and easier to implement everywhere. No more hi-tech and expensive hardware. Advertisers have more control over their running ads and it can be changed in real time. Anytime, everywhere.

Civocracy is a B2B business offering a subscription-based SaaS solution to local government, companies, and organizations. Civocracy is the place to engage with their communities in a more dynamic, transparent, and constructive way. By allowing them to interact and include their communities in decision making Civocracy makes them better, more efficient and credible decision-makers.

Carnomise offers free airport parking to travelers by renting out cars to other people while being away. The car owners get free airport parking and earn money with the rentals. The renters pay significantly less for the rentals.

BondIT supports investment portfolio construction, optimization, re-balancing and monitoring. BondIT's software-as-a-service platform uses machine-learning algorithms to construct yield/risk optimized portfolios that match a client's risk profile and can be managed by ratings, duration, yield, country, bond type, seniority-level and more. The system automatically monitors portfolios, reports performance and risk levels, and alerts users to market changes and constraint deviation, while allowing the portfolio manager to optimize investments using periodic rebalancing.

Cybertonica provides a cloud risk intelligence hub for merchants, PSPs and financial institutions. It aims to decrease the number of fraud transactions and charge-backs, and increase site conversion with unique machine learning models, online behaviour analysis and biometric fingerprint profiling of Internet users.

Obsidian Solutions has launched FundBinder, a private company portal tailored for boutique fund managers that reduces operational risks and costs by providing a centralized data store, intuitive reporting modules, and automating daily processes. On November 11, 2019, Obsidian Solutions was acquired by Alpha Financial Markets Consulting at a valuation of $7.34M.

Stockviews is committed to the production of high-quality, differentiated equity research. The company's process is designed to deliver research that is differentiated and backed by in-depth research. Stripping out the costly infrastructure from the sell-side model, StockViews matches idea generators with capital allocators in a more effective way.

24sessions video conference technology supports 1-click video chat and both screen- and file sharing. Clickly is an in-text content discovery platform that allows online audiences to discover relevant content in an interactive native format that seamlessly blends into the content they are engaging with.

Sellify is a convenient way to sell online. Users can "sellify" their product within one minute and the company provides distribution for the product, the best shipment options, and iDEAL as an integrated payment solution for the buyer.

ShopAds is the at Dutch Retail Ad Network; specializing in website monetization exclusively for online retailers. This new way of advertising enables brands to share their message at the best position and moment in the sales-funnel; very close to the online point of sale.

A cloud based Product Information Management (PIM) solution that will merge the easiness of using a spreadsheet, with the structure and power of a database that is required by any web shop system. This will provide the user with an easy to use method of handling product data, whilst being able to use a variety of different tools to speed up and deal with the more time consuming tasks.

TryLikes easily measures the opinions of users customers. It's technology collects answers on questions simple questions, analyses the answers and compares the results for any business using the service.

Segmentify is a SaaS tool that helps e-commerce managers convert visitors to customers by making smart recommendations. Segmentify recommends the right product to the right visitor at the right time by utilizing its on-site marketing tools, resulting in higher conversion rates.

SensorAide is a web remote monitoring platform for Wireless Sensor Networks, specialized for agriculture and farming. SensorAide stores data on the cloud and provides visual meaningful and actionable real time representations. Exploiting Business Intelligence processes it provides historical and spatial statistics and reports. Moreover it provides a fully customizable alert notifications system

Cubilog is a cloud based automation platform with the purpose to give total control to the user over any brand of smart device. Cubilog is able to integrate all existing protocols and devices into one easy-to-use cloud based software with a cross platform user interface. The hardware covers all existing communication protocols for easy device integration. With Cubilog's dashboard the user can customize and control the devices and create rules and schedules for automation.
Plytix makes it easy for online businesses to centralize, optimize, distribute, and analyze their product data for multi-channel e-commerce.

DataQuarks uses AI/ML algorithms for automated data driven decisions. There is an information overload for business executives with too many charts, reports and dashboards. We take data straight to decisions driven by natural business language modelling.
Intranetum is a knowledge sharing tool that uses Deep Learning to mimic the way our brain forms connections in order to categorize information.

Storm is a platform that connects digitally micro merchants from developing countries with main commercial and financial suppliers. Through ad hoc hardware, software and algorithms, we collect and analyse all the commercial and business data to generate automated loans and commercial proposals

Moneylink is a platform that enables individuals to sell easily and safely through social-media, blog, e-mail or website with minimum effort. In less than one minute, a (free) fully functional webshop is created for a single product optimized for social media. With Moneylink, everyone can sell like an e-commerce champion.

BDS Analytics (Business Decision Data Service), is a source for cannabis industry data and insight. By capturing millions of transactions from dispensary POS systems, the company provides insights based on accurate information, enabling dispensaries, brands, and growers to sustain their success.

Tourism4me provides solutions to renters of apartments to centralize and synchronize their locations when they are offered on multiple platforms.
Bloowatch is a specialized software to save time by managing in one place all the school activities and bookings, and to boost marketing and sales during low season.
Menuterraneus offers its users the embodiment a personalized as healthy menu prepared by dietetics professionals and complementary to the school children's menu.
eVineyard is a Slovenian startup that develops a wine data warehousing software.

LeadSpotting is a cloud-based business intelligence and lead generation software, with features such as map-based visualizations and personalized alerts. LeadSpotting scans, filters, analyzes, and brings the user the advantage of powerful information to save time, increase efficiency, and grow sales. With LeadSpotting, users can drive sales, save times, and identify qualified leads, with LeadSpotting doing all the research.

At Edume we are focusing on developing innovative educational solutions that ignites Imagination, Creative thinking and Interpersonal Skills for Children while maintaining our Cultural uniqueness and values. Its products combine education and entertainment through proven cognitive methodologies and cutting edge-technologies.
Estickery is an online store that sells customized wall stickers. Estickery started in 2013 by selling stickers through it's early website as well as social media.

Sondooq makes the shopping process an easy one by bundling different sets of products together, saving you the hassle and confusion. Sondooq offers a unique shopping experience through a number of frequently bought items such as mobile accessories, gifts, and a few others.

Selsal is an online-based company which provides all the details about Saudi wedding requirements and assists you to take care of every detail in the lead-up to your big day, ensuring a gorgeous, memorable wedding without any fuss. Through Selsal you will be able to plan your wedding online in a very easy way.

iRehab is a website and application for parents and therapists dealing with children suffering from motor delay. The website combines many different tools to assist the parents in applying the exercises like online consultation face to face or by emails, 3D visual exercises, weekly lessons and home exercise program. In addition to that, the ability to ask questions and share experiences with other therapists and parents through the support group.

Offways is portal system that offers a number of services. First service is agreeing with other companies about deals and perks for the company that installs our platform. Second service is giving rewards to employees in the form of coupons that offer discounts or free gifts through these perks. Third service is helping the employees check their rewards and coupon through our platform and giving them the option to buy these coupon even if they didn't win it.

TenX has built a protocol for the blockchain called COMIT (Cryptographically-secure Off-chain Multi-asset Instant Transaction). It is a network that connects different blockchains (such as Bitcoin and Ethereum) to allow transactions across all of them in a quick and secure way. The idea is similar to the internet connecting different intranets into one network.

Chew is a live and video on demand (VOD) platform for Artists, DJs and Labels. Live streaming has a high barrier to entry and online video often restricts/takes down music content preemptively. Chew gives anyone the easy access to stream their show live and share the recording after the fact.
SttoryBox is a social network for readers & writers, offering a community for users to create, discover, and share stories.

Medicom Technologies is a software company that builds key communication infrastructure for digital health. Medicom’s current product suite focuses on applications for sharing health information and is intended for use by private practices, imaging centers, radiology, groups, patients, and hospitals.

MDBenchmark specializes in providing Medical Malpractice insurance quotes to business professionals. Its insurance specialists have access to the nationwide insurance market. Users complete an online application and get a quote in their inbox.

Gymbag gives fitness professionals everything they need to sell supplements and fitness equipment to their clients, without the upfront cost and burden of having inventory. Users can launch online stores and choose from large catalogs of fitness products to start selling.

Quainted operates an enterprise social network aimed at keeping members of an organisation engaged – with each other, with their bosses, and with their tasks; with a view to improving employee productivity and performance.

Instabase is a platform for businesses to build customizable apps for automating different parts of their business. For example, a bank can quickly build an app that can automatically verify customer income in a fraction of a second by combing through documents such as camera pictures or scans of paystubs, tax documents, bank statements, and other similar documents submitted by the customer. The platform comes equipped with the tools for reading documents, data extraction and classification, natural language processing, and optical character recognition. It is designed to enable creators, developers, and organizations to quickly build complex business applications based on their needs.

Sekg is a cloud based platform for emotional analytics of entertainment consumers. The platform provides emotional insights from the users, gamers, and content-consumers by utilizing and understanding their biometrics and behaviors. The platform translates the data collected from the latest wearable devices into actionable statistics that are processed in real time. Generated big data is transferred into a personal customized dashboard which will help the client benchmark engagement, compare results with industry's leading games and contents and better predict success.
Provide of a mobile shopping guidance application.
Vicancy offers a video service for job posting. Vicancy allows users to embed video job ads in any webpage and share it on social media.
Palarin is transforming remittance using Bitcoin technology, starting in the Philippines.

Heyday is a weight management program with a difference. Heyday re-trains one's mindset around food and eating, instead of relying on diets and feeling out-of-control around food. Heyday supports individuals in overcoming 'all-or-nothing' eating, eating for stress or boredom, and childhood eating habits.
Unforgettable Flowers is a family run business trading in Cork for over 20 years. The company provides modern and traditional floral designs for all occasions.
WealthTank is an online platform that makes it easier for users to manager their finances.

KASI Insight is an information platform providing reliable data and insights from Africa, working with consumer surveys in five countries. The company offers consumer and market information collection and aggregation within two weeks via a grassroots network of local partners and smart data analytics tools.

Socialgiver is a solution that helps consumers, businesses and social projects work together to create positive social impact. The company offers consumers special rates from businesses that have excess capacity such as hotel with extra rooms or restaurants with extra dining spots. Part of the money earned is then donated to charity, while ensuring the business receives tax rebates.

Develop Link's mission is to help doctors, governments and healthcare corporations reach the patients who need them most. Using data sourced directly from healthcare providers, the company provides healthcare professionals with the specific data they need to effectively work in emerging markets. Develop Link is a planning tool to improve collaboration between medical aid and local healthcare infrastructure in developing countries.
The Dress Project collects donated formal dresses and resells them in Malawi to fund education for young girls.
Firelily is a fundraising platform dedicated to those impacted by disaster and the organizations that serve them.

GirlForward is dedicated to creating opportunity for refugee girls who have been resettled in the U.S. from countries around the world. GirlForward is a 501(c)(3) non-profit organization in Chicago that provides adolescent refugee girls with individual mentorship, educational programs and leadership opportunities.
Her Agenda is a platform of inspiration and information that offers professional millennial women access to career advice and a curated database of advancement opportunities, panels and conferences.

InvestNextDoor's community-engaged marketplace connects visionary investors with creditworthy business owners to build and support mutually beneficial lending relationships. This approach allows entrepreneurs to choose their own lending terms and removes the hassle that traditional bank funding can involve. It also closes the gap that exists in funding loan amounts less than $250,000. InvestNextDoor empowers entrepreneurs by providing access to affordable capital to help finance a business purchase, expand working capital or fund expansion, and helps drive significant returns for investors by allowing them to diversify their portfolio while encouraging entrepreneurship.
MotherCoders offers a tech orientation program with on-site childcare for moms on-ramping to careers in technology.
Move This World specializes in social emotional learning (SEL) programs for schools to help students better engage & express themselves.
Pentorship creates accessible, innovative, and relevant educational products for the incarcerated.

Smarty Pants Yoga is an after-school program that aims to mold elementary-age girls into confident leaders. Each one-hour session upholds this mission by fusing literacy enrichment, physical fitness, and social-emotional mentoring. Across eight weeks, girls read stories about female protagonists who navigate relatable challenges. Girls then reenact each plot line through yoga, internalizing lessons on character traits such as honesty and integrity.
Woman LEAD Nepal empowers the next generation of female leaders in Nepal.

ScribeSense is an online service that digitizes handwritten documents using advanced image processing algorithm. ScribeSense makes teachers work easier by grading their tests and providing detailed results. ScribeSense is an online grading system that saves teachers time and provides quick test feedback to parents and students. ScribeSense works with existing handwritten tests on plain paper and retail scanners.

PenPal Schools connects a global community of students, educators, and parents to learn together. PenPals ages 9 and up collaborate through high-quality online courses to discover cultures and learn about global challenges while practicing essential communication and technology skills.

Cooking Up Cultures is a 501c3 non-profit organization that has been serving the Austin area community since 2010. Cooking Up Cultures provides supportive, ediblen environments for learning languages and sharing cultures. The company's ultimate purpose is to bridge the cultural barriers that exist in communities.

Bluehub Health offers a digital platform for patients and healthcare providers to collect, store and share healthcare information, alleviating the administrative burden that diminishes the quality of patient care.
Open Arms provides livable wage employment to refugee women in Austin through private label manufacturing for socially conscious businesses.

SuchCrowd de-risks events by allowing event planners to get the crowd and funding first. SuchCrowd provides an easy platform for that - post a tentative event, state the minimum amount of tickets needed to sell before confirming and send it out to the crowd for feedback.
SttoryBox is a social network for readers & writers, offering a community for users to create, discover, and share stories.
AppFollow is a real-time monitor for users' reviews, versions, rankings, search results positions, and more in the App Store, Google Play, and Windows Store.

Debtor Daddy offers a service that combines smart technology and the human touch to get invoices paid. Debtor Daddy is easy to set up and configure. Once it's up and running, users have complete control over the receivables process.

Peer5 helps video content providers improve video performance while reducing delivery costs. The platform disrupts the traditional model by delivering parts of the video directly between the users. It works within the browser using upcoming HTML5 technologies.On August 10th, 2021, Peer5 was acquired by Microsoft. The terms of the transaction were not disclosed.
Privicee utilizes a combination of intelligent tools, intuitive interactions and privacy mechanisms to create value added services previously unavailable to many players in the internet marketplace.

Bornevia lets businesses setup their own simple & real-time customer service helpdesk able to manage support tickets from online and offline channels easily in less than 3 minutes. Available on either free subscription plan ($0, up to 3 user, 1 mailbox only) or paid ($12/user/month, unlimited mailboxes).

Purplle is an e-commerce platform that offers products pertaining to skin care, make-up, hair care, body care and beauty appliances. Additionally, the company lists salons and spas in cities including Delhi, Mumbai and Gurgaon along with their contact numbers, addresses, reviews and offers.

Talentral operates ZippyApp, a marketplace for frontline hourly jobseekers and employers. Employers create a hiring page and list their open positions. Jobseekers fill out a single common employment application and add their resume/cover letter. Then, they scan the employer's QR code and submit their application package with one click. The system utilizes Responsive Web Design; natively optimizes for any browser including mobile - no need for a mobile-app.

Big Style Fashions, dba Big Dude Clothing, retails men's clothing from a 2XL through to an 8XL and sells clothes by popular high street brands including Wrangler, Farah, Regatta, Mish mash, Kangol and Dr Martens.

Faircent is an online lending platform serving as a marketplace where potential lenders and borrowers can register and interact to strike deals on lending and borrowing. The top-line comes from charging an upfront fee once a deal is finalized for its services and facilitating the process. Faircent's features include a matchmaking technology to connect prospective borrowers and lenders as per their respective requirements, and an index of borrowers based on the purpose of the loan, amount, and tenure.

FlixMobility is the parent company FlixBus which connects major European cities and towns with its daily scheduled services and its comprehensive long-distance bus network. The mobility provider and its green long distance buses are supported by an international team of employees throughout Munich, Berlin, Paris, Milan and Zagreb as well as bus drivers based all over Europe.
